description: 主要职责:  l 支持销售团队达成业务目标，负责策划并执行区域内的市场活动，包括但不限于新店开业、车展、试乘试驾活动等；  l 负责与区域内金融保险合作伙伴进行沟通和协调，并对合作项目进行管理，确保合作项目可顺利进行；  l 负责调研车主需求，与内外部团队进行合作，策划并执行车主活动，加强与车主的联系；  l 负责挖掘潜在个人/企业客户需求，通过策划和执行线上线下活动，对潜在个人/企业客户进行开发；  l 负责拓展各类资源，包括但不限于各类商户, 合作伙伴，落地项目，并有效支持区域市场目标达成；  l 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。  任职要求：  l 本科学历或同等学位；  l 3-5年业务拓展开发，或市场活动相关工作经历；  l 优秀的商业拓展能力和商务谈判能力;  l 对数据敏感，优秀的数据分析能力和逻辑分析能力，能独立解决跨部门和跨组织的问题；  l 有较强的抗压力，能在快节奏、充满活力、结果导向的环境中工作，并能在规定限期内完成多个项目；  l 保持创业精神及高度敏感的市场嗅觉，持续推动业务发展。
industries: Automotive, Renewables & Environment, and Utilities

description: Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  向指定客户销售时，新增客户通常很少，并且通常需要经过审查。包括单个业务组/P&L 中的关键客户 扩大自己对销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群体的认识，以执行政策/策略。不断培养更高水平的知识和技能。 理解关键业务驱动力的基础知识；用这种理解来完成自己的工作。了解自己团队的工作如何与其他团队融合并为该领域做出贡献。 可能具有一定的自主权，从而在定义的框架内进行决策。以良好的商业知识和判断力解决在规定程序中遇到的问题。就定义的说明/参数之外的问题咨询更多的高级团队成员。 此级别的职位需要良好的人际交往能力。向直接相关的同事和业务部门传达所提供的设计和协调服务。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。向他人介绍技术信息。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。 学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。 优秀的人际关系和领导能力。 能够独立工作。 较强的解决问题能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.    Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: Responsibilities The primary responsibility of the sales specialist is to identify and drive new business opportunities in respective application to achieve revenue, profit and growth targets. Development and ownership of short and long-term development plans for C&I China business growth. Work closely with value chain partners on the distribution channel restructuring and management optimization. Works in collaboration with Technical, Product, Regulation and Marketing team on new product opportunity identification and commercialization and business model migration. Effectively help team manage the opportunity pipeline to sustainably grow the business over the mid and long term. Continually expand the understanding of China market, competition, and customer needs to input global & regional growth strategies Maintain and develop a strong industry network. Possible travel frequently in China around 50%. Qualifications Bachelor degree or above. Good written and spoken English. Minimum 3-5 years’ sales or business development experience in multinational company, business development in multi-industries or key accounts outreach background preferred. Experience in B2B2C key account and channel management is an advantage. Experience in converter market and CM is an advantage. Strong business acumen, ability to innovate and sales execution capability. Excellent interpersonal, oral and written communication skills. A strong team player with ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and in multi-cultural groups to achieve stated goals. Ability to work under pressure and willing to travel frequently. Proactive, aggressive, initiative, result oriented and strong ownership. DuPont is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability or any other protected class. If you need a reasonable accommodation to search or apply for a position, please visit our Accessibility Page for Contact Information.  For US Applicants: See the “Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law” poster at: http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf  For our U.S. Affirmative Action Policy, click here.
industries: Machinery, Mechanical or Industrial Engineering, and Staffing and Recruiting

description: 职位介绍  企业客户销售团队负责制定和执行特斯拉在中国大陆市场的企业端销售策略。作为区域企业客户销售专员，您的首要职责是为特斯拉的产品在企业端和学校端的销售快速打开渠道、实现增量。  主要职责  我们正在寻找有相关专业经验，并具有市场活动经验和能力的候选人。您应具备如下能力： 协助企业客户销售经理完成企业员工购车和企业购车的协议谈判和签订 对接企业方，协助企业客户销售经理组织和落实企业和学校的外拓活动，聚焦为各自区域的特斯拉中心带来客流和销售增量 对接区域内各城市的门店，积极主动地去协同配合，高效地落实市场宣传活动 协助企业客户销售经理，完善运营流程、制作宣传物料，将品牌、产品、目标融合到商业模式中，实现与企业间合作的可持续性和计划性 通过以上任务的达成和与零售门店的合作，确保全国企业销售团队目标的达成 基本条件 出色的谈判能力，具有参与合同谈判的相关经验及理解诠释法律合同/协议的能力 对企业客户合作和商业操作有详尽的了解与知识 能够合理安排并同时胜任多项任务，思路清晰 了解并掌握项目管理工具和技巧 了解和热爱特斯拉的品牌和企业文化
industries: Automotive, Renewables & Environment, and Utilities

description: 主要责任： 按照计划拜访客户，以了解需求、发展关系、谈判合约、销售产品和提供相关服务 帮助经销商整理产品样品，进行价格管理等；及时拜访大型中型眼镜店，与经销商和眼镜店维持关系，跟踪他们的需求与订单，同时与潜在客户培养关系并建立联系，识别业务机会。 按照行程计划，拜访所负责客户的门店，维护和发展与店长及隐形眼镜验配员的关系，提供相关服务和销售指导，维护终端价格，及时反馈并协调解决门店问题。 及时更新终端门店的资料和信息，了解主要产品的终端流转状况和消费者需求，掌握并反馈相关信息。 按照要求完成年度/季度客户销售合同的谈判和签署。 进行产品培训、产品展示、讨论会，让客户了解最新产品或服务、价格、变化等信息。客户如有问题，给予解决；协作销售支持部等相关部门及时反馈和处理客户退换货、产品投诉等问题，为客户提供良好的售前售后服务。 按产品们店铺货标准，完成不同产品对于不同类型门店的铺货率和市场覆盖，并保障足够的产品门店库存。 按公司陈列标准，及时有效地维护门店产品和宣传品陈列，促进门店流转。 按时准确地提供拜访报告，和提交相关数据信息；并定期上交相关工作报告。 协调并与经销商合作，开展客户教育、销售推广等活动，例如学校的客户教育，顾问项目等。 调查／研究市场信息，分析制定市场趋势、竞争产品活动等方面的报告。对竞争者进行评估。 维护客户数据库，根据需要做出更新。 理想背景  教育： 最低要求：大专以上；优先选择：视光学专业优先 经验／专业要求： 二年以上客户管理及销售经验，眼镜行业的客户销售经验或眼镜零售行业从业经验者优先 具有丰富的客户分析和管理能力 具有一定的销售技巧和谈判签约能力 沟通和表达能力良好，熟悉EXCEL软件应用
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Marketing and Advertising, and Retail

description: Job Purpose and Impact  The General Sales Representative I, will sell directly to our consumers or business purchasers or indirectly through various sales channels. We seek a professional who will help identify and contact prospective customers, building relationships to generate future sales and repeat business. In this role, you will participate in assessing customer needs and suggesting appropriate products, services and solutions.  Key Accountabilities New key account customer development in foodservice channel, especially in eastern QSR, western QSR, causal dinning and other emerging channels. International customer management. To coordinate with customer and internal stakeholders to deliver the right product and solutions. With supervision, coordinate market research, pricing and sales and merchandising activities. Help support business growth by disseminating information that favorably promotes the organization and its products and services. Help monitor customer and competitor activity and industry trends. Participate in regular status and strategy meetings with customers' senior management to understand and meet their needs. Handle basic issues and problems under direct supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff. Other duties as assigned Qualifications  MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS 2 years working experience in foodservice channel. Better to have sales experience in key accounts. KEY BEHAVIORS Build strong customer relationships and deliver customer-centric solutions. Good communication skills, both internally and externally. Could lead cross functional team to work out solutions. Young potential, energetic and positive.
industries: Chemicals, Food & Beverages, and Food Production

description: 3M has a long-standing reputation as a company committed to innovation. We provide the freedom to explore and encourage curiosity and creativity. We gain new insight from diverse thinking, and take risks on new ideas. Here, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter.  Job Description  Independently performs sales work and training under general supervision for assigned territory or account subset by mail, telephone, or the Internet at a fixed site, whether home or office, rather than at the customer’s place of business. Initiates actions towards unresolved issues. When necessary, the supervisor is consulted for assistance in problem areas. Understands product lines, customer segments and their needs, divisional/branch functions, and competitive products, prices and policies. Utilizes active listening and communication skills to learn and build customer relationships and understand opportunity and priority to sell. Responsible for performing work as an individual contributor within a forecast target or as a sales team member cultivating a working relationship with field sales reps in all assigned territories to promote a healthy team selling approach.  Learn more about 3M’s creative solutions to the world’s problems at www.3M.com or on Twitter @3M. description: DESCRIPTION • Work with central Account executive team, feedback regional customer needs, work regional Joint Business plan, own regional business Point Of Sale as Key Performance Indicator. • Sell in regional strengthen plan. • Sell in Headquarters plan execution compliance to 100%.  QUALIFICATIONS: • Education Background: bachelor's degree or above. • English Proficiency: speak, read and write fluently in English. • Leadership. • Analytical skills & logic thinking to review data to identify abnormalities/ rationale for a solution. • Flexibility to adapt to change & Problem-solving skills. • Hardworking to collaborate & establish relationship with oversea colleagues and customers.
industries: Consumer Goods

Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Relocation Assistance Provided: Yes/No    Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No

description: Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Roles and Responsibilities  Achieve sales/orders targets for sales in assigned one accounts/territory while being within the budget allocated. Target, get access, builds relations, develop a business strategy and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory.  Represents and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory.  Proactively build network with government bodies and Key Opinion Leaders as well as deep understanding of healthcare structure/players in assigned territories/accounts.  Coordinate indirect deals for multimodality projects and aim at maximizing share of direct deals within your territory/ accounts.  In Cooperation with Modalities and Marketing drive One GE Healthcare marketing events in assigned territory. Be aware of segmentation and targeting in healthcare system, and apply relevant product benefits to each client’s segment.  Analyze market trends, competition and accounts to develop a business plan and strategy that creates new business opportunities for all GE Healthcare products & services.  Provides on-going feedback to management, modalities, services and marketing.  Leverage Product Sales Specialists, Account Managers, Service and other Company resources to provide necessary technical equipment, service or clinical content to customers.  Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on strategic accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations.  Develop & implement plans with Zone cross functional teams to achieve results through effective project proposals, negotiations, and contracts. Grow the share of wallet in assigned accounts (GE’s share of customer investments in Capital and Operational expenditures).Develop & maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management, drive customer on their accounts.  Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value.  Promote Service offerings, identify and escalate commercial service needs  Pro-actively monitor and escalate service issues to drive customer GE policies, procedures and Operating Mechanism. Proactively participates in company initiatives depending on organizational needs and as directed by management. Ensure knowledge of and compliance of integrity and company policies.  Geographic scope: Zone (could be a territory within Zone)  Qualifications/Requirements：  Minimum 5 years relevant healthcare industry experience  Bachelor's degree  A proven track-record of achieving and exceeding sales targets, and a desire to grow new business  Experience understanding customer needs and business drivers and using this knowledge to develop account plans and strategies (knowledge of the existing account areas/channels would be advantageous)  .Excellent interpersonal skills, including teamwork and communication skills  Persistence in developing prospects and customers, and ability to close business  Strong presentation, analytical and customer service skills  Self-starter, able to manage time and organize and prioritize workload  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support. description: Sales Development Representative - Remote (China)  App Annie is always looking for extraordinary candidates with Mobile, SaaS, analytics background and we'd love to get to know you! We do not have any current openings for a Sales Development Representative in this location, however, in the event that a position opens up, we'd love for you to be the first person to know! Below is what we traditionally look for:  Something About Us...  App Annie is the industry’s most trusted mobile data and analytics platform. Our mission is to help customers create winning mobile experiences and achieve excellence. We created the mobile app data market and are committed to delivering the industry’s most complete mobile performance offering. We are headquartered in San Francisco with 12 offices worldwide. More than 1,200 enterprise clients and 1 million registered users across the globe and spanning all industries rely on App Annie as the standard to revolutionize their mobile business.  Along with a market defining product, we take great pride in our culture and values and strive to embody them daily! We set a high bar for our success and have made Excellence as our our standard, hold each other Accountable, continuously push Innovation and Win with Style.  What can you tell your friends when they ask you what you do?  “I serve as the first point of contact of many of App Annie’s future clients across the mobile app industry to make sure they understand the value of our data, and how it can be applied to make better business decisions”.  This role reports to the Global Director in San Francisco. The ideal candidate will have experience working closely with marketing operations, understand the importance of MQL (marketing qualified leads), and be fully committed to meeting SLA’s around responding to inbound leads. The ideal candidate should also have knowledge of outbound marketing, including familiarity with video pitches, building outreach sequences, utilizing LinkedIn, and other modern SDR tools. Comfortable working with inbound, and outbound in order to drive pipeline and drive growth.  You will be responsible for and take pride in... Passion for activity, and high energy Competitive spirit, and focus on winning Highly coachable, and passionate about learning and self-improvement Desires feedback, and passion to excel in customer facing role Maniacal focus on SFDC hygiene (calls, activity, lead disqualification, notes) Familiarity with google suite of tools, and outreach High volume of calls Creativity and execution of email drip campaigns as needed Willingness and desire to have and be part of global meetings and other time zones Consistently achieving and exceeding monthly goals High business acumen, passion to solve problems and understand why things matter for the customer You should recognize yourself in the following… Bachelor’s degree required Excellent communications skills both in native language & English, both written and oral Experience with Salesforce required Strong presentation skills Demonstrated success in achieving sales goals Must have excellent verbal & written communication skills Must be a creative solutions thinker who can drive sales success Must be detail oriented and flexible An entrepreneurial spirit with a can-do positive attitude Ability to adapt on the fly to new challenges Doesn’t take oneself too seriously, and have a sense of humor Bias for action, and results oriented Competitive, and highly positive attitude This is what we offer... We provide a WFH allowance to set you up for remote work success. Internet allowance for stable internet connection, so your video does not freeze on Zoom. Flexible working days. We love to meet, but if you need to get your kids behind school-zoom, need to leave early to get to your band repetition or gym classes, do your thing. Paid leave, so long as you promise to come back! Health and dental benefits. An international team of talented and engaged people from different cultural backgrounds and locations. Wellbeing allowance for any activity that matters to your wellbeing; (online) gym classes, fitness equipment, mindfulness apps or even childcare support! Unlimited access to online learning platform Udemy to help you develop your skills. Virtual initiatives and events to keep you connected with your colleagues. Yes, I want this job!
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Internet

description: About us We've created the world's premier recommendation system for peer-reviewed scholarly content. When a site joins our network, we gather information on reader behavior on that site. Then we use that data to recommend other articles that person might like. If you've ever seen the recommended links by a scientific paper online, that's us.  Our goal is reducing the time it takes for new discoveries to permeate the research world. With well over 2 million scholarly articles published each year, finding relevant research can take far too long on its own — and in that gap lies preventable suffering from curable medical conditions. We're not a startup. We've been profitable for over a decade, and we're still growing. Our overarching goal is to apply new technologies to problems that affect billions of humans. Everything we do points toward our north star, and our organizational culture is no different. We value clear communication, constant curiosity, and advancement based on respect and merit, not politics.  Expect talented, motivated co-workers from over 36 countries on 6 continents, all united by a performance-driven, egalitarian Silicon Valley mindset. You'll enjoy the freedom to schedule your own hours, with a high value placed on uninterrupted work time -- we ruthlessly cancel any meeting that could have been resolved by text message.  About the role We're looking for a China-based Sales Operations role with a few all-important character traits: Candor: You value honesty and problem-solving over the appearance of politeness. You're not afraid of confrontation, but understand the value of each interaction. People respect you because you use candor as a tool to build them up, not a weapon to break them down. Conscientiousness: You genuinely like other people. In particular, you understand that the people who work with you are more than disposable assets. You aspire to be an unblocker, working to help others succeed and trusting them to return the favor. First-principles thinking: You're allergic to dogma, habitually question institutional knowledge, and never fall back on "common sense" to explain anything. You make your decisions based on credible evidence. You don't start working on any project unless you can explain why you're doing it.  Tenacious, data-driven, and client focused, this role is much more about mindset than experience.  We are looking for a candidate that is bold, has creative willpower, and possesses the ability to seize the initiative. Gathering and analyzing metrics will be as important as being a face for the agency, and building new partnerships that help optimize revenue streams. Ultimately, you’ll become a central source of knowledge who can help anyone on the team make informed decisions.  The Sales Operations role will build processes to bring in new Chinese clients. By tracking our sales operation in as much detail as possible, you'll become a clearinghouse for information on what we do well and what can be done better. You will pass relevant information to clients to help them feel fully briefed and in control of their campaigns.  Our perfect candidate in a Sales Operations role is a gifted networker, a compulsive goal-setter, and a natural at taking unforeseen issues in stride. You use analysis to determine the correct direction and push through until you reach the destination. A proven track record of building relationships in advertising, publishing, or SaaS would set you apart from other candidates.  Responsibilities Prepare readership data spreadsheets and reports for clients Ensure that all items are invoiced and collected on time Familiarize yourself with our product and our admin dashboard Set up and maintain campaigns for clients Support finance and HR departments with their work Offload any other miscellaneous work required to keep sales and account management productive Be the backbone of the administrative operations  Ideal candidates have Comfort with ambiguity — you can set priorities without needing to be directed Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English Strong analytical and quantitative powers A focus on detail, with extremely strong organizational skills  You should include these in your application A PDF of your CV in English shared via URL LinkedIn profile URL A cover letter shared via URL will cause us to prioritize your application  Send materials to: careers@trendmd.com  Seniority: Entry-level Employment type: Contract Job function: Contributor

jobTitle: Oral Care Solutions Inside Sales Representative-1
description: 3M has a long-standing reputation as a company committed to innovation. We provide the freedom to explore and encourage curiosity and creativity. We gain new insight from diverse thinking, and take risks on new ideas. Here, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter.  Job Description  3M is seeking an Inside Sales Representative within China BSO supporting Oral Care Division (Dental Market) located in 3M Shanghai Office  Job Summary  The position of Inside Sales Rep, 3M Oral Care Division (Dental Market) will be required to establish and maintain 3M customer relationships including driving sales growth through inside sales, handling customer questions (in calls) and up selling and cross selling strategically aligned products (prevention category) to a prioritized set of dental offices. Utilizing detailed product knowledge to provide technical assistance to customers and assist them in identifying products to meet their needs. Meet monthly set goals through sales forecast, customer interactions, and data gathering. Teaming with territory reps and key account managers to meet forecast as well as gain customer insight and uncover potential sales opportunities. Ongoing personal growth through training, trade shows, and other learning opportunities will help in gaining insight into future career.  Primary Responsibilities include but are not limited to the following: Grow Oral Care Division Prevention Products through inside sales. Achieve forecast attainment. Attain set outbound call activity and completed sales activities. Record all required data into data management systems. Manage identified call activities. Develop and maintain relationships within Dental Market Customers. Act as product and procedure advisor to dental personnel via telephone, mailings, seminars/shows, etc... Continued personal growth through career planning and training Basic Qualifications Minimum of one year of combined experience in sales and/or operations. Bachelor's Degree Preferred Qualifications Proven inside sales experience Previous field experience in the areas of sales, marketing, or service in related industry Previous experience in managing medium and some larger complexity accounts Experience working with Salesforce.com or similar CRM Excellent verbal and written communications skills Strong listening and presentation skills Excellent in Mandarin, basic in English Basic PC, MS Office skills 口腔护理内部销售– 业务支持部门  职位描述：  支持口腔护理业务（齿科市场）， 通过电话及线上沟通方式建立和维护3M客户关系，以带动口腔护理业务的销售增长，解决客户的问题，升级销售及交叉销售部门策略产品于优先的齿科诊所。利用专业的产品知识为顾客提供技术上的支持，根据客户的需求推荐相关产品。 通过销售预测，与顾客互动，和数据收集达成每月销售目标。与区域销售代表，大客户经理共同协作，达成销售预计，同时进行客户洞察，发现潜在的销售机会。通过培训，展会以及其它学习机会加速个人成长，更好地规划个人职业发展。  基本职责（包括但不仅限于以下职责）:  提高口腔护理部门预防产品销量 达成预期销售目标 完成电话拜访及各项业务活动 在管理系统中录入所有需要的数据 管理电话拜访活动 维护、发展齿科产品市场客户关系 通过电话、邮件、视频、网络会议等形式向齿科人员提供指导 通过职业规划及培训推进个人持续成长  基本要求：  一年以上销售或运营相关工作经验 本科学历  期望条件：  有内部销售经验 相关企业的销售、市场或服务领域的工作经历 有管理中型客户或大型客户的经验 具有操作salesforce.com, CRM等类似系统的经验 优秀的口头和书面交流技巧 良好的听力和演讲技巧 普通话良好，具有基本的英语表达能力 基本的计算机和Office操作技巧  Learn more about 3M’s creative solutions to the world’s problems at www.3M.com or on Twitter @3M. description: Job Description Summary  As an Indirect Sales, You will lead and coach Channel Partners to drive growth of his/her assigned GEHC product portfolio, drive financial results, ensure compliance and be accountable for keeping risk profile within the region norms and standards. It's a role that will work closely with the Region, Zone and P&L commercial leaders and teams to deliver appropriate and effective channel strategies and support programs.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description Primary Responsibilities Financial performance1. Own and deliver financial performance for Channel Partner portfolio2. Identify target end user accounts and create account plans in conjunction with Channel Partner3. Create and/or maintain Channel Partner specific business plans and set G&OsChannel Partner Effectiveness1. Analyze territories and maintain in conjunction with region leadership and marketing appropriate coverage models2. Identify potential Channel Partners, recruit, qualify and facilitate thru appointment process including gaining necessary approvals/P&L support3. On-board Channel Partner as per checklist and coordinate with respective P&Ls4. Train channel partner sales force & coordinate with P&L product certification programs5. Apply methodology to evaluate Channel Partner effectiveness6. Share leads, manage opportunities and pipeline7. Optimize channel partner portfolio; leverage synergies across GEHC8. Embrace and implement Channel Partner management best practicesCompliance1. Create a culture of highest integrity and compliance within Channel Partner. 2. Enforce global compliance standards, collaborate with compliance manager to perform due diligence activitiesLeading Channel Development1. Maintain relationships with the senior management/owners within the Channel Partner and their sales team2. Manage relationships on day-to-day basis and provide transactional support3. Act as business development coach to grow the Channel Partner capability.4. Simplify the point of contact between GEHC and Channel Partner and proactively align internal GE resources to support Channel Partner5. Introduce and coordinate delivery of GEHC Channel Partner support programs and commitments6. Schedule joint sales calls with Channel Partner & relevant GE commercial teams as opportunities to coach and maintain relationships with the customer decision makersCoordinating internal support for the Channel partner1. Analyzes, identifies, and communicates the internal and external resource needs of the Channel partner2. Coordinate internal GE resources to support and grow the Channel partner3. Continuously keep both region and P&L leaders updated on the status and progress of the channel partner  Qualifications/Requirements  Qualifications:1. Bachelor degree or above2. At least 3 - 5 years’ experience in Healthcare related sales or marketing with solid account management methodology exposure3. Strong business finance knowledge4. Successful experience in multi-stakeholder environment5. High ethics and integrity6. Fluent English and local language speaking7. Strong contracts, legal, commercial & negotiation skills8. Proven coordination and influencing skills to set and drive an agenda with third parties9. Customer focused mindset with proven ability to respond quickly to internal and external customer needs10. Ability to build rapport, energize and influence people11. Analytical with strong ability to assimilate complex data and simplify solutions12. Interpersonal flexibility and toleranceQuality Specific Goals1. Be aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position2. Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required4. Maintain knowledge of and understand all applicable Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare HIPPA Guidelines, NEMA Regulations, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Local/ Int’l Law is broken. 5. Maintain knowledge of and understand all applicable Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or local / Int’l Law is broken.6. description: Job Description  Applause empowers leading brands to deliver flawless digital experiences for their customers on any device, in every location. The company’s testing, feedback and research solutions enable businesses to delight customers, drive topline revenue and innovate faster.  Applause ensures digital quality for websites, mobile apps, IoT products and in-store interactions in a way no other approach can - via its technology platform and managed global community of over 550,000 on-demand digital experience experts. Only real people on real devices in real locations can provide the real issues and feedback that brands need to deliver great digital customer experiences. Thousands of companies of every size - including Google, FOX, Nike, BMW, PayPal and Slack - rely on Applause to dramatically decrease the time and cost of delivering great digital experiences for their customers.  To help us grow the APAC market, we are looking for a:  Business Development Representative (m/f/x)  As a Business Development Rep (BDR), you will act as the first contact for many Applause prospects with the objective of assisting our field sales team in selling products and services. Must be highly competitive with the ability to collaborate in a team environment, possess strong interpersonal and communicative skills.  The BDR is responsible for partnering with the Sales organization in driving the early stages of the sales cycle and to help in New Customer Acquisition. The Enterprise BDR team also works closely with the marketing team to follow-up on marketing campaigns/events/conferences/seminars.  Responsibilities: Generate outbound qualified opportunities per quarter within target industry accounts- each opportunity should contain: Diagnosis of the prospect’s business pains, Applause’s solution identification, and understanding of prospects’ infrastructure, timelines and budgets. Act as the single point of contact for all inbound calls/requests for the assigned region, qualify these opportunities and pass to the relevant Enterprise Account Manager Support the internal industry or solution specific marketing campaigns and events in the region. Work with the Enterprise Account Manager team to identify accounts and do extensive territory planning for the assigned regions. Also conduct prospect research within focused industry verticals. Ability to develop a ‘Why Applause, Why Now’ proposition for each prospect interaction as well as a close cooperation with the sales team to identify and follow up on new leads/opportunities. Ongoing and precise record keeping and forecasting within the sales database, SalesForce.com CRM as well as the ability to make use of prospecting support tools such as Linkedln, Data.com, Hoovers, etc. Conduct targeted and non-targeted account prospecting and qualification via different channels Achieve monthly, quarterly and yearly pipeline and forecast goals and defined objectives that our field sales team can convert into qualified opportunities. Develop, present and implement plans to your manager for acquiring new business and traction in your assigned area - including activity breakdowns, performance milestones and resource requirements.  Qualifications Has successfully executed prospecting/new Account Development campaigns in the local regions. Has experience in the Enterprise, SaaS, Cloud or High Tech Industries Eloquent and self-confident communicator comfortable speaking with C level contacts Experience and understanding of the SaaS, Cloud Computing and related services Can express their ideas in persuasive emails and other written communications Creativity to think outside the box and leadership to execute effectively Minimum 1 years of sales, telesales or marketing experience running outbound enterprise B2B demand generation and lead generation activities in Enterprise/SaaS/Cloud Excellent written and verbal communication skills with an ability to influence others. Conveys a sense of urgency and drives issues to closure. Mature and confident with strong interpersonal skills and a true team player. Self-motivated, driven and dynamic personality. Attention to details, forecasting lead goals Bachelor’s degree preferred Fluent Mandarin/English Preferably based in Shanghai  Applause is a place where everyone belongs and where we believe everyone deserves the exceptional. Since our founding, we have continued to celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment. We have a global workforce that, like our crowd, embraces diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and abilities. Our employees bring their true self to Applause. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race, color, religion, national origin, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, veteran status, genetic information, disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. If you are qualified to perform the essential functions of this role, but believe you require a reasonable accommodation to do so, please email adaaccommodations@applause.com. Please be sure to include the role you are applying for and the nature of the reasonable accommodation you are seeking in your email.

description: Job Description Summary  As a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance1. Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory.  2. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management1. Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing.2. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures.3. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS.4. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management1. Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. 2. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales.3. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation.  4. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations.5. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff.6. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs.7. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. 8. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets.GE Product & Market awareness1. Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products.2. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs.3. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition.Compliance1. Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes2. Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required.  Qualifications / Requirements  1. Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience.  2. 2 years of strategic sales experience.  3. 2 years experience in healthcare.  4. Proven key account management and project planning skills.  5. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise  6. Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact.  Quality Specific Goals1. Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position2. Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required4. Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies 5. Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken 6. Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System.  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. description: Overview  Waters, the world's leading specialty measurement company that cares about inclusion and diversity is seeking for a Sales Development Specialist to support the very successful growth of our businesses across East China . Waters deliver benefits through innovation and people that enable customer success in the life, materials and food sciences. People create the Waters difference. By engaging with our talented and diverse workforce we continuously evolve, develop and enhance our products. We believe in delivering innovative technology and system solutions to our valued customers to enable their success. Our talented application teams have over the years delivered great and sustainable technical solution.  As Sales Development Specialist, this role will focus on sales supporting and marketing activities implementation. You will be required to team work with cross-functional departments such as Marketing, Service, Sales, ect. to boost Waters business in local territories. Your knowledge in technology and working experience in analytical chemistry lab are strongly expected to make Waters Customer Success. This position would cover the East China region.  Responsibilities Sales supporting such as customer co-visiting, documents generation, solution presentation, etc. Provide application consultancy services and technical support to end users both in the area of liquid chromatography and Mass Spectrometer. Conduct or support local seminars, marketing events and solution demonstration on the customer sites. Plan, localize and implement diversified business development programs according to program codes in related industries. Work closely with sales to achieve and exceed business goals. Team work with Marketing, Service and Sales teams to collect, evaluate, and forecast the local business data. Qualifications  Education: Bachelors Degree, Masters, or PhD in scientific area such as chemistry, biology, or biochemistry Experience 3+ years chromatography experience. UPLC, Mass Spec, field sales and/or marketing experience is a plus Skills Action oriented and eager to achieve results Sound communication and presentation skills Highly organized / well-prepared / time management skills Strong interactive skills and a good listener Matured disposition, positive attitude and strong sense of commitment Adaptive to a dynamic and ever-changing environment Strong technical background in analytical technologies, especially LC and MS Company Description  Waters Corporation (NYSE: WAT), the world's leading specialty measurement company, has pioneered chromatography, mass spectrometry and thermal analysis innovations serving the life, materials, and food sciences for more than 60 years. With more than 7,000 employees worldwide, Waters operates directly in 35 countries, including 15 manufacturing facilities, with products available in more than 100 countries. Our team focuses on creating business advantages for laboratory-dependent organizations to enable significant advancement in healthcare delivery, environmental management, food safety, and water quality.  Working at Waters enables our employees to unlock the potential of their careers. Our global team is driven by purpose. We strive to be better, learn and improve every day in everything we do. We’re the problem solvers and innovators that aren’t afraid to take risks to transform the world of human health and well-being. We’re all in it together delivering benefit as one to provide the insights needed today in order to solve the challenges of tomorrow.

Developing in-depth knowledge of sales territory, product lines, markets, sales processes or customer groups. Uses prior experience and acquired commercial expertise to execute policy/strategy. In-depth understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. In-depth understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. Most decisions are within a defined framework, but some autonomy in the final decisions for a project, product line, market, sales process or customers. Uses prior experience and on-the-job training to solve straightforward tasks. Has access to technical skills and analytic thinking required to solve problems. May use multiple internal sources outside of own team to arrive at decisions. A job at this level is likely to be an individual contributor, with proven interpersonal skills. Communication with direct colleagues and the business about design and coordination services rendered. Provides informal guidance to new team members. Explains complex information to others in straightforward situations.  Required Qualifications  This role requires advanced experience in the Sales & Channel Sales. Knowledge level is comparable to a Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college ( or a high school diploma with relevant experience).  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: Job Description Summary  Job Description SummaryAs a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance1. Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory.  2. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management1. Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing.2. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures.3. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS.4. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management1. Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. 2. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales.3. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation.  4. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations.5. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff.6. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs.7. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. 8. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets.GE Product & Market awareness1. Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products.2. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs.3. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition.Compliance1. Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes2. Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required.  Qualifications / Requirements  1. Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience.  2. 2 years of strategic sales experience.  3. 2 years experience in healthcare.  4. Proven key account management and project planning skills.  5. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise  6. Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact.  Quality Specific Goals1. Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position2. Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required4. Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies 5. Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken 6. Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System.  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.       Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.  Job Description  Roles and Responsibilities  within a geographic area responsible for selling product(s), services, parts, solutions, or projects Broadening knowledge of own sales territory, product lines, markets, sales processes or customer groups to execute policy/strategy. Still acquiring higher level knowledge and skills. Basic understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. Good understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. May have some autonomy to make decisions within a defined framework. Resolves issues in situations that require commercial knowledge and judgment within established procedures. Consults more senior team members for issues outside of defined instructions/parameters. A job at this level requires good interpersonal skills. Communication with direct colleagues and the business about design and coordination services rendered. For customer facing roles, develops strong customer relationships and serves as the interface between customer and GE. Explains technical information to others.  Required Qualifications  For roles outside of the USA- This role requires basic experience in the Sales & Sales. Knowledge level is comparable to a Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college ( or a high school diploma with relevant experience). For roles in USA - Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma / GED with at least 6 years of experience in Job Family Group(s)/Function(s)).  Desired Characteristics  Strong oral and written communication skills. Ability to document, plan, market, and execute programs.   Note:  To comply with US immigration and other legal requirements, it is necessary to specify the minimum number of years’ experience required for any role based within the USA. For roles outside of the USA, to ensure compliance with applicable legislation, the JDs should focus on the substantive level of experience required for the role and a minimum number of years should NOT be used.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: GV-VERSACE Fuzhou Grand Classic  Sales Associate  At Capri, we are all responsible for creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We try to inspire change and growth within each other and believe success is a result that comes from our differences. Capri is proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to inclusivity regardless of age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic characteristics, race, color, creed, religion, ethnicity, national origin, alienage, citizenship, disability, marital status, military status, pregnancy, or any other legally-recognized protected basis prohibited by applicable law. M/D/F/V
industries: Luxury Goods & Jewelry, Apparel & Fashion, and Retail

description: BASF has been a committed partner to Greater China since 1885. With large production sites in Shanghai, Nanjing and Chongqing, as well as a global and regional research and development hub in Shanghai, BASF is a major foreign investor in the country’s chemical industry. BASF posted sales of approximately €8.5 billion in 2020 to customers in Greater China and employed 8,948 people as of the end of the year. For further information, please visit www.basf.com/cn/en.  Objectives Further enhance and grow market share of BASF’s Animal Nutrition business in China Promote and grow the performance ingredients market share in China Enhance access to market intelligence in performance ingredients Act as entry point for young talents in China into the Animal Nutrition business Main Tasks Responsible to position and sell BASF ENL portfolio to customers in the Chinese feed industry Provide support to internal project, promotion, and marketing activity in China to promote ENL’s gut health portfolio actively. Identify customer needs, including product application, services requirements, buying cycles, delivery schedules and pricing structure within the appropriate business segment. Act as key point of contact to the customer to coordinate technical support needed to build strong customer relationship Collect competition and market information Analyze existing sales, identify growth potential with new and existing customers, and manage opportunities pro-actively via SalesForce with the team Support supervisors in sales forecasting, market event and project handling. Coordinate and work with technical/ customer services/ logistic personnel to solve customer complaints Contract and payment receivable management Make sure that DSO targets are met. Conclude sales contracts by coordinating the personnel of customer services, logistics and supply chain colleagues and make sure DIV on BG. Maintain up-to-date awareness of industry trends, technical development, market activities and industry intelligence to help define the marketability of products and report to supervisor identified trends that could affect targets. Requirements Education: Bachelor’s in business administration, agriculture, or animal nutrition Working Experience: 1-2year work experience in sales service with data analysis experience. Experience in animal nutrition is preferred Skills: Fluent in English and Chinese (verbal and writing) with a strong business acumen and passion for customer interaction. Primary Location  CN-Shanghai-Shanghai  Job  Sales / Technical Sales  Ongoing  For BASF, diversity is one of the essential keys to business success and the well-being of our employees. We promote an inclusive culture that accepts the diversity of people, experiences and capabilities. Join the team and connect with more than 117,000 other minds. Stay alert for possible recruitment fraud!  This can include fake websites, fake job offers, or contact from a person falsely claiming to represent BASF.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Financial Services

description: 3M has a long-standing reputation as a company committed to innovation. We provide the freedom to explore and encourage curiosity and creativity. We gain new insight from diverse thinking, and take risks on new ideas. Here, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter.  Job Description  Achieves sales objectives by providing independent sales coverage of assigned accounts or within assigned territory. Position intended for individuals who have basic sales experience and have demonstrated ability to apply basic selling skills. Manages sales territory with regular supervision. When necessary, requests or receives assistance in handling situations which require either greater or different experience or knowledge.  Learn more about 3M’s creative solutions to the world’s problems at www.3M.com or on Twitter @3M.  Please note: your application may not be considered if you do not provide your education and work history, either by: 1) uploading a resume, or 2) entering the information into the application fields directly.  3M Global Terms of Use and Privacy Statement  Carefully read these Terms of Use before using this website. Your access to and use of this website and application for a job at 3M are conditioned on your acceptance and compliance with these terms.  Please access the linked document by clicking here, select the country where you are applying for employment, and review. Before submitting your application you will be asked to confirm your agreement with the terms.
industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services, and Consumer Goods

description: A Sales Manager supports the Sales Team through analysis and reporting of results and trends, recommends sales approaches to expand and add business, and develops the skills and culture of the Sales Team Members.  What will I be doing?  Responsibilities  Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards  As Sales Manager, you will be responsible for working closely with the Sales Team to analyse market trends, report results and develop a Sales Team to execute the selling strategy and achieve business objectives. Analyse local market trends and develop new business leads Maximise all Revenue opportunities Contribute to the selling strategy of the hotel, and manage the departments' adherence to achieving that strategy Understand the competitive market place and implement approaches to ensure the hotel stays ahead in the local market Negotiate room rates/packages with corporate clients Ensure the Sales Team Members are developed effectively and generate a culture of high quality standards and pro-active selling Develop and implement creative local marketing channels including social media sites Work within current business strategies and recognise potential opportunities Communicate with all departments as required within each hotel Attend Sales events when required Report on a weekly/monthly basis appointments, calls made, and list of business leads Answer customer queries in a timely and suitable manner What are we looking for?  Skills  To successfully fill this role, you should maintain the attitude, behaviours, skills, and values that follow  A Sales Manager serving Hilton brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members. Positive attitude and good communication skills Commitment to delivering a high level of customer service Excellent grooming standards Excellent organisational and planning skills Flexibility to respond to a range of different work situations Ability to work under pressure and under own initiative Previous experience in sales role with the ability to close a sale It would be advantageous in this position for you to demonstrate the following capabilities and distinctions: Knowledge of local market Strong leadership skills, whereas it is evident that you can effectively manage and motivate a team to perform beyond expectations Strong analytical skills so to understand key business indicators and competitive trends and develop approaches to these challenges Business degree, or any relevant qualification, would be advantageous What will it be like to work for Hilton?  Hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. For nearly a century, Hilton has offered business and leisure travelers the finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. Our vision “to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality” unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. And, our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all!  Work Locations  Hilton Hainan Ocean Flower Island  Schedule  Full-time  Brand  Hilton Hotels & Resorts  Shift  Day Job  Job Level  Manager  Job  Sales
industries: Restaurants, Food & Beverages, and Hospitality

description: Job Description Summary  As the channel sales leader, you will be responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  向合作伙伴和分销商销售或通过其进行销售。可能包括渠道销售支持和渠道开发职责。 扩大自己对销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群体的认识，以执行政策/策略。不断培养更高水平的知识和技能。 理解关键业务驱动力的基础知识；用这种理解来完成自己的工作。了解自己团队的工作如何与其他团队融合并为该领域做出贡献。 可能具有一定的自主权，从而在定义的框架内进行决策。以良好的商业知识和判断力解决在规定程序中遇到的问题。就定义的说明/参数之外的问题咨询更多的高级团队成员。 此级别的职位需要良好的人际交往能力。向直接相关的同事和业务部门传达所提供的设计和协调服务。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。向他人介绍技术信息。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够独立工作。较强的解决问题能力。  Inclusion and Diversity   GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support. description: Job Description Summary  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Execute within a well defined sales/commercial framework. There is generally a step by step sequence of standard tasks which need to be followed to achieve an end result. Work is typically subject to tight oversight. This may be in form of human or systems checking. May be responsible for supporting targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small sales territories.  Job Description  角色与职责  向指定客户销售时，新增客户通常很少，并且通常需要经过审查。包括单个业务组/P&L 中的关键客户 发展自身所学学科内的概念性知识。了解自己的销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群。可能包括具有广泛领域内专业知识或技术知识的支持角色。 应用从教育或过去的经验中发展的业务常识。了解自己团队的工作如何为该地区做出贡献。 使用规定程序解决问题。向主管或更多高级团队成员咨询定义的说明/参数之外的问题。 与他人合作解决问题。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。交流技术信息，提出问题并检查理解程度。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够独立工作。较强的解决问题能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No

description: Job Purpose and Impact  The Sales Representative will participate in face-to- face and remote selling to our new and existing customers, selling directly or indirectly through various sales channels. We seek a results-oriented professional who, with guidance, will help assess customer needs and suggest appropriate products, services and solutions.  销售代表将直接或间接地通过各种销售渠道，以面对面或远程销售方式，为我们的新客户和现有客户提供销售服务。我们寻找一个以结果为导向的专业销售，他将协助评估客户需求，进而提出适当的产品、服务和解决方案。  Key Accountabilities 协助销售产品展示并提出销售建议，参与产品演示介绍。 协助识别潜在客户，与客户保持沟通并建立合作关系，促进销售业务增长。 掌握基本的产品知识与特性，了解基本市场形势，刺激客户的产品需求，推动销售增长。 计划安排日常销售活动，包括客户访问，达成销售相关定量和定性目标。 密切关注市场变动和竞争动态，及时将信息传递给高级管理人员。 您将在主管指导下工作，处理基本问题，特别复杂的问题要汇报给高级团队成员处理。 其他分配的职责 Qualifications 2年以上食品行业研发或者销售经验 （优秀毕业生亦可） 本科及以上学历 英语会简单读写

description: About Snapmaker  Snapmaker is a team of passionate and talented people dedicated to empowering everyone with advanced digital fabrication technologies, from 3D printing to laser cutting and CNC carving. With our passion and perseverance, we believe that making will be as easy as taking photos in the coming decades.  Our journey began in August 2016. We launched our first crowdfunding project and raised over $2 million. In 2019, our second crowdfunding project for Snapmaker 2.0 3 in 1 3D Printer raised $7.8 million in 30 days and became the most funded Technology project in Kickstarter. In 2021, we raised millions of dollars from Series A funding. Currently, we are rapidly expanding our product range and global channel network, serving clients in consumer, education, and professional sectors.  Our Team Culture  We are makers ourselves, and hope to enable more people to make good use of the fabrication tools in their daily life. With this mission, we value the application of engineering; believe in positive outcomes brought by tinkering; never leave out details that determine user experience. maintain close and transparent communications with our users so that we can create what they need  What you will be doing  Develop an extensive regional sales channel by recruiting channel partners in consumer, education, and professional sectors Manage channel network and cultivate a long-term trusted relationship with channel partners Support and enable channel partners to effectively market our products with high-quality service through training, consultation, and strategic planning Engage in channel marketing such as participating in trade shows, coordinating partner’s marketing events, and allocating market development budget Research regional market and gather market intelligence for our marketing approach and strategic plan  What we are looking for  Fluent in English and Mandarin Good interpersonal, presentation, and negotiation skills Familiar with cross-culture communication and coordination, with strong cultural empathy Deep understanding of American culture and consumer behavior, with global vision Self-driven, passionate, responsible, adaptive and result-oriented Willing to travel between North America and China after the end of pandemic (3-4 times a year, mostly based in Shenzhen)  Even better if you have  Several years of study/work experience in America Worked in 3D printing/digital fabrication/STEAM/robotics industry  What we can offer Dynamic, youthful, and friendly work environment Comprehensive onboarding program and mentorship Personal development and training fund Internal knowledge sharing and a study culture Loads of 3D printers to play with and life-long makers to guide you Fun time (dining, sports, party, travel, etc.) Competitive salary and stock options
