description: Job Description Summary  Responsible for creating and winning sales opportunities for their products/solutions/services in an assigned territory, and/or in a list of named accounts individually or as part of a One GE Healthcare team. Act as the clinical/technical expert to establish and continuously develop the relationship with departmental and technical decision makers in their assigned accounts and where applicable work in conjunction with Account Executives and Managers to gain access to C-Suite decision makers.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Key responsibilities include (but are not limited to):  Support field sales team to sell the HCS equipment and business solutions to customers within Area. Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for Modality sales team, product team& field sales team. Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE. Prepare and co-ordinate tender response and validate tender documentation in collaboration with territory manager. Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers. Assist the territory manager with post sale follow up in order to ensure customer satisfaction.  Required Qualifications:  More than 5 years working experience, preferably in medical industry, either as commercial role, technical or clinical role. Excellent communication skills, both internally and externally Strong interpersonal acumen, be able to build up solid relationship with people Team working skills (including ability to harness resources to achieve goal). Good command of English both in oral and written Good business acumen, sensitivity to the dynamics in market place, with good strategic thinking capacity; Good presentation skills Bachelor and above degree, preferably in Clinical Medical background  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No

description: Job Description Summary 你将负责管理和开展公司指定区域指定产品线的分销商关系，完善渠道和区域管理，同时达到市场占有份额目标，以完成规定的区域和客户的销售指标和利润目标。GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Essential Responsibilities  • 在指定的区域内完成公司下达的销售指标；  • 执行公司的市场策略和销售政策；  • 为分销商提供产品支持，协助分销商达成销售指标；  • 在指定的区域开发/建立并维护良好的分销经营渠道；  • 建立和维护客户的长期关系，提高客户的满意度；  • 利用销售工具收集/分析所在区域的市场情况，寻找潜在的机会，提供准确的市场预测；  • 开展和组织所负责区域的市场推广和销售活动；  Qualifications/Requirements  • 大学本科或以上学历，医学，临床背景优先；  • 3年以上医疗器械/耗材分销商管理经验或直接销售经验；  • 高度诚信和敬业精神，遵守公司相关规定；  • 较强的市场开拓和沟通能力及优秀的谈判技巧；  • 能用英语阅读专业资料并写作，熟练操作电脑；  • 卓越的对内对外沟通技能；  • 团队工作的技能（包括寻找和利用各种资源达成目标的能力）  • 良好的演讲技能  • 能够承受相应压力，并拥有自我学习的意愿和能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. description: Working at Stella McCartney is a truly rewarding experience. As a luxury fashion company with a strong ethical standpoint we are leaders and innovators in our industry.  职位名称：店铺销售直属上级：店铺副经理/店铺经理职位主要工作内容：向客人提供优质服务，努力完成销售目标。销售目标：向客人提供详细的货品介绍及优质的服务 努力完成销售指标 不断提高客户对品牌的满意度销售行政：认真仔细地核对每天销售及库存商品的账目 严格遵守公司的各项规章制度货品管理：确保货品安全，避免货品失窃及其他损失情况的发生  We welcome people with disabilities and endeavour to make reasonable adjustments, if you do require such adjustments please let us know within 48 hours of your interview.  At Stella McCartney, we like to be bold. For us this means challenging ourselves and the wider industry in which we operate. As part of our commitments to inclusive fashion, we have an ambitious strategy to put diversity, equity and inclusion at the centre of everything we do. Our starting point is to create a workplace where different voices are respected, heard and empowered in equal measure regardless of factors such as culture and backgrounds, and to influence and disrupt fashion and other industries by providing opportunities for global diverse talent to shine.

description: Sales Agent  Full time. Salary: Uncapped Commission  Welcome to Icy May Fashion, which is an e-platform. We believe that you should live your dreams. Our corporate head-office is located in Guangzhou, China We are currently growing but at present we have operations in Taiwan, Russia, Philippines and the UK.  We care about our clients, customers, employees and the communities. We serve and we value their differences.  We are committed to building a global dynamic fast pace diverse company. Bringing great Career opportunities globally.  Our focus is to bring our customers a constant stream of high-quality brands and trends at extraordinary savings. While constantly coming up with ways on how to provide value to our customer.   We believe that delivering a successful business strategy requires building a successful talent strategy and that our long-term growth will directly correlate to our ability to successfully recruit, engage, develop, and retain diverse talent that can invent, optimize, and deliver for our customers. The commission structure comes with very generous financial rewards and shares in the company as well. There is also is also room for progression within the company for the right candidate.  Icy May Fashion understand that sales plays a critical part in the development and growth of the company but not at the expense of the our brand, integrity and the people that we are serving. We are looking to recruit 8 new sales agents to join our fast pace, fast growing dynamic sales team.  Responsibilities  As an online sales agent your primary job will involve selling our products and services to customers. These customers can be sourced either online or offline.  You will also be responsible to respond to inquiries made over the internet and effectively meet sales targets.  To manage all sales activities generated from the internet including managing sales leads to closing business.  To check emails frequently, respond to queries immediately, and handle all internet inquiries in a professional manner by communicating with internet customers according to their preferred method of communication, whether by phone, email or in person.  To keep the IcyMay fashion website up-to-date, understanding the psychology of internet customers, and delivering a fast and easy buying experience to our customers  Basic Requirements  No formal education is required as we will provide full training. At least 1 year sales experience Strong computer skills, including e-mail, internet, Excel and Microsoft Word are also important.  Other prerequisites are effective communication, customer service and follow-through and organizational skills

We gain new insight from diverse thinking, and take risks on new ideas. Here, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter.  Job Description  3M has a long-standing reputation as a company committed to innovation. We provide the freedom to explore and encourage curiosity and creativity. We gain new insight from diverse thinking and take risks on new ideas. Here, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter.  内部销售– 业务支持部门  职位描述：  支持相关销售业务， 通过电话及线上沟通方式建立和维护3M客户关系，以带动业务增长/解决客户问题。利用专业的产品知识为顾客提供技术支持，并根据需求推荐相关产品。与区域销售代表/大客户经理共同协作，发现潜在的销售机会，达成每月销售目标。通过内部培训，外部展会等各种学习平台加速个人成长，规划个人职业发展。  基本职责（包括但不仅限于）:  完成个人及团队KPI，推动业务增长  提高leads到opportunity的转化率 支持售前售后，并根据需求参与demo 定期维护客户/经销商关系，发现潜在需求 收集并及时反馈市场和行业情况 持续的个人成长  要求：  本科及以上学历，有相关行业经验更佳 灵活聪明，主动性强，良好的交流能力/学习能力及团队协作 一年以上销售/电话销售/运营相关工作经验（部分division可以接受不满一年的） 熟悉sales force等相关客户管理软件 普通话良好，具有基本的英语表达能力 基础的PC/Office操作技巧  Job Description  3M is seeking an Inside Sales Representative within China business supporting located in 3M Shanghai Office  Job Summary  The position of Inside Sales Rep, will be required to establish and maintain 3M customer relationships including driving sales growth through inside sales, handling customer questions (in calls) and up selling and cross selling strategically. Utilizing detailed product knowledge to provide technical assistance to customers and assist them in identifying products to meet their needs. Meet monthly set goals through sales forecast, customer interactions, and data gathering. Teaming with territory reps and key account managers to meet forecast as well as gain customer insight and uncover potential sales opportunities. Ongoing personal growth through training, trade shows, and other learning opportunities will help in gaining insight into future career.  Include But Are Not Limited  Primary Responsibilities  Push business growth and contribute to target achievement. Improve the conversion from leads to opportunities Be a professional consultant of every core platform by providing pre-sales consulting and delivering engaged and persuasive demos Develop and maintain customer/dealer relationships though regular call Collect and understand market situations and competitive information Continued personal growth through career planning and training  Requirement  Bachelor's Degree or above, industrial experience is preferred Smart, good communication, highly motivated, quick learner, teamwork At least one-year sales/tele-sales/operation experience（less than one year will be accepted by some divisions） Being familiar with Salesforce is preferred Excellent in Mandarin, basic in English Basic PC, MS Office skills  Learn more about 3M’s creative solutions to the world’s problems at www.3M.com or on Twitter @3M.  Please note: your application may not be considered if you do not provide your education and work history, either by: 1) uploading a resume, or 2) entering the information into the application fields directly.  3M Global Terms of Use and Privacy Statement  Carefully read these Terms of Use before using this website. Your access to and use of this website and application for a job at 3M are conditioned on your acceptance and compliance with these terms.  Please access the linked document by clicking here, select the country where you are applying for employment, and review. Before submitting your application you will be asked to confirm your agreement with the terms.

description: 工作职责:  Job Description  Financial performance Own and deliver financial performance for Channel Partner portfolio Identify target end user accounts and create account plans in conjunction with Channel Partner Create and/or maintain Channel Partner specific business plans and set G&Os Channel Partner Effectiveness Analyze territories and maintain in conjunction with region leadership and marketing appropriate coverage models Identify potential Channel Partners, recruit, qualify and facilitate thru appointment process including gaining necessary approvals/P&L support On-board Channel Partner as per checklist and coordinate with respective P&Ls Train channel partner sales force & coordinate with P&L product certification programs Apply methodology to evaluate Channel Partner effectiveness Share leads, manage opportunities and pipeline Optimize channel partner portfolio; leverage synergies across GEHC Embrace and implement Channel Partner management best practices Compliance Create a culture of highest integrity and compliance within Channel Partner. Enforce global compliance standards, collaborate with compliance manager to perform due diligence activities Leading Channel Development Maintain relationships with the senior management/owners within the Channel Partner and their sales team Manage relationships on day-to-day basis and provide transactional support Act as business development coach to grow the Channel Partner capability. Simplify the point of contact between GEHC and Channel Partner and proactively align internal GE resources to support Channel Partner Introduce and coordinate delivery of GEHC Channel Partner support programs and commitments Schedule joint sales calls with Channel Partner & relevant GE commercial teams as opportunities to coach and maintain relationships with the customer decision makers Coordinating internal support for the Channel partner Analyzes, identifies, and communicates the internal and external resource needs of the Channel partner Coordinate internal GE resources to support and grow the Channel partner Continuously keep both region and P&L leaders updated on the status and progress of the channel partner 任职条件:  Qualifications  Qualifications/Requirements Bachelor degree or above At least 3 - 5 years’ experience in Healthcare related sales or marketing with solid account management methodology exposure Strong business finance knowledge Successful experience in multi-stakeholder environment High ethics and integrity Fluent English and local language speaking Strong contracts, legal, commercial & negotiation skills Proven coordination and influencing skills to set and drive an agenda with third parties Customer focused mindset with proven ability to respond quickly to internal and external customer needs Ability to build rapport, energize and influence people Analytical with strong ability to assimilate complex data and simplify solutions Interpersonal flexibility and tolerance Quality Specific Goals Be aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Maintain knowledge of and understand all applicable Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare HIPPA Guidelines, NEMA Regulations, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Local/ Int’l Law is broken. Maintain knowledge of and understand all applicable Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or local / Int’l Law is broken. Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. description: Position Summary Our Business Development Representatives are responsible for generating leads for our inside and field sales teams. Along with building new business for Infor, BDR’s also have the opportunity to nurture our existing customer base to drive additional revenue. BDR’s will get additional insight into our sales cycle, forecasting tools, and sales methodologies. As a BDR, you will generate qualified leads for our sales organization through social selling, e-mailing, and calling prospects and customers. You will consistently deliver our value proposition while gaining sales experience in a fun and collaborative environment. In this role you will use cutting edge marketing automation tools to prospect and nurture your sales leads. The role reports to the Senior Manager of Business Development based in London and the Team Lead in Shanghai (Mandarin speaking).  Your Responsibilities Include Tight alignment with the field sales organization in developing account plans and value proposition for our prospective customers Net new business opportunity and pipeline generation through outbound calling Multi-channel advanced prospecting within your target market – identification of the buyer persona and engagement through the phone, email and social media Leverage sales technology stack to achieve day to day activity goals and build a sustainable pipeline of opportunities Focus on opportunity quality - BDR owns the opportunity handover process with the field and the buyer BDR tracks and reports in a centralized way on interactions with our buyers and sales intelligence in the CRM Continuous feedback loop to Sales and Marketing on market intelligence gathered every day from our buyers Reporting on campaign performance and account-based prospecting Meet monthly and quarterly goals established for sales accepted opportunities and pipeline value Be part of the evolution of our global organization from day 1 and learn to navigate Meet monthly and quarterly goals established for sales accepted opportunities and pipeline value   Knowledge and Skills, You Bring to the Organization Language skills – Chinese and English (written English is a must; basic verbal English is a plus) Previous Business Development/Inside Sales experience in a B2B environment preferred Patience and excellent communication skills A team player with the ability to build strong peer and interpersonal relationships Upbeat, dynamic communicator. Flexible “can do” attitude Proficient PC Skills in Microsoft Office, exposure to CRM and sales prospecting tools a bonus Experience with prospecting methodologies preferred Ability to grasp concepts quickly, drive to succeed, and target/results driven   Why choose business development at Infor? Career growth opportunities (associate BDR →BDR → senior BDR → principal BDR (Team lead) / inside sales/ customer success…) and an employee performance-based culture in the fast-growing cloud company in the world. A world-class & multi-cultural BDR and management Team with a commitment to fun, competition, innovation, collaboration and integrity. Be an instrumental part of the growth engine of Infor, work with measurements that are linked to your impact on revenue. Develop your skills in working with multiple stakeholders around the world and contribute to the #One Infor culture. We offer Education Assistance Program to our employees to improve job-related skills, including language skills.

description: Job Description Summary  Job Description SummaryAs a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance1. Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory.  2. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management1. Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing.2. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures.3. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS.4. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management1. Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. 2. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales.3. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation.  4. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations.5. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff.6. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs.7. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. 8. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets.GE Product & Market awareness1. Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products.2. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs.3. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition.Compliance1. Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes2. Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required.  Qualifications / Requirements  1. Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience.  2. 2 years of strategic sales experience.  3. 2 years experience in healthcare.  4. Proven key account management and project planning skills.  5. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise  6. Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact.  Quality Specific Goals1. Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position2. Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required4. Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies 5. Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken 6. Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System.  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. description: About Snapmaker  Snapmaker is a team of passionate and talented people dedicated to empowering everyone with advanced digital fabrication technologies, from 3D printing to laser cutting and CNC carving. With our passion and perseverance, we believe that making will be as easy as taking photos in the coming decades.  Our journey began in August 2016. We launched our first crowdfunding project and raised over $2 million. In 2019, our second crowdfunding project for Snapmaker 2.0 3 in 1 3D Printer raised $7.8 million in 30 days and became the most funded Technology project in Kickstarter. In 2021, we raised millions of dollars from Series A funding. Currently, we are rapidly expanding our product range and global channel network, serving clients in consumer, education, and professional sectors.  Our Team Culture  We are makers ourselves, and hope to enable more people to make good use of the fabrication tools in their daily life. With this mission, we value the application of engineering; believe in positive outcomes brought by tinkering; never leave out details that determine user experience; maintain close and transparent communications with our users so that we can create what they need.  What you will be doing  Develop an extensive regional sales channel by recruiting channel partners in consumer, education, and professional sectors Manage channel network and cultivate a long-term trusted relationship with channel partners Support and enable channel partners to effectively market our products with high-quality service through training, consultation, and strategic planning Engage in channel marketing such as participating in trade shows, coordinating partner’s marketing events, and allocating market development budget Research regional market and gather market intelligence for our marketing approach and strategic plan  What we are looking for  Fluent in English and Mandarin Good interpersonal, presentation, and negotiation skills Familiar with cross-culture communication and coordination, with strong cultural empathy Deep understanding of European culture and consumer behavior, with global vision Self-driven, passionate, responsible, adaptive and result-oriented Willing to travel between Europe and China after the end of pandemic (3-4 times a year, mostly based in Shenzhen)  Even better if you have  Several years of study/work experience in Central Europe High proficiency in German Worked in 3D printing/digital fabrication/STEAM/robotics industry  What we can offer  Dynamic, youthful, and friendly work environment Comprehensive onboarding program and mentorship Personal development and training fund Internal knowledge sharing and a study culture Loads of 3D printers to play with and life-long makers to guide you Fun time (dining, sports, party, travel, etc.) Competitive salary and stock options

工作职责:  What you will accomplish together with us Identify new business opportunities aligned with the organization's overall market and growth strategy Actively drive newly launched innovative products and services into the marketplace and proactively follow up on the successful implementation of sales activity at key accounts Support customer requirements in supply and quality in close alignment with our internal capabilities Regularly visit critical decision makers and influencers at the accounts and able to build sustainable business relationship Periodically report on the progress of the business to line management and internal stakeholders, using reporting tools as provided and recommended by the organization What will convince us A minimum relevant experience and proven track in sales within the Biopharmaceutical or Life Science Industry is desirable A college degree in Life Sciences or Bioengineering or relevant areas General sales skills, presentation and communication skills and solid business acumen Knowledge of standard office software and modern communication tools Ability to travel min 50% working time in designated territory Flexibility, ability to work under pressure and creativity Excellent language skills in German and English both written and spoken What we offer  Our ambition is to simplify progress in life science research and the biopharmaceutical industry to help translate scientific findings into new therapeutics faster and more efficiently. So that more people can obtain access to better medicine. Nearly 11,000 employees at more than 60 production and sales locations worldwide are committed to this vision. And together, we have grown strongly over the past years. Do you also want to contribute to our vision? Grow with us and benefit from working with a Global Player that has kept its familiar atmosphere: Opportunity for international career development: a global network offering seminars and training sessions, expert and manager career paths Great opportunity to work with an international team Open and highly collaborative culture: mutual support within teams and working as equals, team spirit and international collaboration Intelligent working environment: working in smart buildings with the latest technology and equipment Ambitious goals: Sartorius plans to double its sales revenue approximately every five years and expects to grow its global team to approximately 15,000 people in 2025 任职条件:  Same as above
industries: Biotechnology

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  As an Indirect Sales, You will lead and coach Channel Partners to drive growth of his/her assigned GEHC product portfolio, drive financial results, ensure compliance and be accountable for keeping risk profile within the region norms and standards. It's a role that will work closely with the Region, Zone and P&L commercial leaders and teams to deliver appropriate and effective channel strategies and support programs.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Primary Responsibilities  Financial performance Own and deliver financial performance for Channel Partner portfolio. Identify target end user accounts and create account plans in conjunction with Channel Partner. Create and/or maintain Channel Partner specific business plans and set G&Os. Channel Partner Effectiveness Analyze territories and maintain in conjunction with region leadership and marketing appropriate coverage models. Identify potential Channel Partners, recruit, qualify and facilitate thru appointment process including gaining necessary approvals/P&L support. On-board Channel Partner as per checklist and coordinate with respective P&Ls. Train channel partner sales force & coordinate with P&L product certification programs. Apply methodology to evaluate Channel Partner effectiveness. Share leads, manage opportunities and pipeline. Optimize channel partner portfolio; leverage synergies across GEHC. Embrace and implement Channel Partner management best practices. Compliance Create a culture of highest integrity and compliance within Channel Partner. Enforce global compliance standards, collaborate with compliance manager to perform due diligence activities. Leading Channel Development Maintain relationships with the senior management/owners within the Channel Partner and their sales team. Manage relationships on day-to-day basis and provide transactional support. Act as business development coach to grow the Channel Partner capability. Simplify the point of contact between GEHC and Channel Partner and proactively align internal GE resources to support Channel Partner. Introduce and coordinate delivery of GEHC Channel Partner support programs and commitments. Schedule joint sales calls with Channel Partner & relevant GE commercial teams as opportunities to coach and maintain relationships with the customer decision makers. Coordinating internal support for the Channel partner Analyzes, identifies, and communicates the internal and external resource needs of the Channel partner. Coordinate internal GE resources to support and grow the Channel partner. Continuously keep both region and P&L leaders updated on the status and progress of the channel partner. 任职条件:  Qualifications  Qualifications/Requirements Bachelor degree or above. At least 3 - 5 years’ experience in Healthcare related sales or marketing with solid account management methodology exposure. Strong business finance knowledge. Successful experience in multi-stakeholder environment. High ethics and integrity. Fluent English and local language speaking. Strong contracts, legal, commercial & negotiation skills. Proven coordination and influencing skills to set and drive an agenda with third parties. Customer focused mindset with proven ability to respond quickly to internal and external customer needs. Ability to build rapport, energize and influence people. Analytical with strong ability to assimilate complex data and simplify solutions. Interpersonal flexibility and tolerance. Experience in managing sales channels of multiple products in Healthcare equipment sales and flow business sales. Direct and/ or indirect leadership experience. Exposure to business coaching within SME environment. MBA desirable, ability to analyze business models. description: BASF has been a committed partner to Greater China since 1885. With large production sites in Shanghai, Nanjing and Chongqing, as well as a global and regional research and development hub in Shanghai, BASF is a major foreign investor in the country’s chemical industry. BASF posted sales of approximately €8.5 billion in 2020 to customers in Greater China and employed 8,948 people as of the end of the year. For further information, please visit www.basf.com/cn/en. description: Job Description  -Local Sales Representative, Part-Time，Flexible，Working at Home At Polymer, we would be nothing without our successful sales team. We are now seeking several local sales reps to help us sell the products and services that our customers have grown to rely on. The sales representative is mainly responsible for severing retailers from your town who are interested in B2B business. This position offers considerable profit from each successful order. Essential Responsibilities  •  Build and maintain relationships and sales revenues with assigned customers by learning and understanding their needs and providing solutions. •  Deliver sales results that meet or exceed metrics by driving lead generation, building sales pipelines and generating sales opportunities. •  Develop, monitor, and analyze data to improve sales performance across the department by making recommendations. •  Account management of medium to large accounts, including maintaining existing clients, prospecting and signing new clients.  Skills and Qualifications ·        No educational requirements ·        Excellent communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, presentation, and organizational skills ·        Good level in English communication Preferred Qualifications ·        3-5 years in sales within an international trade company setting ·        Knowledge and practice about international transfer ·        Social-network across varied industries, especially 3C and cosmetic industries ·        Mandarin or Cantonese speaker About the Company  Polymer is a mature company that highly participating in B2B business, specializing in the cross-border e-commerce business and international commodity trades. With groups of factory owners and foreign trade experts gathered, we aim at promoting high-quality and low-priced Chinese products to the global market, creating sufficient profit margins for local sellers, and achieving win-win cooperation with international enterprises. We had developed highly efficient transportation pipelines, steady and rich cooperation with Chinese local industries, not only our own OEM factories, but also a large number of other united factories. By advocating integrity management, we proceed worldwide trades with prestigious. Being a global enterprise, Polymer shows its inclusiveness, we highly value great cultural diversity, people of any cultural background and nationality are welcomed to join us.

description: EARLY DATA is a digital market intelligence agency specializing in using artificial intelligence & machine learning to capture, process and analyze big data. We collect, analyze, and visualize massive amounts of Digital Data from eCommerce, Social Media, and Food/Beverage sites, unlocking insights for our customers to keep them competitive, engaged with customers, and aware of the latest market trends. EARLY DATA strives to maintain our position at the forefront of China’s booming Digital landscape. EARLY DATA is looking for a savvy and experienced sales person to expand the company’s go-to-market for its data products, subscriptions, and services. Qualified candidates would hit the ground running - solving real problems for enterprise clients and working underneath an experienced management team. You will benefit from being surrounded by highly talented professionals who both share ideas and are willing to learn. With the industry that we are in, the clientele that we work with, and the team that is in place – EARLY DATA employees enjoy great opportunities for growth and professional development.  Tasks: 1. Engage with new prospective customers 2. Represent the company 3. Developing, qualify, and track new business opportunities 4. Win  Requirements: - Native Mandarin speaker with proficient English language skills - 1-3 years of experience in Sales, BD, Account Management or other client-facing roles - Exposure to data/software sales is a plus - Candidates must be willing to learn, have attention to detail, and possess excellent communication skills - Tools: Microsoft Office Suite capable (PPT, Word, Excel)

jobTitle: Channel Sales Specialist - UK & Northern Europe
description: About Snapmaker  Snapmaker is a team of passionate and talented people dedicated to empowering everyone with advanced digital fabrication technologies, from 3D printing to laser cutting and CNC carving. With our passion and perseverance, we believe that making will be as easy as taking photos in the coming decades.  Our journey began in August 2016. We launched our first crowdfunding project and raised over $2 million. In 2019, our second crowdfunding project for Snapmaker 2.0 3 in 1 3D Printer raised $7.8 million in 30 days and became the most funded Technology project in Kickstarter. In 2021, we raised millions of dollars from Series A funding. Currently, we are rapidly expanding our product range and global channel network, serving clients in consumer, education, and professional sectors.  Our Team Culture  We are makers ourselves, and hope to enable more people to make good use of the fabrication tools in their daily life. With this mission, we value the application of engineering; believe in positive outcomes brought by tinkering; never leave out details that determine user experience; maintain close and transparent communications with our users so that we can create what they need.  What you will be doing  Develop an extensive regional sales channel by recruiting channel partners in consumer, education, and professional sectors Manage channel network and cultivate a long-term trusted relationship with channel partners Support and enable channel partners to effectively market our products with high-quality service through training, consultation and strategic planning Engage in channel marketing such as participating in trade shows, coordinating partner’s marketing events and allocating market development budget Research regional market and gather market intelligence for our marketing approach and strategic plan  What we are looking for  1-3 years of experience in channel sales/channel development/partnership Fluent in English and Mandarin Good interpersonal, presentation and negotiation skills Familiar with cross-culture communication and coordination, with strong cultural empathy Deep understanding of European culture and consumer behavior, with global vision Self-driven, passionate, responsible, adaptive and result-oriented Willing to travel between Europe and China after the end of pandemic (3-4 times a year, mostly based in Shenzhen)  Even better if you have  Several years of study/work experience in Europe High proficiency in Danish/Swedish/Norwegian/Finnish Worked in 3D printing/digital fabrication/STEAM/robotics industry  What we can offer Dynamic, youthful and friendly work environment Comprehensive onboarding program and mentorship Personal development and training fund Internal knowledge sharing and a study culture Loads of 3D printers to play with and life-long makers to guide you Fun time (dining, sports, party, travel, etc.) Competitive salary and stock options

description: 说明  What You Will Do In Your Role Grow and develop the highly strategic and preferred partnership with key account(s) in China: Develop and maintain multiple connections/relationships with key account leadership and decision maker(s) in order to understand subjective value & unmet needs. Build, develop and execute strategies to grow existing airbag business with key account(s) in China. Seek, originate and develop additional project(s) of interest to INVISTA by leveraging the knowhow, technology and proposed solutions from the New Business Development of Specialty Industrial Material. Serve as they liaison and relationship owner between Koch companies and key account(s). Seek opportunities of mutual benefit between key account(s) and other Koch companies as appropriate. Execute and administrate the Sales Agreement(s) in accordance with the Terms & conditions. Pass through potential project(s) and introduce the business leads to other INVISTA businesses and, if applicable, other businesses/companies under Koch Industries. Strong interpersonal skills, ability to fully understand and identify key issues at customers and good thinking capabilities in solution proposals. Good communication skills in both Mandarin and English. Strong passion in acquiring new knowledge / skills, new market development and cultivation. Good culture fit of MBM: abilities to think out of the box and the courage to challenge the status quo.

description: Agilent inspires and supports discoveries that advance the quality of life. We provide life science, diagnostic and applied market laboratories worldwide with instruments, services, consumables, applications and expertise. Agilent enables customers to gain the answers and insights they seek -- so they can do what they do best: improve the world around us. Information about Agilent is available at www.agilent.com.  "What's it like to work at Agilent in Sales? Watch the video"  Direct Sales: Responsible for selling of company, systems and services to end-user customers in assigned geographic, territory, industry or accounts. Responsible for developing customers and their satisfaction. Represents the company to the customer and the customer to the company in all sales-oriented activities.  Channel Sales: Responsible for the managing either of a list of channel partners and/or a partner in a given geography. Responsible for the channel quota development, as well as the partners' and end users' satisfaction. Channel partner may be: Value Added Reseller, Original Equipment Manufacturer, Systems Integrators, Distributors, Dealers, Alliances, Partners, Aggregators, Mass Merchandisers or Retail. Manages relationships and business plan as well as associated activities such as marketing, advertising, sales promotions, training and other Channel-related support.  Software Sales: Responsible for selling products which are predominantly software. Sales revenue comprised of > 90% software product revenue.  Interprets customer needs and works to meet those needs; identifies potential business opportunities, able to handle complex leads independently  Works on sales assignments with broadly defined objectives  Solves non-routine issues, challenges and problems within field of specialization  Bachelors or Masters Degree or University Degree or equivalent. description: Job Description Summary Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  技术人员通过定位 GE 技术，并确定最佳技术和商业解决方案来发起销售。推广 GE 技术的商业价值主张。与区域销售、客户销售和商业计划书人员密切合作。涉及 DTI 的主要技术角色（询问要求）：旨在通过 ITO 前期的技术支持来提高市场渗透率。 扩大自己对销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群体的认识，以执行政策/策略。不断培养更高水平的知识和技能。 理解关键业务驱动力的基础知识；用这种理解来完成自己的工作。了解自己团队的工作如何与其他团队融合并为该领域做出贡献。 可能具有一定的自主权，从而在定义的框架内进行决策。以良好的商业知识和判断力解决在规定程序中遇到的问题。就定义的说明/参数之外的问题咨询更多的高级团队成员。 此级别的职位需要良好的人际交往能力。向直接相关的同事和业务部门传达所提供的设计和协调服务。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。向他人介绍技术信息。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够独立工作。较强的解决问题能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

Basic understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. Good understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. description: Role Description  The index sales will be responsible for selling FTSE Russell indices, data and analytics primarily to banks and academic clients in mainland China and maintaining the existing China contract records. This role will be based in Shanghai and report to the sales lead in China. The candidate will be expected to have existing relationships within the banking industry in China and be committed to developing new business opportunities mainly with banking-sector and academic clients. Prior experience of 3+ years in sales/business development roles is required and knowledge on index products (especially Fixed Income Indexes and Analytics) is preferable.  Key Responsibilities  Working within the diverse APAC Sales Team and reporting to the sales lead in China, the individual will be responsible for new business development and relationship management for the assigned FTSE Russell sales territory and client base - primarily the banking-sector and academic clients in China. The individual is also expected to fulfill the responsibilities for maintaining the existing client contract records.  New business sales and account management focusing on banking-sector and academic clients in China  Assist Senior Sales to manage existing customer relationships and maintain existing contract record management  Assist Senior Sales to develop business plans to drive revenues across client base  Work towards managing own pipeline  Deliver revenue goals through meticulous account planning, plan implementation and plan management  Regularly report on quantitative and qualitative results of account planning and plan implementation using company adopted methods  Develop and display deep knowledge and understanding of FTSE Russell products, packaging and pricing with a focus on Fixed Income Indices and Analytics Systems, and of FTSE Russell competition in the local market  Maintain records of interactions with prospects and accounts, as well as accurate pipeline of sales opportunities in FTSE Russell’s Customer Relationship Management system  Actively support FTSE Russell marketing efforts as it relates to new product announcements and existing product upgrades  Proactively communicate enhancements to products and services, and cross-sell new offerings for future sales  Candidate Profile / Key Skills  Minimum 3 years sales and account management experiences in selling financial information services (index selling experience preferred) to banks in China.  Prior sales experience in financial services sector with proven track record  Excellent knowledge of, and experience in, the financial markets  Excellent verbal and written communications abilities in English and Mandarin  Self motivating and resilient  Commercially focused. Have the ability to assist FTSE Russell clients in growing their business using FTSE Russell products and services  Ability to close the sale and secure commercial contract agreements in a timely manner  Interpersonal and Presentation Skills  Adept at operating independently and as part of a team  Collaborative in following and supporting the goals set by FTSE Russell management  Excellent knowledge of Fixed Income preferred  People are at the heart of what we do and drive the success of our business. Our culture of connecting, creating opportunity and delivering excellence shape how we think, how we do things and how we help our people fulfil their potential.  At LSEG we embrace diversity and actively seek to attract individuals with unique backgrounds and perspectives. We break down barriers and encourage collaboration, enabling innovation and rapid development of solutions that make a difference. Our workplace generates an enriching and rewarding experience for our people and customers alike. Our vision is to build an inclusive culture in which everyone feels driven to reach their potential.  We know that real personal growth cannot be achieved by simply climbing a career ladder – which is why we encourage and enable a wealth of avenues and interesting opportunities for everyone to broaden and deepen their skills and expertise.  LSEG are committed to supporting emotional, physical, financial and societal wellbeing. Our tailored benefits are a key part of this commitment and we offer colleagues a range of support from healthcare and retirement planning to paid volunteering days and consumer discounts.  We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants and employees with disabilities. If an accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please make your recruiter aware, we want to ensure you perform at your best.  As a global organisation spanning 70 countries and one rooted in a culture of growth, opportunity, diversity and innovation, LSEG is a place where everyone can grow, develop and fulfil your potential with purposeful careers.  Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information the London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) (“We”) may hold about you, what it’s used for, and how it’s obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject .  If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to LSEG are aware of this privacy notice.

description: Overview  As one of the world’s leading analytical instrumentation companies, Bruker covers a broad spectrum of advanced solutions in all fields of research and development. All our systems and instruments are designed to improve safety of products, accelerate time-to-market and support industries in successfully enhancing quality of life. We’ve been driving innovation in analytical instrumentation for 50 years now. Today, worldwide more than 6,000 employees are working on this permanent challenge, at over 70 locations on all continents. Bruker Optics is a globally leading supplier of FT-(N)IR, and Raman spectrometers and microscopes.  Responsibilities guide and implement the go-to-market strategy for our FT-IR and Remote Sensing product line in the territory of China and coordinate market insights with the HQ and local management guide and convince the local sales team of our innovations, products and sales strategies train the local sales team in how to present and sell our products by addressing our unique selling points guide and convince the local sales team with impressive demonstrations of our products in front of prospects and customers develop and roll out measures for raising revenue with our products present our solutions on seminars and conferences Initialize and trigger marketing activities to further increase the awareness of our products suggest improvements and enhancements to our products to strengthen their position and establish them in new markets this position reports to the Country Manager Bruker Optics CN Qualifications several years of experience in the management of products or projects knowledge with Raman or Remote Sensing is expected master’s degree in technical engineering or natural sciences good presentation skills to communicate technical innovations and sales initiatives to the project teams, and country organizations globally ability and willingness to travel of at least 50% working time motivative/leadership attitude
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Computer Software

description: #BeMore Do you aspire a rewarding career that lets you do more and achieve more? Unleash your full potential at work with TDCX, an award-winning and fast-growing BPO company.  Work with the world’s most loved brands and be with awesome, diverse people. Be home, belong, and start your journey to #BeMore!  Top reasons to work with TDCX • Attractive remuneration, great perks, and performance incentives  • Comprehensive medical, insurance, or social security coverage • Premium workspaces • Engaging activities and recognition programs • Strong learning and development plans for your career growth • Positive culture for you to #BeMore at work • Easy to locate area with direct access to public transport • Flexible working arrangements • Be coached and mentored by experts in your field • Join a global company with 25 years of experience and more than 270 industry awards  What is your mission? As Sales Developer, you will be working with our Global Internet Leader Account to deliver #happier customer experience. As a sales representative, you are always reaching for ambitious performance goals and work with a wide variety of end client advertisers to deliver the optimal advertising solution for every account. Your strong interest in sales, the digital economy and your entrepreneurial drive enables advertisers to expand their businesses with their latest advertising products and solutions.  You are also required to perform these job functions: ●Work both independently and in collaboration with sales teams to source, contact, and engage prospective customers interested in evaluating LinkedIn products. ●Execute outbound prospecting campaigns to find, contact, and engage prospective customers interested in evaluating LinkedIn products. ●Execute daily outbound phone calls and emails, contact C-level decision makers, build quick rapport, and assess needs. ● Help prospects get excited and engage with LnkedIn teams to evaluate product offering ● Strive for high prospect engagement to put them in contact with Sales teams ● Work collaboratively with Sales teams and support them in reaching their targets ● Need to be detail oriented, highly proactive and organized in order to contact a large number of prospects. ● Effectively tracks and communicates progress and performance against performance goals to relevant stakeholders on a periodic basis using simple, clear and concise language. ● Work both independently and in collaboration with sales teams to source, contact, and engage prospective customers interested in evaluating LinkedIn products ● Execute daily outbound phone calls and emails, contact C-level decision makers, build quick rapport and assess needs ● Any other duties and responsibilities that may be assigned to you by the management from time to time, within your category of employment in the organization and for the effective implementation, maintenance and continual improvement of the ISO9001 and ISO18295-1 Quality Management System of TDCX.  Who are we looking for?  ● Candidates must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree in any field. ● Minimum 1 years of work experience in B2B sales interacting with CX levels. Business development experience preferably in SaaS or B2B online ads . ● Successful track record in directly driving business, highly motivated and able to process high volume of calls and emails. Ensure achievement of Key KPIs on a consistent basis. ● Candidates experience working in a fast-paced, goal-oriented sales and target driven environment. ● Must be a strong communicator, with an emphasis on effective listening and empathizing with customers, plus good phone etiquette (pace, tone, voice quality, grammar and articulation) ● Expertise working with computers and the ability to work with multiple systems and the ability to learn and adapt to new ones ● Good verbal and written communication skills in English and Mandarin ● Strong outbound sales skills with proven experience sourcing leads, drive sales growth and generating new sales pipeline for Sales teams ● Understanding of the local market and local business environment   Who is TDCX? We serve some of the world's best brands from our centers of excellence in Singapore, Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand, Hong Kong, China, Japan, India, Romania,Spain and Colombia. We specialize in perfecting our client's customer experience and elevating their sales.  We are guided by a talent philosophy - selecting and employing the best professionals to make the outsource industry better for our people and our clients.  Our company has won over 270 industry awards for delivering value driven by technology and continuously innovating our customer-facing brand solutions. Thanks to our premium workspaces, above industry average compensation packages, career opportunities, and long list of perks, we were recently awarded as one of the best companies to work for in Asia.
industries: Outsourcing/Offshoring and Internet

description: Job Description  Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?  Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.  You will develop professional relationships with our customers and optimize base sales, NPD & promotions. You will ensure great visibility in retailers and delivery of sales capabilities. Your drive will lead you to deliver the field KPI's and hit your annual objectives  How You Will Contribute  You will: Ensure a maximum visual impact and an optimum shelf availability through merchandising techniques. Implement and monitor promotional activities. Point of buying materials placement and implementation. Report on activities.  What You Will Bring  A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career and the following experience and knowledge: Excellent communication and inter-personal skills Solid knowledge about sales and negotiation processes Strong analytical skills Sales experience required, preferably FMCG/CPG Perseverance and attention to details  其它职位信息  关于此职位，您需要了解：无  您还将带来什么额外价值：无  教育背景/资历证书：高中及以上  工作制定要求：全职  差旅要求：无  工作安排：不定时  No Relocation support available Business Unit Summary We’ve been bringing our products to Greater China for over 35 years, making, marketing and selling our mouth-watering, well-loved local and global brands such as Oreo, LU and Chips Ahoy! biscuits, Pacific wafers, Stride gumand Milka chocolate. Headquartered in Shanghai, our 4,000 employees proudly work in sales offices and in our Research & Development Technical Centre in Suzhou. We are also proud to be awarded China’s 2020 Top Employer certification.  Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.  Job Type RegularField SalesSales

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Overview  The Territory Sales Representative is primarily responsible for creating new and expansion business in Strategic Territory accounts to meet/exceed financial and business objectives.  This job is assigned a sales quota and performance is measured by meeting or exceeding quarterly and annual targets within a defined list of accounts.  This position reports to China Territory Hub Sales Manager and will integrate with a sales team that includes customer success specialists, partners, technical sales, client services, and marketing, to drive growth within their assigned accounts through new, cross-sell and upsell opportunities.  Responsibilities  Generates new and expansion business within a key list of strategic territory accounts that focuses on solid business value for customers and Autodesk longer term  Evaluates the customer profile, creating value messaging, and targeting key steps needed to execute the account plans  Delivers an accurate weekly, monthly & quarterly forecast of business  Build strong relationships and collaborate effectively with other Autodesk sales teams and channel partners, to grow the business relationship with assigned customers  Works closely with channel partners, technical sales, customer success, marketing and the field sales teams to develop and execute account plans for high priority accounts  Able to work through organizations at all levels to seek sponsorship, including C-Level, as required  Negotiates deals and contracts at various levels within the targeted account either with or on the behalf of channel partners  Collaborates with the customer success teams on appropriate and complimentary sales motions for the renewal business within their assigned accounts  Builds trust with customers through understanding their needs, setting the correct expectations, and creating the best experience possible  Minimum Qualifications  4 + years’ quota-carrying sales experience to include selling complex technology solutions, Account Based selling and large complex multi-solution, expansion deals  Sound business acumen. Ability to accurately forecast and reporting on account activity  Good communication skill and presentation skill  Experience engaging with executive-level stakeholders to influence strategic business outcomes  Ability to adapt quickly and manage difficult situations while remaining upbeat and positive  Strong work ethic: Team oriented, self-starter, high energy, and results oriented. Database management a plus  Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience
industries: Computer Software

description: Job Purpose and Impact  The Sales Representative I will participate in face-to- face and remote selling to our new and existing customers, selling directly or indirectly through various sales channels. We seek a results-oriented professional who, with guidance, will help assess customer needs and suggest appropriate products, services and solutions.  Key Accountabilities Contribute to developing and delivering sales bids, presentations and proposals and participating in product demonstrations. Help identify and contact prospective customers, building relationships to generate future sales and repeat business. With basic knowledge of products, their characteristics and market, sell and stimulate demand for a series of products. Plan daily activities, including customer visits and quantitative and qualitative objectives to achieve. Follow market and competition evolution, passing information to senior staff. Handle basic issues and problems under direct supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff. 为嘉吉的禽肉深加工产品服务和解决方案创造需求，主要职责是负责长沙及周边区域在进行市场开发和维护工作，拓展以区域连锁快餐为重点的各相关销售渠道 探寻、识别潜在的市场业务机会，发展并维持与经销商及终端用户的关系，确保业务持续稳定开展，为目标客户和潜在客户创造嘉吉的产品和服务的需求，市场信息收集和反馈，包括同业厂家业务动态，市场新产品或潜在的流行产品规格、售价等。 完成公司销售目标及其他要求事项、维护老客户、开发区域渠道客户、完成空白地级市市场经销商设立、开发区域内连锁客户 Qualifications Above college degree 大专以上学历 At least 3 years working experience in food relevanted industry , poultry meat experience is prefered 3年以上相关行业工作经验，禽肉熟食制品行业工作经验者优先，有西快渠道经验者优先 Excellent people relationship skills优秀的人际关系技巧 Good communiciation skills良好的沟通技巧 Good behavious , down to earth：良好的行为，脚踏实地：

description: Job Description Summary  You will be responsible for creating and winning sales opportunities for their products/solutions/services in an assigned territory, and/or in a list of named accounts individually or as part of a One GE Healthcare team. Act as the clinical/technical expert to establish and continuously develop the relationship with departmental and technical decision makers in their assigned accounts and where applicable work in conjunction with Account Executives and Managers to gain access to C-Suite decision makers.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Key responsibilities include (but are not limited to):  Support field sales team to sell the HCS equipment and business solutions to customers within Area. Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for Modality sales team, product team& field sales team. Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE. Prepare and co-ordinate tender response and validate tender documentation in collaboration with territory manager. Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers. Assist the territory manager with post sale follow up in order to ensure customer satisfaction.  Required Qualifications:  More than 5 years working experience, preferably in medical industry, either as commercial role, technical or clinical role. Basic knowledge of MR or PET physics, theory and equipment, 2+ years PET/MR background will be better Excellent communication skills, both internally and externally Strong interpersonal acumen, be able to build up solid relationship with people Team working skills (including ability to harness resources to achieve goal). Good command of English both in oral and written Good business acumen, sensitivity to the dynamics in market place, with good strategic thinking capacity; Good presentation skills Bachelor and above degree, preferably in Clinical Medical background  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: Job Description Summary  As a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Financial Performance1. Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory.  2. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management1. Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing.2. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures.3. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS.4. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management1. Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. 2. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales.3. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation.  4. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations.5. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff.6. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs.7. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. 8. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets.GE Product & Market awareness1. Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products.2. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs.3. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition.Compliance1. Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes2. Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required.  Qualifications / Requirements  1. Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience.  2. 2 years of strategic sales experience.  3. 2 years experience in healthcare.  4. Proven key account management and project planning skills.  5. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise  6. Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact.  Quality Specific Goals1. Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position2. Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required4. Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies 5. Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken 6. Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System.  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.    Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals
