description: Job Description Summary  You will be responsible for creating and winning sales opportunities for their products/solutions/services in an assigned territory, and/or in a list of named accounts individually or as part of a One GE Healthcare team. Act as the clinical/technical expert to establish and continuously develop the relationship with departmental and technical decision makers in their assigned accounts and where applicable work in conjunction with Account Executives and Managers to gain access to C-Suite decision makers.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Key responsibilities include (but are not limited to):  Support field sales team to sell the HCS equipment and business solutions to customers within Area. Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for Modality sales team, product team& field sales team. Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE. Prepare and co-ordinate tender response and validate tender documentation in collaboration with territory manager. Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers. Assist the territory manager with post sale follow up in order to ensure customer satisfaction.  Required Qualifications:  More than 5 years working experience, preferably in medical industry, either as commercial role, technical or clinical role. Excellent communication skills, both internally and externally Strong interpersonal acumen, be able to build up solid relationship with people Team working skills (including ability to harness resources to achieve goal). Good command of English both in oral and written Good business acumen, sensitivity to the dynamics in market place, with good strategic thinking capacity; Good presentation skills Bachelor and above degree, preferably in Clinical Medical background  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: Inside Sales Sales Development Representative Location: Beijing, China  Why You'll Love Hitachi Vantara: Are you ready to change the world? Do you want to be passionate about your employer and the brand you represent? Hitachi Vantara, a wholly owned subsidiary of Hitachi, Ltd, guides our customers from what’s now to what’s next by solving their digital challenges. Working alongside each customer, we apply our unmatched industrial and digital capabilities to their data and applications to benefit both business and society. More than 80% of the Fortune 100 trust Hitachi Vantara to help them develop new revenue streams, unlock competitive advantages, lower costs, enhance customer experiences, and deliver social and environmental value. Come prepared to be encouraged and inspired.  What You'll Do Are you interested in being challenged and appreciated while embarking on a dynamic career? Do you want to work in an environment where colleagues become friends and managers actively coach and partner with you for success? Do you thrive in an environment where creativity and ambition are valued? You will build direct relationships with customers while working with channel partners to maximize new sales opportunities and renewals within your territory. You will manage all aspects of the full sales cycle to help customers reach their business goals. • You will be aggressively prospecting with your sales team through cold calls, emails, and marketing events /campaigns. • You will commit to understanding their territory and becoming a trusted member of the Inside Sales organization, while collaborating with your Account Manager and Sales Manager. • You will become an expert at using lead generation tools and LinkedIn Sales Navigator to routinely extract contacts and create accurate and targeted lists of prospects. • You will conduct account development best practices with email, phone, and social touches using SalesLoft, Marketo, ZoomInfo, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and Salesforce CRM. • You will utilize smart, targeted questions to speak knowledgeably with decisions makers such as VP of Engineering, Director of Analytics, and Data Architects. • You will work closely with the sales team in the ongoing optimization of strategic sales approaches. • You will extensively use Salesforce CRM and other tools to build and maintain accurate activity, contact, and account information of all customers and prospects. • You will consistently achieve quotas to ensure revenue objectives. • You will educate and qualify any inbound prospect to turn into ready to close deals. • You will become a trusted resource and develop superior relationships with prospects. • You will Provide closed-loop feedback to ensure continuous process optimization. • You will stay up to date on the solutions we sell, buyer personas, market trends, and competitors.  Please note that our team is centrally located in Barcelona, Spain. The culture of our team is collaborative. Team work is expected, supported, and valued. For this reason, the role requires the employee to be onsite daily. Working from home is allowed during mandated restrictions. Who is your team? Inside Sales is Hitachi Vantara’s fastest growing sales team and is the talent engine for Sales with diverse and motivated individuals that consistently deliver profitable growth. We service our customers through a series of sales motions to drive higher value and an optimal experience from Hitachi Vantara solutions. We are a dynamic international team that brings excitement to the sales floor every day. We connect Hitachi Vantara customers with solutions that can transform their businesses and deliver faster digital transformation and business value. We provide a platform for success including coaching, training, and on-the-job learning that will support your career development. An innovative, flexible, and award-winning working environment enables and empowers our team to perform at their best.  Who You Are • Goal-oriented and motivated by performance rewards • Seek to achieve and exceed annual sales goals • A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders  Skills and Qualifications • 2+ years of B2B selling experience in a similar or adjacent industry • A love for IT and ability to tap into technology • A history of career progression and desire for professional development • Experience owning the full sales cycle (prospecting, validating, negotiating, and closing the sale). • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business • Demonstrate strong sales achievement (i.e., consistent achievement at or above quota, or a history YoY growth in your target market) • Passionate about sales and building positive relationships • Possess strong business acumen and can articulate the value of a solution to address customers’ current and future needs • Phenomenal communication/presentation skills • Flexible and resilient problem solver; our strongest teammates have a sense of urgency to resolve issues • Thrive in a team environment and enjoy sharing ideas and best practices • Take pride in your positive, upbeat energy • Experience using digital selling tools such as Salesforce and TechTarget  We Are Hitachi Vantara We guide you from what's now to what's next. By connecting our unmatched digital industrial capabilities with your data, we spark unparalleled competitive advantage that rapidly scales your digital business and propels society forward. For us, it's not enough to ask: "What can we do?" Instead, we ask: "What can't we do together?
industries: Information Technology and Services

description: 工作职责:  Primary Responsibilities  Financial performance Own and deliver financial performance for Channel Partner portfolio Identify target end user accounts and create account plans in conjunction with Channel Partner Create and/or maintain Channel Partner specific business plans and set G&Os Channel Partner Effectiveness Analyze territories and maintain in conjunction with region leadership and marketing appropriate coverage models Identify potential Channel Partners, recruit, qualify and facilitate thru appointment process including gaining necessary approvals/P&L support On-board Channel Partner as per checklist and coordinate with respective P&Ls Train channel partner sales force & coordinate with P&L product certification programs Apply methodology to evaluate Channel Partner effectiveness Share leads, manage opportunities and pipeline Optimize channel partner portfolio; leverage synergies across GEHC Embrace and implement Channel Partner management best practices Compliance Create a culture of highest integrity and compliance within Channel Partner. Enforce global compliance standards, collaborate with compliance manager to perform due diligence activities Leading Channel Development Maintain relationships with the senior management/owners within the Channel Partner and their sales team Manage relationships on day-to-day basis and provide transactional support Act as business development coach to grow the Channel Partner capability. Simplify the point of contact between GEHC and Channel Partner and proactively align internal GE resources to support Channel Partner Introduce and coordinate delivery of GEHC Channel Partner support programs and commitments Schedule joint sales calls with Channel Partner & relevant GE commercial teams as opportunities to coach and maintain relationships with the customer decision makers Coordinating internal support for the Channel partner Analyzes, identifies, and communicates the internal and external resource needs of the Channel partner Coordinate internal GE resources to support and grow the Channel partner Continuously keep both region and P&L leaders updated on the status and progress of the channel partner 任职条件:  Qualifications  Qualifications/Requirements Bachelor degree or above At least 3 - 5 years’ experience in Healthcare related sales or marketing with solid account management methodology exposure Strong business finance knowledge Successful experience in multi-stakeholder environment High ethics and integrity Fluent English and local language speaking Strong contracts, legal, commercial & negotiation skills Proven coordination and influencing skills to set and drive an agenda with third parties Customer focused mindset with proven ability to respond quickly to internal and external customer needs Ability to build rapport, energize and influence people Analytical with strong ability to assimilate complex data and simplify solutions Interpersonal flexibility and tolerance Quality Specific Goals Be aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Maintain knowledge of and understand all applicable Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare HIPPA Guidelines, NEMA Regulations, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Local/ Int’l Law is broken. Maintain knowledge of and understand all applicable Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or local / Int’l Law is broken. Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. Desired Characteristics Matter of expertise in local Healthcare Legislation and regulations Experience in managing sales channels of multiple products in Healthcare equipment sales and flow business sales Direct and/ or indirect leadership experience Exposure to business coaching within SME environment MBA desirable, ability to analyze business models
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Financial Services

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Job Description  1、Make full use of various sales channels to complete the sales of food raw materials, pharmaceutical raw materials, nutritional supplements, food additives and other products;  充分利用各种销售渠道，完成食品原料、药品原料、营养补充剂、食品添加剂等产品的销售；  2、Complete new customer development and old customer maintenance in local market;  完成本地市场新客户开发和老客户维护；  3、Maintain communication with China head office to complete the whole sales process;  与中国总部保持沟通，完成整个销售流程；  4、Develop, manage, and maintains relationships with all prospective leads；  开发、管理和维护与所有潜在客户的关系;  5、Find creative ways to successfully grow current customer base；  寻找创造性的方法成功地发展现有的客户群。  Qualification  1、Successful previous experience as a Sales Professional；  成功的销售经验；  2、Excellent writing and oral presentation skills；  优秀的写作和口头表达能力；  3、Strong organizational, interpersonal, telephone and PC Skills；  较强的组织、人际关系、电话和电脑技能；  4、Experience selling in short- and long-term sales cycles；  短期和长期销售周期的销售经验；  5、Have good customer resources in the region/country；  在地区/国家拥有良好的客户资源；  6、Provide rich sales commission in the early stage, and employ formal staff in the later stage;  前期提供丰厚的销售佣金，后期聘请为正式员工。

companyName: HACKL Technology Co., Ltd. - DIGITAL EXPERT
description: HACKL Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. is a solution provider for AR/VR and IoT Digitalization. We are working just with the best supplier on the market. Our company is specializing in a growing market for AR Remote Mentor Systems, VR Content Development and IIoT Solutions. There we created the best AR Remote Mentor Packages for our customer.  Now we are looking for a Junior Sales Consultant with Business Development activities to support us for the market in China and overseas partnerships.  Your Responsibilities ·       Evaluate and get in direct contact with potential customers according our customer list. ·       Present our AR remote solutions (online/on-site) and close deals with potential customers. ·       Identify, evaluate, and prioritize specific market opportunities in support of the broader strategy including developing and following-up on leads, structuring deal terms, and developing a negotiation strategy and lead negotiations. ·       Establish and maintain positive, beneficial and constructive relationships with key accounts and new potential clients. ·       External Partnerships: Maintain a network of relationships across the industry with partners, potential partners, competitors, investors, thought leaders, etc. Leverage relationships in opportunity identification and sales. ·       Industry Expertise: Be an expert in various industry trends like Manufacturing or Production including competitive and market dynamics, product and technology trends. ·       Support project planning and implementation of our Systems at customer sites. ·       Establish after-sales services and cross selling opportunities.  Required Qualifications ·       1-2 years of experience in technical B2B sales or business development with a high success rate ·       High interest in AR/VR and Digitalization with some experiences ·       Education: Preferably master’s degree in IT, IoT or manufacturing, OR MBA degree focusing on Management, Sales or Production ·       Great communication and collaboration skills ·       Passion for compliance, software solutions, and creating great customer experiences ·       Willingness to travel in China of up to 50% ·       Must have good command of spoken and written English and Chinese. Additional German would be great but not a must.  Basic Requirements ·       Honest and Trustfully Person ·       Extroverted and good communicaton skills ·       Willingness and Love to learn new digital AR technology ·       Hard working to achieve our common goals ·       Good business behavior ·       Reliable and always on-time at appointments  Your Benefits ·       You will work in a very experienced and friendly tea ·       You will internal AR/IIoT education and Sales/BD training ·       We support you to grow to get your bonuses ·       Good salary with a outstanding bonus system ·       Chance to get promoted as Director ·       Regularly trainings and mentoring for you ·       A very exiting and not standard job ·       Flexible time and home office possibility  Please send us your Documents and the CV to hm@hackltech.com

公司介绍：  Airwallex（空中云汇）是一家跨境金融独角兽。成立于2015年，Airwallex致力于构建数字化的全球金融基础设施，提供智能、无缝的跨境支付解决方案。产品包括跨境交易中的收款、全球支付和货币汇率管理等。目前拥有跨境电商、在线旅游、物流、教育与留学、金融机构、数字营销、线上娱乐等领域的客户。  Airwallex自成立以来获得投资机构超4亿美元融资，包括腾讯、红杉资本中国基金、DST Global、高瓴创投、维港投资、ANZi Ventures、Square Peg Capital、戈壁创投和Salesforce Ventures等国内外投资机构的支持。 2020年7月，Airwallex空中云汇宣布阿里巴巴创业者基金（Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund）作为新的投资人参与到D+轮融资，加速公司对于产品、服务规模和生态体系的扩建。  工作职责： 负责银行、金融领域战略级客户关系的拓展及维护；定期拜访客户管理层，与相关负责人建立起长期的良好合作关系； 深入洞察客户在跨境金融领域方面的诉求，与Airwallex内部产品、研发等相关团队一同制定跨境金融解决方案； 协调大型项目的落地、执行，完成销售额、回款、利润等相关业绩指标；持续跟进客户，识别二次/向上/交叉等销售机会，实现公司与客户的长期互利共赢； 参与销售策略讨论，提供基于客户的行业观点，与相关部门一起，制定Airwallex在银行、金融领域的市场竞争策略。 任职要求： 全日制本科学历，优先考虑信息，金融，外贸，经济，计算机等相关专业； 具有6年以上技术咨询或者SaaS软件销售行业经验，独立带领团队完成银行/金融机构客户项目； 具备良好的沟通和表达能力，掌握顾问式营销方法与技能，能够通过有效地演讲和谈判呈现公司产品和服务，赢得客户的认可并与客户保持长期友好的合作关系； 热爱销售工作，具备快速学习能力；有良好的团队合作意识、较强的抗压性；自我有较高的要求，追求卓越，愿意不断投入来提升自己的能力和专业度，能够承受较大工作压力。 对于金融科技领域有热情。
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Financial Services

description: Job Description Summary  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Execute within a well defined sales/commercial framework. There is generally a step by step sequence of standard tasks which need to be followed to achieve an end result. Work is typically subject to tight oversight. This may be in form of human or systems checking. May be responsible for supporting targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small sales territories.  Job Description  角色与职责  向指定客户销售时，新增客户通常很少，并且通常需要经过审查。包括单个业务组/P&L 中的关键客户 发展自身所学学科内的概念性知识。了解自己的销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群。可能包括具有广泛领域内专业知识或技术知识的支持角色。 应用从教育或过去的经验中发展的业务常识。了解自己团队的工作如何为该地区做出贡献。 使用规定程序解决问题。向主管或更多高级团队成员咨询定义的说明/参数之外的问题。 与他人合作解决问题。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。交流技术信息，提出问题并检查理解程度。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够独立工作。较强的解决问题能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: 职位描述：  1、通过良好的零售管理，促进门店的进货和零售  2、开辟当地市场，扩展零售网点，提升市场份额  3、良好的客情管理，制定并监督店铺月度销售业绩达成  4、清楚理解品牌发展策略，销售发展策略与计划；了解地区内竞争对手在化妆品店渠道客户的业务状况及发展方向；从渠道，客户，产品，竞争对手方面分析业务化妆品店渠道发展状况，寻找业务发展机会

description: Job Description Summary  Responsible for the management and development of distributor relationships. The objective is to achieve targeted sales and profit objectives from a defined business territory/key customer group, in accordance with the Country/Regional Business Plan. GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Essential Responsibilities    Develop and implement a sales plan for assigned channel/distributor, aimed at achieving and exceeding sales turnover and financial return, within the most cost-effective route and time-frame.  Target new business accounts and opportunities as well as existing customers;  Actively manage the relationship with assigned distributors to ensure alignment with company objectives;  Proceed distributor/channel with the support & information needed to facilitate their effectiveness;   Maintain a high level of technical and commercial competency on relevant products, techniques and applications;  Accurately forecast sales and growth opportunities within designated territory, using sales tools and applications.  Prepare and participate in business reviews/forecasts, to ensure a constant flow of information between Channel/Distributor and the Company.  Maintain an awareness of competitor activities and developments and ensure this information is collected and made available to leadership.  Qualifications/Requirements  Minimum 5 years relevant healthcare industry experience  Bachelor's degree  A proven track-record of achieving and exceeding sales targets, and a desire to grow new business  Experience understanding customer needs and business drivers and using this knowledge to develop account plans and strategies (knowledge of the existing account areas/channels would be advantageous).  Excellent interpersonal skills, including teamwork and communication skills  Persistence in developing prospects and customers, and ability to close business  Strong presentation, analytical and customer service skills  Self-starter, able to manage time and organize and prioritize workload  Ability to communicate using English and local language  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support. description: A Sales Manager analyses local market trends and competitor activity to recommend strategies that keep the hotel a leader in the marketplace through the development of future and repeat business.  What will I be doing?  Responsibilities  Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards  As Sales Manager, you will analyse local market trends and competitor activity to recommend strategies that keep the hotel a leader in the marketplace through the development of future and repeat business. Analysis local market trends and competitor activity to identify business leads Develop customer accounts and travel within the local area to drive business into the specific hotel/cluster and to increase market/customer share in all revenue streams Negotiate room rates/packages with corporate clients Develop and implement creative local marketing channels, including social media channels Prepare company contracts for the hotel in accordance with current business and pricing conditions Work within current business strategies and recognising potential opportunities Cooperate with other departments in the hotel to create an exceptional Guest experience and build strong, comprehensive sales programs Attend Sales events, as required Produce accurate and timely reports that meet the needs of the Sales Director and senior management to include the reporting of appointments, calls made and business leads Answer customer queries in a prompt and professional manner Manage staff performance in compliance with company policies and procedures Recruit, manage, train and develop the Sales team What are we looking for?  Skills  To successfully fill this role, you should maintain the attitude, behaviours, skills, and values that follow  A Sales Manager serving Hilton brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members. Positive attitude and good communication skills Commitment to delivering a high level of customer service Excellent grooming standards Flexibility to respond to a range of different work situations Ability to work under pressure and under own initiative Experience in a sales role with a proven track record to close a sale It would be advantageous in this position for you to demonstrate the following capabilities and distinctions: Knowledge of local market Knowledge of hospitality Passion for sales and for achieving targets and objectives Degree-level qualification in a relevant field What will it be like to work for Hilton?  Hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. For nearly a century, Hilton has offered business and leisure travelers the finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. Our vision “to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality” unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. And, our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all!  Work Locations  Waldorf Astoria Xiamen  Schedule  Full-time  Brand  Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts  Shift  Day Job  Job Level  Manager  Job  Sales

description: Company Description  Third Bridge was founded on the belief that human insights drive intelligent investment decisions.  To make the right investment decisions, our clients require access to the most relevant experts and their insights – we enable this through private consultations and exclusive content drawn from expert interviews.  Our clients consist of some of the largest private equity funds, hedge funds, mutual funds and management consulting firms, who are serviced by a team of over 900 employees located across eight global offices.  Third Bridge operates in a global, multi-billion-dollar market with double digit annual growth and has consistently received accolades for Great Places to Work and the top 100 fastest growing companies.  Job Description  Third Bridge’s Sales Team is responsible for fueling the growth of the Third Bridge business through new client acquisition. The Sales Associate role is a great opportunity to develop business acumen, deepen the understanding of sales processes and methodologies, and develop lead generation and prospecting skills. You will partner with Sales Representatives to create and drive new business, and as such, are responsible for supporting the new client acquisition end-to-end process.  The Sales Associate will aim to become a trusted resource of Sales Representatives and develop relationships with prospects, acting as the initial point of contact.  In This Role, You Will  PRINCIPLE RESPONSIBILITIES Lead prospecting activities in order to build Third Bridge awareness in the target market(s) and schedule high-quality sales interactions Support the build and management of a new business pipeline to appropriately balance new opportunity creation as well as conversion Support the development of a quarterly territory plan, led by the Sales Representative(s), with an aim towards quota achievement Build and demonstrate a strong grasp of Third Bridge’s products, value proposition and competitive advantage, and leverage that knowledge in all client communications Effectively partner with Sales Representatives to document all client events and activities in internal systems, including Salesforce.com Conduct market research to identify top prospects Identify needs of prospects in order to establish credibility and build initial interest Establish active communication and engagement with prospects to create and nurture the relationships Consistently apply an insight-led approach to all internal- and client-facing activities Develop a deep knowledge of each client’s industry, organizational structure, asset class in which they operate, and key stakeholders in those asset classes Maintain a self-starter attitude while creating outreach strategies for new lead generation methods Collaborate with multiple departments across the organization, to identify key drivers for engaging new prospects and driving urgency Qualifications Bachelor’s degree 1-2 years of sales or sales support experience, preferably in a similar industry Highly motivated with a track record of consistent achievement of quota(s) for at least 1 year Effectively leverages internal resources, tools and systems daily Experience applying industry and product knowledge in written and verbal client communications Successful past adoption and effective use of internal workflows, processes and technologies to accomplish work objectives Strong communication, active listening, interpersonal and presentation skills Intellectual curiosity and a passion for learning Easily adaptable to changing, ambiguous and fast-paced environments Strong time management skills with the ability to multi-task and prioritize work Familiarity with Salesforce.com as well as Microsoft Office and G-Suite tools Additional Information  The successful candidate must, by the start of the employment, have permission to work in the country they are applying.  We know that to be truly innovative, we need to have a diverse team around us. That is why Third Bridge is committed to creating an inclusive environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. If you are not 100% sure if you are right for the role, please apply anyway and we will be happy to consider your application.

Still acquiring higher level knowledge and skills. Basic understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. Good understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. May have some autonomy to make decisions within a defined framework. Resolves issues in situations that require commercial knowledge and judgment within established procedures. Consults more senior team members for issues outside of defined instructions/parameters. A job at this level requires good interpersonal skills. Communication with direct colleagues and the business about design and coordination services rendered. For customer facing roles, develops strong customer relationships and serves as the interface between customer and GE. Explains technical information to others. 任职条件: This role requires basic experience in the Sales & Account Sales. Knowledge level is comparable to a Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college ( or a high school diploma with relevant experience).
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Financial Services

description: Innovate to solve the world's most important challenges  Implement and coordinate the operational aspects of ongoing Channel Sales activities. You will serve as liaison between Channel Sales Leadership and Distributors. You will review status of projects and budgets. You will coordinate schedules and prepare status reports. You will assess project issues and develop resolutions to meet productivity, quality, and customers satisfaction goals and objectives. You will develop mechanisms for monitoring Channel Sales progress and for problem solving with project managers, line managers, and customers  Key Responsibilities Channel Sales Activities Manage Projects Provide Customer Support Facilitate Team Alignment Deliver Status Reports YOU MUST HAVE Bachelor's degree, or equivalent. Some experience in the field. Valid Drivers' License WE VALUE A broad knowledge of principles and best practices in (Channel Sales) Excellent team and communication skills An ability to take initiative and work with limited direction Familiar with Channel Sales execution An ability to influence at the operational level Additional Information JOB ID: HRD133859 Category: Sales Location: #1 Building, No.14 Jiu Xian Qiao Road,ChaoYang District,Beijing,BEIJING,100016,China Exempt Global (ALL)
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Financial Services

jobTitle: Sales Representative- Market Teams - Food Analysis Solutions
description: 概述  The Market Sales Representative - Food Analysis Solutions – (FAS) is responsible for lead execution of the FAS Market Sales strategy in China (The Territory), with the key objective to deliver on defined sales targets (Quarterly) and to drive growth in the FAS Market. They are accountable for defining a Business/Sales Plan to successfully grow BBIO business in stated markets and achieve the business goals defined as per the BBIO strategic Business Plan (5Y).  They will work in close collaboration with the Market Representative FAS, as well as with the Regional Sales group, to define and execute customized Go to Market approaches and to support Key Account sales strategy in the FAS Market, thus enabling BBIO to leverage its full existing Solution Portfolio across customers value chains.  They will deliver the annual and quarterly growth in NOBs and revenue, in a profitable way, and in accordance with BBIO’s annual and quarterly financial objective for the FAS Market in The Territory.  They are responsible for the sales of BBIO total solutions in the FAS market, and potentially specific selected Key Accounts (either in a Global KA sales role or in a regional support capacity). This role will generate sustainable growth by broadening value, with existing and novel solutions (for the customer end-to-end value chain), while strengthening the business and partnerships with established customers.  They have advanced specialized knowledge and understanding of the FAS market and should become a trusted partner for our customers in that segment. They will also develop our business by pro-actively targeting new customers in full alignment within the Commercial Organization.  职责 Grow BBIO‘s sales through New Order Booking and Revenue Recognition in The Territory (FAS Markets) by leveraging the full BBIO portfolio relevant to Food Analysis Solution customers. Through building sustainable business partnerships with major corporations in all FAS Subsegments, position BBIO as an End-to-End partner for the complete value chain in the segment and an endorsed supplier in the FAS marketplace. Sell BBIO’s complete solution portfolio, ranging from Food Screeners, software, and services, to Benchtop based Application solutions in all subsegments of the FAS market. Identify a balanced mix of target customers, qualify & maximize BBIO’s business potential for “Designed-In” solutions, and establish sustainable business co-operations with their Decision & Buyer Center in order to deliver business performance (NOB, Revenue, GM) according to the annual and quarterly plan. Act as Key Account Sales Manager for specific FAS Accounts in The Territory that have been assigned. Drive all necessary communication, demo activity, legal requirements, quoting and follow up activities required to close sales in designated opportunities. Focus on penetration strategies for assigned qualified Key Accounts with the goal to achieve “Design-In” projects when possible. For assigned qualified Key Accounts, maintain strong account knowledge and management, ensure that all required resources are utilized in an effective and timely manner to meet the defined customer issue resolution needs (SLS, Back Office) where required. Protect and enhance BBIO’s customer facing reputation. Lead regular interdisciplinary key account task force meetings to resolve pending topics quickly and efficiently. Work in accordance with Miller Heiman Strategic and Key Account Selling Methodologies. Accountable for business results, including annual and quarterly NOB and revenue/market share targets in the FAS Market in The Territory. Own, measure and report sales progress and accurate forecasting within a timely manner through a set of relevant KPI’s within CRM (Salesforce.com). Responsible for implementing the BBIO sales expansion strategies for FAS markets in The Territory. Closely work with Market Manager - FAS and BBIO Marcom to create and execute impactful market lead generation and awareness campaigns in stated region, with the aim of maximising sales growth. Attend specialized events to promote BBIO’s solutions, and assist with the proactive follow up of leads generated Closely work with local Field Application Experts to minimize Sales cycle and time to money for opportunities (time to convert Lead2NOB). Keep abreast of key priorities and changes in FAS Market trends, including changes in regulatory requirements which may pertain to the business, and providing feedback to Global Sales Director - Market Sales – FAS and Market Management, as well as R&D team on a regular basis  资质 High level of autonomy, Self-disciplined and reliable, strong time management skills Strong sales-oriented attitude combined with Performance culture High productivity, high quality work Strong drive and enthusiasm combined with can-do attitude Excellent interpersonal skills and teamwork spirit Ability to adapt to change rapidly if needed Strong analytical and organizational skills Problem-solving positive attitude Accessible and open personality Excellent communication (both written and oral) skills Impeccable personal presentation A proven team player with a strong work ethic who will enhance the performance of the BBIO Market Sales team and will complement the capabilities already in place. Must have the ability to react quickly to market requirements with excellent account evaluation and qualification skills. A driven and highly motivated, self-starting sales professional with successful track record in selling high value capital equipment 5+ years’ work experience including minimum 3 years’ sales experience driving and managing a portfolio of technical life science FAS product sales with associated market knowledge of FAS markets Able to demonstrate proven, successful sales experience in increasingly responsible roles across multiple vertical and market segments Successful track record of key account sales management and business growth in FAS/ Academia or an adjacent industry sector. Strong experience of usage and understanding of Complex & Strategic Selling strategies for business development and account share growth. Expertise in value chain management with proven analytical and problem-solving abilities required to diagnosis customer needs and propose technical solutions that address business requirements. Previous exposure to NMR / associated analytical technologies is required. Deep understanding of FAS customer value chains. Has expertise with Value Chain Management and the provision of technical solutions to address a business requirement within in the value chain. Possess and further develop strong network of contacts in stated Market segments Demonstrated experience with cost analysis and justifications required and the ability to present developed business case analysis to executive management. Can demonstrate and convey theoretical and practical understanding of NMR/TD/EPR technology as well as competing analytical tools (MS, IR) Good level of English verbal, written, computer, technical, and proposal communication and presentation skills, including proficiency with MS Office Suite - inc MS Teams Experience daily use and maintenance of Salesforce.com / SAP or similar CRM tool
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Chemicals

description: This is an exciting opening of sales manager with entry level. An excellent job opportunity for those who is young with sales potential and looking for career advance opportunity!  Learn more details about the job responsibilities and qualifications. Click to apply for it!   Responsibilities: Identify partnership opportunities Develop new relationships in an effort to grow business and help company expand Maintain existing business Think critically when planning to assure project success  Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience Young candidate with high sales potential, having around 5 years working experience Current position in Marketing and/or Sales, to support commercial activities Automotive Industry is a plus Good commands in English, Excel and PowerPoint Curious, good analytical skills, good EQ, strong communication skills, good team player  Reasons to Join: Career development opportunity under China Sales leader's direct coaching International exposure in the various cross selling project
industries: Logistics and Supply Chain

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  Responsible for creating and winning sales opportunities for their products/solutions/services in an assigned territory, and/or in a list of named accounts individually or as part of a One GE Healthcare team. Act as the clinical/technical expert to establish and continuously develop the relationship with departmental and technical decision makers in their assigned accounts and where applicable work in conjunction with Account Executives and Managers to gain access to C-Suite decision makers.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Key Responsibilities Include (but Are Not Limited To) Support field sales team to sell the HCS equipment and business solutions to customers within Area. Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for Modality sales team, product team& field sales team. Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE. Prepare and co-ordinate tender response and validate tender documentation in collaboration with territory manager. Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers. Assist the territory manager with post sale follow up in order to ensure customer satisfaction. 任职条件:  Required Qualifications More than 5 years working experience, preferably in medical industry, either as commercial role, technical or clinical role. Excellent communication skills, both internally and externally Strong interpersonal acumen, be able to build up solid relationship with people Team working skills (including ability to harness resources to achieve goal). Good command of English both in oral and written Good business acumen, sensitivity to the dynamics in market place, with good strategic thinking capacity; Good presentation skills Bachelor and above degree, preferably in Clinical Medical background Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Financial Services

description: Job Description  Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?  Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.  You will develop professional relationships with our customers and optimize base sales, NPD & promotions. You will ensure great visibility in retailers and delivery of sales capabilities. Your drive will lead you to deliver the field KPI's and hit your annual objectives  How You Will Contribute  You will: Ensure a maximum visual impact and an optimum shelf availability through merchandising techniques. Implement and monitor promotional activities. Point of buying materials placement and implementation. Report on activities.  What You Will Bring  A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career and the following experience and knowledge: Excellent communication and inter-personal skills Solid knowledge about sales and negotiation processes Strong analytical skills Sales experience required, preferably FMCG/CPG Perseverance and attention to details  其它职位信息  关于此职位，您需要了解：  您还将带来什么额外价值：  教育背景/资历证书：  工作制定要求：  差旅要求：不出差  工作安排：  No Relocation support available Business Unit Summary We’ve been bringing our products to Greater China for over 35 years, making, marketing and selling our mouth-watering, well-loved local and global brands such as Oreo, LU and Chips Ahoy! biscuits, Pacific wafers, Stride gumand Milka chocolate. Headquartered in Shanghai, our 4,000 employees proudly work in sales offices and in our Research & Development Technical Centre in Suzhou. We are also proud to be awarded China’s 2020 Top Employer certification.  Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.  Job Type RegularField SalesSales
industries: Food Production, Food & Beverages, and Consumer Goods

description: Job Description  Lead and supervise sales team to achieve sales goals, maintain highest level of customer service, enhance customer relationship, ensure flawless retail operations execution, and coach/ develop sales team. Sales management Achieve sales target (including general, category/ strategic product and special event sales target). Achieve sales related KPIs target (conversion rate, numbers of transactions and average sales per transaction). Improve low sales performing stores by proper action planning and execution. Headcount and T&E control. Productivity management for store and sales staff level. Store operations Ensure proper functioning of all sales support systems e.g. POS, GE, COMPASS, IT, Security. Ensure stores follow the inventory related management guideline/ policy (product transfer in/ out and inventory counts) to maintain high inventory accuracy rate. Ensure stores follow the company compliance process, guideline and policy. Ensure stores are properly maintained including display, facilities, interior and exterior decoration, ambience. Customer and CRM Enhance and improve service level of stores, achieve service related KPIs (MSP, TEI and Tiffany Touch). Enhance customer relationship, achieve CRM related KPIs (data capture rate, CD100 repeat purchase/ return rate and special project initiated by central). S taff management and development Train and coach area managers for sales, service, operations and CRM management Motivate sales team to maximize store/ team performance. Manage store structure and headcount to maximize productivity and sales growth. Lead by example and increase on-site participation and supervision. Cross functional teaming Work closely with Retail Operations department to ensure that stores/ areas will achieve all kinds of sales, service and operations related targets. Work closely with other departments (HR, Finance, Marketing, CVM and Merchandising) to provide support from sales team, and ensure stores will achieve respective targets. Bachelor degree and above 10 years or above retail management experience, luxury brand preferred Number sensitive and analytical skill, business accumn Entrepreneur spirit Strong team building and leadership & coaching skills Strong interpersonal, communication and organizational skills Must be well organized, detailed oriented, sales driven, self motivated and can work under pressure Fluency in written and spoken English and Chinese Willing to travel on business
industries: Apparel & Fashion, Luxury Goods & Jewelry, and Retail

description: Responsibilities 根据区域市场策略完成销售目标； 收集所辖区域产品的市场信息，与上级主管共同制定并执行所辖区域、产品的市场推广与销售计划 组织协调资源，完成公司下达的销售、市场、公关、服务等工作目标； 按照公司订单流程及时处理订单，通过与客户交流，及时搜集、反馈客户投诉、意见、建议，敦促公司快速响应，提高客户满意度； 积极完成公司和主管布置的工作任务。 Basic Qualifications 有生物/临床医学/医学检验，或相关专业背景，大专以上学历； 2-3年相关市场和销售工作经验（临床检验类产品销售经验者优先）； 善于学习，勇于创新； 4有良好的沟通能力，执行能力,为人诚恳，踏实肯干。

description: Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Execute within a well defined sales/commercial framework. There is generally a step by step sequence of standard tasks which need to be followed to achieve an end result. Work is typically subject to tight oversight. This may be in form of human or systems checking. May be responsible for supporting targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  向指定客户销售时，新增客户通常很少，并且通常需要经过审查。包括单个业务组/P&L 中的关键客户 发展自身所学学科内的概念性知识。了解自己的销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群。可能包括具有广泛领域内专业知识或技术知识的支持角色。 应用从教育或过去的经验中发展的业务常识。了解自己团队的工作如何为该地区做出贡献。 使用规定程序解决问题。向主管或更多高级团队成员咨询定义的说明/参数之外的问题。 与他人合作解决问题。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。交流技术信息，提出问题并检查理解程度。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够独立工作。较强的解决问题能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: Job Summary Job Summary  As a Tory Burch Sales Associate you are responsible for delivering a transformational customer experience, building our brand one customer at a time and ultimately driving our business through sales. You should demonstrate a strong commitment to service, a genuine curiosity and interest in people, authenticity, fashion & style sensibility, and exceptional selling skills. The ideal candidate also understands how to be a team player, is savvy about the visual and operational aspects of the role, and is committed to loss prevention.  Responsibilities  JOB DESCRIPTION  Drive the Business & Deliver Results Achievement of personal sales and metric goals. Build and maintain new and existing customer relationships. Maintain a solid, organized client book which furthers your customer relationships and generates consistent, proactive sales volume, following the standards of our clienteling philosophy. Be aware of and react to the rhythm of your business, not just relying on walk-in traffic but through clienteling, outreach and event opportunities. Be Buddy/Team Player Lead by example and model behavior that reflects the company’s core values. Appropriately manage conflict and take ownership for your part in the team dynamic. Demonstrate a high degree of maturity and integrity. Contribute to a positive atmosphere that is fun, professional, productive and team oriented. Create The Customer Experience Contribute to an environment that consistently delivers on the five stages of the transformational customer experience. Demonstrate strong use of selling skills. Ensure a high level of customer service through extensive product knowledge and product ownership. Take ownership for the transformational experience in your boutique – customize it for your customer demographic and develop & maintain productive customer relationships. Maintain a “One Company” perspective on charge sends, returns, and other such transactions that are critical to a positive customer experience. Have a thorough understanding and use of the technology tools that support the customer experience Represent the Brand Understand and communicate the Tory Burch brand philosophy and lifestyle with each other and the customer. Emulate the brand aesthetic and embody a strong sense of fashion and an enthusiastic attitude. Contribute to maintaining all brand and operating standards to support brand consistency. Assist in maintaining store presentation standards. Leverage in-store technology to ensure every customer’s experience is transformational. Operational Excellence Ensure all sales and operational policies and procedures are followed and maintained. Accurately process all POS transactions and capture of customer information and assist when necessary with operational and back of house activities. Adhere to all policies and procedures with a focus on loss prevention and operational excellence. Have a proper understanding of the radio communication and all technology tools used in-store, using proper etiquette. Detailed oriented with ability to multi-task and prioritize work to prioritize work to produce desired outcomes. Prior Experience Needed 1-3 years of experience in a high volume, customer-driven retail environment. Strong personal selling and customer relations experience, along with verbal and written communication skills. Requirements Must have open availability for a flexible work schedule that meets the needs of the business, including overnights, evenings, holidays and weekend shifts. Ability to lift (at least 40 lbs), carry, push, pull, squat, kneel, twist, turn, climb ladders, crawl, reach, bend and stand for extended periods of time. Must be at least 18 years of age. Core Skills Adaptable – Change before you have to Changes course easily – Knows when to be patient and when to push – Works well in the gray – Shows grace under pressure – Owns mistakes and learns from them – Balances multiple priorities Entrepreneurial Spirit – Own it Takes initiative, doesn’t wait for direction – Builds for the future – Takes personal ownership and accountability – Is resourceful in getting things done Collaborative – No “I” in Tory Is self-aware and open-minded – Integrates the perspectives of others – Is direct but respectful – Communicates cross functionally – Knows when to get people involved and when to make a decision – Takes an inclusive approach Client & Brand Focus – Put yourself in Tory’s shoes Passionate about the brand and the work – Creates a transformational client experience – Makes decisions in the best interest of the company and our customers – Focuses on internal and external customers Live the Values – Being “Buddy” Keeps the “Buddy Values” alive (Kindness, humility, warmth, honesty, loyalty, compassion, integrity, and passion) – It’s not just what you do, but how you do it – Contributes to a positive and productive environment Functional Expertise – Know Your Stuff Has the skills necessary to perform the job – Keeps current on trends, skills, and practices – Puts learning into practice FOR PEOPLE MANAGERS: Team Builder – It’s all about “We” Sets team goals and roles – Develops, motivates and empowers – Delivers constructive and encouraging feedback – Holds people accountable for results – Recognizes high performance FOR PEOPLE MANAGERS: Change Leader – Change is the essence of life Challenges the current point of view – Puts changes in context for the team – Executes changes that impact the business – Is proactive and positive – Listens to and keeps the team up to speed Equal Employment Opportunity Statement  Tory Burch LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and provides equal opportunities to all employees and applicants without regard to an individual’s age, race, creed, color, religion, national origin, sex (including pregnancy) or sexual orientation, gender expression, military status, marital status, genetic predisposition or carrier status, disability or membership in any other protected class under applicable law. Likewise, we will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories for employment in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring, Ordinance No. 184652. Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records for employment.  Disability Accommodation  Tory Burch is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants and employees with disabilities. Please tell us if you require a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job or to perform your job. Examples of reasonable accommodation include making a change to the application process or work procedures, providing documents in an alternate format, using a sign language interpreter, or using specialized equipment. If you require assistance or an accommodation with the hiring process, please contact talent@toryburch.com .
industries: Apparel & Fashion, Consumer Goods, and Retail

Ability to lift (at least 40 lbs), carry, push, pull, squat, kneel, twist, turn, climb ladders, crawl, reach, bend and stand for extended periods of time. Must be at least 18 years of age. Core Skills Adaptable – Change before you have to Changes course easily – Knows when to be patient and when to push – Works well in the gray – Shows grace under pressure – Owns mistakes and learns from them – Balances multiple priorities Entrepreneurial Spirit – Own it Takes initiative, doesn’t wait for direction – Builds for the future – Takes personal ownership and accountability – Is resourceful in getting things done Collaborative – No “I” in Tory Is self-aware and open-minded – Integrates the perspectives of others – Is direct but respectful – Communicates cross functionally – Knows when to get people involved and when to make a decision – Takes an inclusive approach Client & Brand Focus – Put yourself in Tory’s shoes Passionate about the brand and the work – Creates a transformational client experience – Makes decisions in the best interest of the company and our customers – Focuses on internal and external customers Live the Values – Being “Buddy” Keeps the “Buddy Values” alive (Kindness, humility, warmth, honesty, loyalty, compassion, integrity, and passion) – It’s not just what you do, but how you do it – Contributes to a positive and productive environment It’s all about “We” Sets team goals and roles – Develops, motivates and empowers – Delivers constructive and encouraging feedback – Holds people accountable for results – Recognizes high performance FOR PEOPLE MANAGERS: Change Leader – Change is the essence of life Challenges the current point of view – Puts changes in context for the team – Executes changes that impact the business – Is proactive and positive – Listens to and keeps the team up to speed Equal Employment Opportunity Statement  Tory Burch LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and provides equal opportunities description: Job Description  -Local Sales Representative, Part-Time，Flexible，Working at Home At Polymer, we would be nothing without our successful sales team. We are now seeking several local sales reps to help us sell the products and services that our customers have grown to rely on. The sales representative is mainly responsible for severing retailers from your town who are interested in B2B business. This position offers considerable profit from each successful order. Essential Responsibilities  •  Build and maintain relationships and sales revenues with assigned customers by learning and understanding their needs and providing solutions. •  Deliver sales results that meet or exceed metrics by driving lead generation, building sales pipelines and generating sales opportunities. •  Develop, monitor, and analyze data to improve sales performance across the department by making recommendations. •  Account management of medium to large accounts, including maintaining existing clients, prospecting and signing new clients.  Skills and Qualifications ·        No educational requirements ·        Excellent communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, presentation, and organizational skills ·        Good level in English communication Preferred Qualifications ·        3-5 years in sales within an international trade company setting ·        Knowledge and practice about international transfer ·        Social-network across varied industries, especially 3C and cosmetic industries ·        Mandarin or Cantonese speaker About the Company  Polymer is a mature company that highly participating in B2B business, specializing in the cross-border e-commerce business and international commodity trades. With groups of factory owners and foreign trade experts gathered, we aim at promoting high-quality and low-priced Chinese products to the global market, creating sufficient profit margins for local sellers, and achieving win-win cooperation with international enterprises. We had developed highly efficient transportation pipelines, steady and rich cooperation with Chinese local industries, not only our own OEM factories, but also a large number of other united factories. By advocating integrity management, we proceed worldwide trades with prestigious. Being a global enterprise, Polymer shows its inclusiveness, we highly value great cultural diversity, people of any cultural background and nationality are welcomed to join us.

本公司为某中日合资企业； 产品为工业用空气压缩机和空气处理系统； 公司2020年产值近4亿元人民币，国内同行业排名前5位，2021年持续增长； 海外团队正在抓紧建设，广招有识之士共同参与； 公司官网：www.united-compressor.com  职责描述： 工作内容偏企业市场策划方向； 英文标书，说明书的排编（含译后编辑）和校对； 中英文宣传材料，文案的编排； 兼管负责MIC，LINKEDIN等媒体平台的更新，维护； 与外协单位联系，完成市场部任务； 客户需求与公司产品经理有序对接。  技能要求： 语言逻辑好，英文书面表达无障碍； 必须熟练MS Office, 不怵学习使用Adobe Acrobat, Photoshop, Illustrator, Premier或其他视频编辑工具等； 英语六级以上，专业八级为佳； 加分技能：西班牙语，俄语，越语，印尼语，马来语等小语种；  福利与待遇： 公司薪资待遇为14薪； 转正后公司按劳动法为员工； 双休，公假，工作时间8：30 - 17：00； 公司包午餐并承担差遣，商务开销； 不定期外出学习及拓展； 年底双薪+带薪年假+表现优秀者有额外嘉奖、旅游等福利。  个人素质 性格内外兼修，做事认真仔细，有担当善学习； 为人和善友好，诚实可信； 身体健康，无慢性疾患，无不良嗜好。  工作地点 公司总部和研发中心：上海嘉定南翔科技园嘉美路201号； 中日合资工厂：常熟开发区； 结合工作需求偶尔会有三地派调，公司配车，当天往返。

Job Description Summary  You will be responsible for creating and winning sales opportunities for their products/solutions/services in an assigned territory, and/or in a list of named accounts individually or as part of a One GE Healthcare team. Act as the clinical/technical expert to establish and continuously develop the relationship with departmental and technical decision makers in their assigned accounts and where applicable work in conjunction with Account Executives and Managers to gain access to C-Suite decision makers.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Roles and Responsibilities  •            支持所负责区域内销售团队 CT 产品销售，并制定区域内CT 销售策略及整体解决方案。  Support field sales team to sell CT equipment and business solutions to customers within Area.  •            积极跟进市场动态，包括竞争对手情况、客户需求、产品应用情况并制定分析报告来协助产品部、区域销售团队的业务进行预测和计划。  •            Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for Modality sales team, product team& field sales team.  •            与负责区域内的关键客户保持紧密沟通，推动 CT新产品及临床开发，收集客户对GE 产品以及服务的第一手反馈和需求，发掘并培养GE 讲者。  •            Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE.  •            与区域销售经理密切合作，准备和协调投标所需要的文件。  •            Prepare and co-ordinate tender response and validate tender documentation in collaboration with territory manager.  •            创建并维护客户档案，包括保持对决策者的长期跟进。  •            Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers.  •            协助区域销售经理做好销售跟进工作，确保并提升客户满意度。  •            Assist the territory manager with post sale follow up in order to ensure customer satisfaction.  Required Qualifications  •          5年以上医疗领域工作经验，最好具备CT销售、技术或临床工作经验。  More than 5 years working medical industry experience, preferably CT commercial, technical or clinical background.  •          本科学历以上，临床医学背景优先  •          Bachelor and above degree, preferably in Clinical Medical background  •          优秀内、外部沟通技巧。  •          Excellent communication skills, both internally and externally  •          较强的人际交往能力，能与他人建立稳固的关系  •          Strong interpersonal acumen be able to build up solid relationship with people  •          团队协作（包括利用资源实现目标的能力）  •          Team working skills (including ability to harness resources to achieve goal).  •          敏锐的商业触觉，对市场动态敏感，具备战略思维能力  •          Good business acumen, sensitivity to the dynamics in market place, with good strategic thinking capacity;  •          良好的英语听说读写能力  •          Good command of English both in oral and written.  •          良好的演讲能力  •          Good presentation skills  Inclusion and Diversity   GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No

description: Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Execute within a well defined sales/commercial framework. There is generally a step by step sequence of standard tasks which need to be followed to achieve an end result. Work is typically subject to tight oversight. This may be in form of human or systems checking. May be responsible for supporting targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  向合作伙伴和分销商销售或通过其进行销售。可能包括渠道销售支持和渠道开发职责。 发展自身所学学科内的概念性知识。了解自己的销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群。可能包括具有广泛领域内专业知识或技术知识的支持角色。 应用从教育或过去的经验中发展的业务常识。了解自己团队的工作如何为该地区做出贡献。 使用规定程序解决问题。向主管或更多高级团队成员咨询定义的说明/参数之外的问题。 与他人合作解决问题。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。交流技术信息，提出问题并检查理解程度。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够独立工作。较强的解决问题能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. description: At Branch, we’re transforming how brands and users interact across digital platforms. Our mobile marketing and deep linking solutions are trusted to deliver seamless experiences that increase ROI, decrease wasted spend, and eliminate siloed attribution. Our team consists of smart, humble, and collaborative people who value ownership over all we do to create a product, team, and company that lives and breathes our motto: Build Together, Grow Together, Win Together. As a Sales Development Representative (SDR) at Branch, you’ll prospect and identify key decision-makers at target companies and lay the foundation for a strong relationship in Greater China Region. You should be eager to advance in our organization by demonstrating their ability to be tenacious self-starters every day. You understand the sales process, can build relationships with the right decision-makers, and can succinctly define and communicate the specific benefits of Branch appropriate for each user. You will be a key driver of growth for the company, and on the front lines for evangelizing our product to prospective and existing users. As an SDR, you'll get to: Conduct outbound calls and send outreach emails daily in order to prospect, educate, thoroughly qualify, and develop target accounts. Responsible for building sales pipeline by meeting and exceeding lead generation quotas. Research accounts, identify decision-makers, generate interest and develop relationships with important stakeholders. Create and prioritize strategic target account lists within a defined territory (through emailing, strategic calling, social selling, etc.) Provide feedback to ensure continuous process optimization. Partner closely with account executives to build and iterate on strategies. Consistently meet and drive to exceed month-to-month quotas and metrics.  You'll be a good fit if you have: No prior working experience is required. A university degree, preferably with overseas experience. Excellent problem-solving ability. Excellent time management with organizational skills. The ability to work in a fast-paced, evolving, team environment. Excellent written/verbal communication skills in English and Chinese. Motivation, drive and a self-starter attitude. Proficiency in Cantonese (Bonus).  A little bit about us:  Branch has raised more than $330M from investors such as NEA, Founders Fund, and Playground Ventures.  We are headquartered in Silicon Valley and have a presence all over the world. Diversity at Branch ranks in the top 10% for similarly sized companies (by Comparably). We are ranked as the #3 fastest growing company in North America on Deloitte’s 2020 Technology Fast 500 list.  In 2020, we are recognized as one of Forbes Best Startups, Great Places to Work, and Bay Area Best Places to Work. We have more than 3 billion monthly users and are partnered with over 75,000 apps.  If you think you’d be a good fit for this role, we’d love for you to apply! At Branch, we strive to create an inclusive culture that encourages people from different backgrounds to bring their unique, diverse perspectives to work. We aim every day to build an environment that empowers us all to do the best work of our lives, and we can’t wait to show you what we have to offer!
industries: Computer Software
