description: Job Summary Job Summary  As a Tory Burch Sales Associate you are responsible for delivering a transformational customer experience, building our brand one customer at a time and ultimately driving our business through sales. You should demonstrate a strong commitment to service, a genuine curiosity and interest in people, authenticity, fashion & style sensibility, and exceptional selling skills. The ideal candidate also understands how to be a team player, is savvy about the visual and operational aspects of the role, and is committed to loss prevention.  Responsibilities  JOB DESCRIPTION  Drive the Business & Deliver Results Achievement of personal sales and metric goals. Build and maintain new and existing customer relationships. Maintain a solid, organized client book which furthers your customer relationships and generates consistent, proactive sales volume, following the standards of our clienteling philosophy. Be aware of and react to the rhythm of your business, not just relying on walk-in traffic but through clienteling, outreach and event opportunities. Be Buddy/Team Player Lead by example and model behavior that reflects the company’s core values. Appropriately manage conflict and take ownership for your part in the team dynamic. Demonstrate a high degree of maturity and integrity. Contribute to a positive atmosphere that is fun, professional, productive and team oriented. Create The Customer Experience Contribute to an environment that consistently delivers on the five stages of the transformational customer experience. Demonstrate strong use of selling skills. Ensure a high level of customer service through extensive product knowledge and product ownership. Take ownership for the transformational experience in your boutique – customize it for your customer demographic and develop & maintain productive customer relationships. Maintain a “One Company” perspective on charge sends, returns, and other such transactions that are critical to a positive customer experience. Have a thorough understanding and use of the technology tools that support the customer experience Represent the Brand Understand and communicate the Tory Burch brand philosophy and lifestyle with each other and the customer. Emulate the brand aesthetic and embody a strong sense of fashion and an enthusiastic attitude. Contribute to maintaining all brand and operating standards to support brand consistency. Assist in maintaining store presentation standards. Leverage in-store technology to ensure every customer’s experience is transformational. Operational Excellence Ensure all sales and operational policies and procedures are followed and maintained. Accurately process all POS transactions and capture of customer information and assist when necessary with operational and back of house activities. Adhere to all policies and procedures with a focus on loss prevention and operational excellence. Have a proper understanding of the radio communication and all technology tools used in-store, using proper etiquette. Detailed oriented with ability to multi-task and prioritize work to prioritize work to produce desired outcomes. Prior Experience Needed 1-3 years of experience in a high volume, customer-driven retail environment. Strong personal selling and customer relations experience, along with verbal and written communication skills. Requirements Must have open availability for a flexible work schedule that meets the needs of the business, including overnights, evenings, holidays and weekend shifts. Ability to lift (at least 40 lbs), carry, push, pull, squat, kneel, twist, turn, climb ladders, crawl, reach, bend and stand for extended periods of time. Must be at least 18 years of age. Core Skills Adaptable – Change before you have to Changes course easily – Knows when to be patient and when to push – Works well in the gray – Shows grace under pressure – Owns mistakes and learns from them – Balances multiple priorities Entrepreneurial Spirit – Own it Takes initiative, doesn’t wait for direction – Builds for the future – Takes personal ownership and accountability – Is resourceful in getting things done Collaborative – No “I” in Tory Is self-aware and open-minded – Integrates the perspectives of others – Is direct but respectful – Communicates cross functionally – Knows when to get people involved and when to make a decision – Takes an inclusive approach Client & Brand Focus – Put yourself in Tory’s shoes Passionate about the brand and the work – Creates a transformational client experience – Makes decisions in the best interest of the company and our customers – Focuses on internal and external customers Live the Values – Being “Buddy” Keeps the “Buddy Values” alive (Kindness, humility, warmth, honesty, loyalty, compassion, integrity, and passion) – It’s not just what you do, but how you do it – Contributes to a positive and productive environment Functional Expertise – Know Your Stuff Has the skills necessary to perform the job – Keeps current on trends, skills, and practices – Puts learning into practice FOR PEOPLE MANAGERS: Team Builder – It’s all about “We” Sets team goals and roles – Develops, motivates and empowers – Delivers constructive and encouraging feedback – Holds people accountable for results – Recognizes high performance FOR PEOPLE MANAGERS: Change Leader – Change is the essence of life Challenges the current point of view – Puts changes in context for the team – Executes changes that impact the business – Is proactive and positive – Listens to and keeps the team up to speed Equal Employment Opportunity Statement  Tory Burch LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and provides equal opportunities to all employees and applicants without regard to an individual’s age, race, creed, color, religion, national origin, sex (including pregnancy) or sexual orientation, gender expression, military status, marital status, genetic predisposition or carrier status, disability or membership in any other protected class under applicable law. Likewise, we will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories for employment in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring, Ordinance No. 184652. Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records for employment.  Disability Accommodation  Tory Burch is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants and employees with disabilities. Please tell us if you require a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job or to perform your job. Examples of reasonable accommodation include making a change to the application process or work procedures, providing documents in an alternate format, using a sign language interpreter, or using specialized equipment. If you require assistance or an accommodation with the hiring process, please contact talent@toryburch.com .
industries: Apparel & Fashion, Consumer Goods, and Retail

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Responsibilities Pre-sales activity will include delivery of technical expertise during the sales process including presentations, seminars, individual consultation, and hands-on demo experiments if needed. Executes technical and application based presentations on illumina’s sequencing and microarray platforms, applications and/or workflows. Post-sales activity includes working with post-installation customers providing additional workflow or applications training in strategically important labs. Supporting/assisting customers with sequencing assay design to accelerate adoption of targeted sequencing on illumina’s platforms. Attendance at tradeshows/conferences in relevant fields. Be the point person for dedicated illumina User Group Meetings in collaboration with field marketing and support team to provide sample to data workflow training Assists sales and field marketing on new strategic initiatives requiring both technical and market knowledge Works collaboratively with territory account managers, marketing, service and support teams to ensure effective account/customer management and communication through pre-sales, during and- post-sales cycle, including review and meeting account pull through targets and goals Escalates technical issues to Technical Support for possible resolution for strategically important labs. Develops and maintain positive relationships with customers in assigned territory Responsibilities Pre-sales activity will include delivery of technical expertise during the sales process including presentations, seminars, individual consultation, and hands-on demo experiments if needed. Executes technical and application based presentations on illumina’s sequencing and microarray platforms, applications and/or workflows. Post-sales activity includes working with post-installation customers providing additional workflow or applications training in strategically important labs. Supporting/assisting customers with sequencing assay design to accelerate adoption of targeted sequencing on illumina’s platforms. Attendance at tradeshows/conferences in relevant fields. Be the point person for dedicated illumina User Group Meetings in collaboration with field marketing and support team to provide sample to data workflow training Assists sales and field marketing on new strategic initiatives requiring both technical and market knowledge Works collaboratively with territory account managers, marketing, service and support teams to ensure effective account/customer management and communication through pre-sales, during and- post-sales cycle, including review and meeting account pull through targets and goals Escalates technical issues to Technical Support for possible resolution for strategically important labs. Develops and maintain positive relationships with customers in assigned territory Listed responsibilities are an essential, but not exhaustive list, of the usual duties associated with the position. Changes to individual responsibilities may occur due to business needs.  Preferred Requirements Life science industry experience preferred Applied Market Knowledge is a plus Extensive experience and understanding of leading genetics technologies and how they can be applied. Detailed knowledge of technological developments and trends in the sequencing markets Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills in Mandarin and English. Strong negotiation skills and ability to persuade Ability to travel within region to carry out primary responsibilities. All listed requirements are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.  Preferred Experience/Education Typically requires a Bachelor’s degree and a minimum of 0-2 years of related experience; or equivalent work experience. 岗位概述  Responsibilities 售前活动将包括销售过程中的技术知识演讲，如介绍演讲、研讨会、个别咨询等，在必要时，进行演示实验。 对因美纳测序和微阵列平台的应用或工作流程进行技术层面和应用层面的介绍。 售后活动包括与安装产品后的客户的协调，提供在具有重要战略意义的实验室中所需的工作流程或应用培训 支持/辅助客户的相关测序阵列设计，加快在客户因美纳平台上目标测序进程。 参加相关领域的展览会/大会。 作为与现场营销和支持团队合作的专项人员参加因美纳用户组会议，提供样品数据工作流程培训。 提供销售或现场营销新战略项目时所需有关技术和市场知识。 与区域客户经理、营销、服务和支持团队合作工作，保证有效的大客户/客户管理以及负责售前、售中和售后过程的沟通，包括回访和会面已经取得成果或达成目标的客户。 作为技术支持提供技术升级，为具有重要战略意义的实验室提供可能的解决方案。 提升和维护责任区域内客户的良好关系。 以上所列的任务和职责是本岗位的基本功能。然而，各种商务条件下可能需要完成额外的任务和职责。  Preferred Requirements 有生命科学行业经验者优先 有应用市场知识者加分 具有领先的遗传学技术及其应用方面的丰富经验和充分理解 具有技术发展和测序市场趋势的详细知识 优秀的中文普通话和英文口头和书面交流和介绍演讲技能 良好的谈判技巧和说服能力 能在负责区域内出差并完成主要职责 Preferred Experience/Education 科学学科的硕士以上学历（分子生物学、遗传学、或基因组学和/或生物信息学优先）

description: 工作职责:  职务描述摘要  负责帮助销售组织实现业务目标的活动和流程  在遵循说明和工作程序的条件下，执行标准的销售任务。可以根据工作情况的变化重新安排顺序以完成任务/职责。可能负责目标客户、稳定的地区和/或中小型销售地区。  Key Responsibilities Include (but Are Not Limited To) Support field sales team to sell the HCS equipment and business solutions to customers within Area. Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for Modality sales team, product team& field sales team. Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE. Prepare and co-ordinate tender response and validate tender documentation in collaboration with territory manager. Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers. Assist the territory manager with post sale follow up in order to ensure customer satisfaction. 任职条件:  Required Qualifications More than 5 years working experience, preferably in medical industry, either as commercial role, technical or clinical role. Excellent communication skills, both internally and externally. Strong interpersonal acumen, be able to build up solid relationship with people. Team working skills (including ability to harness resources to achieve goal). Good command of English both in oral and written. Good business acumen, sensitivity to the dynamics in market place, with good strategic thinking capacity; Good presentation skills Bachelor and above degree, preferably in Clinical Medical background. Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Total Rewards Statement  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

Same applies to closed positions: if you would like to be considered for similar future positions, register on our career page and email resume@power.com .

description: Gale公司是圣智学习集团（Cengage Learning）旗下全球化的电子资源和教育出版社，主要服务于图书馆、学校和商业领域，以其精确而且权威的参考文献以及杂志和报纸全文内容闻名于世，创建并维护着600多个数据库，而且为用户提供纸本图书，电子图书和缩微胶卷等不同形式的产品内容。  Job title: Sales Executive Job Responsibility: - Expand Gale businesses including print, microfilm and databases in China academic market, schools and public libraries. - Visit customers regularly to maintain existing business and find new potential customers, opportunities and business models. - Achieving monthly and yearly sales target by planning, organizing and implementing selling strategies within assigned region. - Expand, develop and maintain good relationship with customers and distributors. Work with marketing and product teams to develop and implement promotional and marketing plans. - Contribute as a team to meet all sales and financial targets. Qualifications: - Bachelor degree and above from reputable universities. - More than 3 years sales experience with evidence of success, preferably from the Publishing industry. - Can make frequent travels and work under pressure. - Strong negotiating, self-motivated, influencing and conflict resolution skills. - Fluent in both Chinese and English communication.  工作职责： - 面向国内学术市场、学校和公共图书馆推广Gale产品包括纸本图书、数据库以及缩微胶卷等； - 定期拜访维护已有业务并开拓新客户，发现新的销售机会和商业模式； - 完成负责区域内每月的销售任务和年度销售任务； - 发展并维护与客户以及代理商的良好关系； - 与市场和产品部门合作，制定和执行推广和行销计划； - 帮助部门完成全年的销售任务和财务指标。 要求： - 本科学历或以上； - 具备3年以上销售经验，出版行业优先； - 能够为工作需要出差并能承受压力下的工作； - 良好的表达能力、沟通能力和解决问题的能力； - 熟练运用中英文进行沟通交流。 备注：应聘者请同时提供中英文简历 微信公众号：Gale 工作地址 北京市海淀区科学院南路2号融科资讯中心C座南楼707

jobTitle: Sales Development Specialist/销售发展专员__DCCS
description: Company Description  As one of the world’s leading suppliers of drive and control technologies, Bosch Rexroth ensures efficient, powerful and safe movement in machines and systems of any size. The company bundles global application experience in the market segments of Mobile Applications, Machinery Applications and Engineering, and Factory Automation. With its intelligent components, customized system solutions and services, Bosch Rexroth is creating the necessary environment for fully connected applications. Bosch Rexroth offers its customers hydraulics, electric drive and control technology, gear technology and linear motion and assembly technology, including software and interfaces to the Internet of Things. With locations in over 80 countries, more than 31,000 associates generated sales revenue of 6.2 billion euros in 2019.  Since 1978 the company is located in China and established plants in Beijing, Wujin and Xi`an.  To learn more, please visit www.boschrexroth.com  The Bosch Group is a leading global supplier of technology and services. It employs roughly 410,000 associates worldwide (as of December 31, 2018). The company generated sales of 78.5 billion euros in 2018. Its operations are divided into four business sectors: Mobility Solutions, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology. As a leading IoT company, Bosch offers innovative solutions for smart homes, smart cities, connected mobility, and connected manufacturing. It uses its expertise in sensor technology, software, and services, as well as its own IoT cloud, to offer its customers connected, cross-domain solutions from a single source. The Bosch Group’s strategic objective is to deliver innovations for a connected life. Bosch improves quality of life worldwide with products and services that are innovative and spark enthusiasm. In short, Bosch creates technology that is “Invented for life.” The Bosch Group comprises Robert Bosch GmbH and its roughly 460 subsidiary and regional companies in over 60 countries. Including sales and service partners, Bosch’s global manufacturing, engineering, and sales network covers nearly every country in the world. The basis for the company’s future growth is its innovative strength. At 126 locations across the globe, Bosch employs some 72,600 associates in research and development.  Additional information is available online at www.bosch.com, www.iot.bosch.com, www.bosch-press.com, www.twitter.com/BoschPresse.  Job Description Collecting Data on Economic, Industry, Customers & Competitors; 收集市场经济、行业、客户和竞争者的信息; Development of Company strategy & Development plans, market share analysis, other related business, planning activities; 通过市场占比分析、策划活动和相关业务，支持公司战略发展和发展计划; Market study & Analysis. Derive recommendations for business opportunities; 通过市场研究和分析驱动相关业务机会; Formulate & Derive corporate level strategy; 制定和驱动公司层面战略发展; Internal consultant/ BU strategy planning/ Provide strategy methodology support. 作为内部咨询，制定业务单元战略，提供战略方法相关支持。  Qualifications Bachelor degree or above； 本科学历或以上； Excellent business analytical skills, keen data insight, and structured thinking skills; 具备优秀的商业分析能力，敏锐的数据洞察力，结构化的思维能力; Experienced in business analysis on related industries, understanding multi-channel business model is preferred; 具有相关行业业务分析的经验，了解多渠道业务模式者优先; Good command in Excel, PowerPoint, Power BI and SAP, familiar with other mainstream databases is preferred; 熟练使用Excel，PowerPoint，Power BI和SAP，熟悉主流数据库优先; Good learning ability, communication skills, and team spirit; 具备良好的学习能力、沟通能力和团队精神; Fluent written and oral English. 英语听说读写良好。
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Computer Software, and Automotive

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  主要工作职责： 完成销售任务，包括负责并跟进项目销售，维护销售渠道，加强市场覆盖，有计划的进行产品推广等 Achieve sales target, including taking in charge of project sales and follow-up, maintaining sales channel and enhancing market coverage, product promotion based on plan, etc. 根据公司战略和政策，定期拜访客户，完成维护和开发新经销商和潜在客户的工作任务，包括但不仅限于协调工厂和客户关系，确保客户及时得到新产品、服务、价格以及各种变化等的信息 According to company’s strategy and policy, regularly visit clients and conduct maintaining and developing new dealers and potential customers’ task, including but not limited to coordinating the relationship between plant and customers, ensuring clients to have prompt information about new product, service, price and any other changes. 提供给经销商相应的技术培训及销售方法培训，运作、指导和联合推广会等手段以提高经销商的销售能力 Provide relative technical and sales method training to dealers, improve dealers’ sales ability by different ways including conduct, instruct and unite promotion seminars. 提供销售预测、市场动向、客户习惯以及竞争对手活动的报告 Prepares reports on sales forecast, market trends, consumer habits and competitive activities 按时完成各种报告，并按公司规定有效使用客户管理系统 Complete all kinds of reports and effectively use CRM system based on company’s regulation  任职要求： 本科及以上学历, 理工科或市场营销等相关专业毕业优先 2.2年以上销售经验(暖通或应用于建筑的相关产品)，有采暖或给水产品销售经验尤佳 具备渠道管理经验，有相关工程项目销售经验者尤佳 熟悉采暖类产品和市场 具备销售推广能力；良好的演讲、培训能力 年龄范围24岁到35岁

description: Job Description  Come work at a place where innovation and teamwork come together to support the most exciting missions in the world!  F5 empowers creators of the new digital world  The F5 Digital Sales organization is a newly formed global sales organization with an opportunity to be a tremendous revenue growth engine for the company. The F5 solution, now combined with NGINX and Shape Security bridges the gap between NetOps and DevOps with multi-cloud application services that span from code to customer. This role is part of an exciting new team that is at the forefront of establishing cutting-edge opportunistic sales motions leveraging AI, digital marketing, big data and analytics to drive impactful demand response and targeted sales coverage.  The F5 Multi-Cloud Application Services Platform enables enterprises undergoing digital transformation to modernize legacy, monolithic applications, as well as deliver new, microservices-based applications. Companies like Netflix, Starbucks, and McDonalds rely on F5 Networks to reduce costs, improve resiliency, and speed innovation.  F5 Networks is searching for an enthusiastic, eager-to-learn Business Development Representative (BDR) to join the growing sales team in China. If you are an early aspirant in your sales career or looking to work in a fast paced dynamic work environment, F5 is the perfect place for you!  This position requires previous experience with prospecting within greenfield accounts (acquiring new logos). BDR candidates during the interview should not only be able to demonstrate the ability to comprehend F5 Solutions, but also the ability to pitch this effectively to new customers. They will also be expected to articulate how they would be creative and thoughtful in their approach to solicit a response from prospects. This position is an in-office role that requires working from the F5 office in Beijing China.  Responsibilities Schedule highly qualified meetings from inbound and outbound campaigns within target accounts for territory sales Leverage prospecting tools such as Salesforce’s High Velocity Sales, LinkedIn Sales Navigator or other local social media, and outbound calling techniques to schedule meetings with identified target accounts Collaborate with marketing, field sales, and product teams to facilitate new programs, messaging, campaigns, and offerings Ensure inbound requests and opportunity handoffs to sales are successful and exceed the customer's satisfaction Ensure reporting and communications are frequent and bi-directional Exhibit qualities of overachievement, self-motivation, good teamwork, and positive attitude Meet and exceed minimum activity metrics: 50 Dials, 10 conversations, and 50 emails per day Qualifications BS/BA degree or equivalent work experience Min 2 years of sales prospecting experience through social media, cold callings, emails and writing qualification notes Skill in using Salesforce CRM tool for leads management, prospecting, emailing and calling is a must Previous experience with technology companies selling SaaS, IaaS, or PaaS is a plus Fluency in English and one additional regional language F5s culture is built upon our core values: progress, excellence, openness, and curiosity. We’re a growing company with a startup feel and products that are chosen for high performance and efficiency by innovators around the world. If our team has one thing in common, it’s our passion for a multi-cloud application services and dedication to a global suite of products that’s loved by a loyal base of F5 fans for over 20 years.  Physical Demands and Work Environment Duties are performed in a normal office environment while sitting at a desk or computer table. Duties require the ability to utilize a computer, communicate over the telephone, and read printed material. Duties may require the ability to travel via automobile or airplane, not exceeding 10% of the time spent traveling. F5 Networks is an equal opportunity employer and strongly supports diversity in the workplace.  The Job Description is intended to be a general representation of the responsibilities and requirements of the job. However, the description may not be all-inclusive, and responsibilities and requirements are subject to change.Phishing Alert  Please note that F5 only contacts candidates through F5 email address (ending with @f5.com) or auto email notification from Yello/Workday (ending with f5.com or @myworkday.com).  Equal Employment Opportunity  It is the policy of F5 to provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and employment applicants without regard to unlawful considerations of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, sensory, physical, or mental disability,marital status, veteran or military status, genetic information, or any other classification protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws.This policy applies to all aspects of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, discipline, and termination. description: Job Summary Job Summary  As a Tory Burch Sales Associate you are responsible for delivering a transformational customer experience, building our brand one customer at a time and ultimately driving our business through sales. You should demonstrate a strong commitment to service, a genuine curiosity and interest in people, authenticity, fashion & style sensibility, and exceptional selling skills. The ideal candidate also understands how to be a team player, is savvy about the visual and operational aspects of the role, and is committed to loss prevention.  Responsibilities  JOB DESCRIPTION  Drive the Business & Deliver Results Achievement of personal sales and metric goals. Build and maintain new and existing customer relationships. Maintain a solid, organized client book which furthers your customer relationships and generates consistent, proactive sales volume, following the standards of our clienteling philosophy. Be aware of and react to the rhythm of your business, not just relying on walk-in traffic but through clienteling, outreach and event opportunities. Be Buddy/Team Player Lead by example and model behavior that reflects the company’s core values. Appropriately manage conflict and take ownership for your part in the team dynamic. Demonstrate a high degree of maturity and integrity. Contribute to a positive atmosphere that is fun, professional, productive and team oriented. Create The Customer Experience Contribute to an environment that consistently delivers on the five stages of the transformational customer experience. Demonstrate strong use of selling skills. Ensure a high level of customer service through extensive product knowledge and product ownership. Take ownership for the transformational experience in your boutique – customize it for your customer demographic and develop & maintain productive customer relationships. Maintain a “One Company” perspective on charge sends, returns, and other such transactions that are critical to a positive customer experience. Have a thorough understanding and use of the technology tools that support the customer experience Represent the Brand Understand and communicate the Tory Burch brand philosophy and lifestyle with each other and the customer. Emulate the brand aesthetic and embody a strong sense of fashion and an enthusiastic attitude. Contribute to maintaining all brand and operating standards to support brand consistency. Assist in maintaining store presentation standards. Leverage in-store technology to ensure every customer’s experience is transformational. Operational Excellence Ensure all sales and operational policies and procedures are followed and maintained. Accurately process all POS transactions and capture of customer information and assist when necessary with operational and back of house activities. Adhere to all policies and procedures with a focus on loss prevention and operational excellence. Have a proper understanding of the radio communication and all technology tools used in-store, using proper etiquette. Detailed oriented with ability to multi-task and prioritize work to prioritize work to produce desired outcomes. Prior Experience Needed 1-3 years of experience in a high volume, customer-driven retail environment. Strong personal selling and customer relations experience, along with verbal and written communication skills. Requirements Must have open availability for a flexible work schedule that meets the needs of the business, including overnights, evenings, holidays and weekend shifts. Ability to lift (at least 40 lbs), carry, push, pull, squat, kneel, twist, turn, climb ladders, crawl, reach, bend and stand for extended periods of time. Must be at least 18 years of age. Core Skills Adaptable – Change before you have to Changes course easily – Knows when to be patient and when to push – Works well in the gray – Shows grace under pressure – Owns mistakes and learns from them – Balances multiple priorities Entrepreneurial Spirit – Own it Takes initiative, doesn’t wait for direction – Builds for the future – Takes personal ownership and accountability – Is resourceful in getting things done Collaborative – No “I” in Tory Is self-aware and open-minded – Integrates the perspectives of others – Is direct but respectful – Communicates cross functionally – Knows when to get people involved and when to make a decision – Takes an inclusive approach Client & Brand Focus – Put yourself in Tory’s shoes Passionate about the brand and the work – Creates a transformational client experience – Makes decisions in the best interest of the company and our customers – Focuses on internal and external customers Live the Values – Being “Buddy” Keeps the “Buddy Values” alive (Kindness, humility, warmth, honesty, loyalty, compassion, integrity, and passion) – It’s not just what you do, but how you do it – Contributes to a positive and productive environment Functional Expertise – Know Your Stuff Has the skills necessary to perform the job – Keeps current on trends, skills, and practices – Puts learning into practice FOR PEOPLE MANAGERS: Team Builder – It’s all about “We” Sets team goals and roles – Develops, motivates and empowers – Delivers constructive and encouraging feedback – Holds people accountable for results – Recognizes high performance FOR PEOPLE MANAGERS: Change Leader – Change is the essence of life Challenges the current point of view – Puts changes in context for the team – Executes changes that impact the business – Is proactive and positive – Listens to and keeps the team up to speed Equal Employment Opportunity Statement  Tory Burch LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and provides equal opportunities to all employees and applicants without regard to an individual’s age, race, creed, color, religion, national origin, sex (including pregnancy) or sexual orientation, gender expression, military status, marital status, genetic predisposition or carrier status, disability or membership in any other protected class under applicable law. Likewise, we will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories for employment in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring, Ordinance No. 184652. Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records for employment.  Disability Accommodation  Tory Burch is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants and employees with disabilities. Please tell us if you require a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job or to perform your job. Examples of reasonable accommodation include making a change to the application process or work procedures, providing documents in an alternate format, using a sign language interpreter, or using specialized equipment. If you require assistance or an accommodation with the hiring process, please contact talent@toryburch.com .

description: Bayer is a global enterprise with core competencies in the Life Science fields of health care and agriculture. Its products and services are designed to benefit people and improve their quality of life. At Bayer you have the opportunity to be part of a culture where we value the passion of our employees to innovate and give them the power to change  E-Commerce Account Manager  Your Tasks And Responsibilities Lead the OTC products launching process via CBEC model, both via B2C and C2C channels. Setting and deploying tailored made OTC business strategy for both Flagship store and EKA Groups, understanding decision making process/decision makers' identification in platforms. Clear strategy and KPI set up/ sales plans / promotions activities plans for both Flagship store and EKA platforms according to company strategy. Regular sales results monitoring, making analysis, improvement action plans execution. Correction steps undertaking if needed. Expand the OTC distribution to flagship store and EKA platforms; build up then maintain strong relationship with distributors, TPs and platforms. Collaborate with marketing team to build OTC brands to a scalable level in mainland China. Build up the business relationship with EC platforms in a professional way, e.g. develop and execute annual business plan and drive regular business reviews & engagement with key E-commerce platforms. Responsible for HK C2C exploration, distributor development and SKU expansion. Who You Are Bachelor degree or above. 5+ years working experience with at least 3+ years eCommerce business experience, C2C is a plus. Strong ability to build trust with and influencing internal and external business partners. Effective working in a fast paced and fluid environment that requires strong ownership, bias for actions, ability to prioritize, and deliver high quality results. Ability to think and act both strategically and tactically from developing strategic plans, working with large amount of data, to applying metrics to test hypotheses, develop insights, and quantify results. Demonstrating strong learning capabilities on new skills, new methodology etc. YOUR APPLICATION  If your background and personal experience fit this profile, please send us your complete application at www.career.bayer.cn If you have any recommendations, please kindly send mail to cnreferral@bayer.com  L ocation:  China : ShangHai : ShangHai  Division:  Consumer Health  Reference Code:  434344
industries: Chemicals, Pharmaceuticals, and Biotechnology

description: Summary  This position plays a key role in creating and developing opportunities for new business by generating qualified leads for the ANSYS, Inc. sales team. The focus is to nurture leads with the intent of delivering qualified opportunities to sales based on predetermined criteria. In addition to lead generation and development, the Sales Development Representative is responsible for engaging customers during ANSYS event and tradeshows, updating the CRM databases with information gathered with every prospect contact. Lead development responsibilities require significant engagement (i.e. email and tele-prospecting) in a business to business environment and use of internet/internal database resources to identify and profile new customers. The Sales Development Representative is an active team player, fostering sales and marketing collaboration and alignment towards joint goals.  Responsibilities Support the lead routing and administration process at ANSYS Follow up on prospect inquiries concerning ANSYS software products Research, identify and create new market opportunities through targeted engagement into prospect accounts, speaking with key decision makers to create and develop interest in ANSYS software Engage current accounts to expand awareness, education, referral networks, new opportunities and develop account intelligence Effectively partner and work across the Marketing, Sales and Product teams Work closely with key internal teams to develop account intelligence, relationship maps, and use case opportunities through direct account engagement and insight tools Leverage marketing campaigns (marketing material, seminar, webinar etc.) to develop and nurture leads to opportunity Schedule meetings, appointments and demos Apply sales and technical expertise required to identify leads and pass them to the appropriate opportunity owner Participate in ANSYS events, trade-shows and digitally led customer engagement programs. Drive attendance to ANSYS events in assigned territory Update the CRM database or other databases with lead and/or contact info and account/prospect intelligence gathered in order to provide visibility to market opportunities in assigned territory Provide market feedback to the management team to optimize positioning of offerings Develop and communicate ongoing improvements to the process of prospecting for and qualifying leads Work on special projects as directed by the Director, Global Sales Development and Lead Management Minimum Qualifications Bachelor’s degree required preferably in business, marketing or engineering. 0-3 years’ experience in inside sales function, sales or presales environment of complex technical / industrial products Experience working in a sales and/or customer relations environment Technical aptitude and/or experience in an industrial/technical sales environment Excellent record of customer service and customer satisfaction Skilled at initiating phone discussions and overcoming objections Strong prospecting and lead qualification skills Ability to leverage social media to identify and engage with key decision makers Understanding of sales automation tools (SalesForce.com experience is a plus) and the sales process Outstanding written and verbal communication skills in local language (Chinese) Highly self-motivated and results driven Preferred Qualifications Well-organized, self-directed team player. Remains open to others’ ideas and exhibits willingness to try new things Able to assess business opportunities based on predetermined criteria in order to align opportunities with sales Able to understand industry issues and apply software value statements in order to engage with prospective customers in a meaningful and mutually beneficial manner Ability to formulate communication strategies based on behavior style tendencies Ability to engage with prospective customers based on open probes and creation of value statements Establish and maintain credibility with the internal sales team and prospective customers Effectively communicate value by getting past the gate-keeper and overcoming objections. Adapts to changes in the work environment, manages competing demands and can deal with frequent change, delays or unexpected events Prioritizes and plans work activities, uses time efficiently and develops realistic action plans Willing to take direction, engage in training and apply techniques and constructive criticism to improve performance Demonstrates accuracy and thoroughness and monitors own work to ensure quality and can read and interpret written information Demonstrates professionalism, discretion, and good judgment in all interactions with co-workers, customers, vendors and others Consistently at work on time, follows instructions, responds to management direction
industries: Computer Software

description: The Asian Banker, headquartered in Singapore, with offices in Kuala Lumpur and Beijing, and a representative in Dubai, is the foremost provider of integrated business intelligence to the financial services industry in the Asia-Pacific region.  The Asian Banker covers the "business of banking" in the region. Our core products include research services, consulting, publications as well as high quality forums that cover all countries from Japan to Australia. We are also pushing our coverage westward into Central Asia and the Middle East.  The Company has been present in China since 2001, and has a strong working relationship with all the major financial institutions as well as the regulators in the country. We are in the process of growing on-the-ground capabilities in our small Beijing office and have immediate openings for the following positions based in Beijing:  Sales / Account Manager (Beijing based) You will be responsible for: ·        1. Selling research, digital content or conference products to a range of business clients including to banks, technology companies and consulting firms that serve the financial services industry. ·        2. You will be taught to generate business and sales lead, identify potential clients and client’s needs; ·        3. Identify opportunities to cross/ up sell Asian Banker products and services to existing clients; ·        4. Attain individual and group sales targets; ·        5. Build relationship with the community.  Skills/ Characteristics ·        1. Preferably good academic background from a reputable university. ·        2. Written and verbal English language skills as well as telephone etiquette is an important prerequisite. ·        3. Deep interest or passion in sales and marketing. ·        4. High sense of professionalism and cross-cultural awareness. ·        5. Teamwork and cross-functional ability. ·        6. Be computer proficient and familiar with Microsoft & other applications. ·        7. Fresh graduates or career changing professionals with customer facing experience are welcome to apply.  To apply, please email your “English” CV to mzhang@theasianbanker.com  Visit www.theasianbanker.com for more on us.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for supporting our sales team. You will be a key contributor to our sales team's success. You will primarily be in charge of scheduling and preparing our sales team for important meetings and trade shows. You will provide outstanding customer service by liasoning between the sales team and the customer.   Responsibilities Assist in creating sales material for sales preparation and success Coordinate scheduling with clients and sales team members Lead client correspondence Coordinate shipping and delivery Handle customer inquiries and issues  Qualifications Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience Customer-service oriented Proficient in Microsoft Office

该职位来源于猎聘  Position Summary  The Service Sales is responsible for successfully positioning and selling company products professionally and creatively in a given geographical region. The job involves engaging and qualifying new and existing customers, positioning Illumina products in order to provide solutions to their projects and business needs, and partnering closely with other internal and field-based members of the sales team that are in pursuit of common sales goals. This role is exciting and challenging as you have the opportunity to work with academic institutions, research centers, and business organizations around the world utilizing your scientific knowledge and lab experience while selling products for the nice leader in Genomics.  The position is an internal sales position and requires minimal travel time (30-40%).  Position Responsibilities Develops a strong understanding of Illumina’s technology and products and continues learning as Illumina’s product portfolio evolves. Manages customer relationships post-sale, including service products selling and developing long term business relationships. Makes outbound contact to existing and prospective customers to identify sales opportunities. Works collaboratively with all TAMs to meet and exceed sales quotas for a defined product line and/or sales territory. Takes an analytical approach towards executing optimal solutions for an issue or opportunity. Demonstrates capability to present versatile and unique solutions during customer negotiations in order to establish mutually beneficial circumstances for the customer and Illumina. Has the ability to learn, change, and gain from each experience to become more effective in subsequent sales scenarios. Listed responsibilities are an essential, but not exhaustive list, of the usual duties associated with the position. Changes to individual responsibilities may occur due to business needs.  Position Requirements Genetics and Molecular Biology foundation to allow for a better understanding of the broad variation of customer applications in order to uncover sales potential. Experience with service products selling and customer relationship management. Have knowledge of Next Generation Sequencing and Genotyping methods is preferred. Self- motivated to continue learning beyond initial onboarding within the role. A demonstrated desire to be an effective collaborator within a team selling environment and a willingness to provide and seek feedback from teammates. Strong desire to “win” and build customer relationships. Approaches tasks with urgency. Willingness to plan, prioritize, and manage time effectively. All listed requirements are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.  Preferred Experience/Education/Skills Bachelor degree or above is preferred. 岗位概述  Responsibilities 整理及维护销售管道 (如电话,网络查询,协会调查), 定期对现有以及潜在客户保持联系 (通过电话,电邮等)以搜集市场情报及资料如新产品推出,赞助资金状况,推动或增加他们对我司产品线的兴趣。 建立新客户关系,维护及增加现有客户群。 对现有以及潜在客户保持联系以确认销售机会,促进相关促销方案,并开始销售过程。 通过电话或电邮为特定的产品线 (如目前有购买我司二代测序试剂的客户)管理整个销售过程,客户群,以及／或低于特定价格的销售机会。 为特定产品线和／或销售区域与所有的 Territory Account Managers合作以达到或超越销售目标。 和经销商以及合作伙伴提供我司的更新公司以及产品资料。 为设备销售所需,收集以及建立营销材料,产品说明书以及其他现场销售所需要的相关资料。 审阅与客户签订有关设备和／或消耗品和／或维护的合同,并执行可提高消耗品使用率以及维护效率的措施。 70％的工作于办公室内执行, 30％则涉及出差活动包括但不限于新产品推行, 客户端的展览或经销商的研讨会和／或会议。 以上任务和职责只是此职位的基本职能；随着企业运营情况的变化，您可能需要适度承担一些额外的工作。  Preferred Requirements 对销售和市场营销有兴趣，愿意学习和拓展相关技能（需有一定经验） 有实际去迅速掌握和学习高技术性的概念，并清楚传达给其他人 高超的交际技巧，有能力和各种不同类型的客户进行有效沟通 熟练使用Microsoft Office（如Outlook、Excel、Word、PowerPoint） 勇于克服挑战 英文沟通和书面看良好
industries: Medical Devices

description: Keysight is the world's leading electronic measurement company, helping scientists and engineers address their toughest technical challenges with confidence through innovations in wireless, modular, and software solutions. Our employees leverage their insight and passion to deliver measurement solutions in wireless communications, aerospace and defense, and semiconductor markets with world-class platforms, software and consistent measurement science.  This job will be part of the Worldwide Sales / Field Operations Group, which is responsible for building and maintaining customer relationships to sustain Keysight's leadership in the market. Engineers and scientists in more than 14,000 companies use Keysight offerings to research, design, develop, manufacture, install, and maintain electronic components, devices, subsystems and systems. And all of them interface with Keysight's global network of direct sales, support, and indirect channel partners.  Job Description  Represents the company to the customer and the customer to the company in sales-oriented activities. Entry level individuals may have their own accounts, or work on a team, and may have a small quota or territory Employees must be classified in one of the following job disciplines. Disciplines:  Sales: Responsible for generating existing and/or new sales for assigned named accounts or assigned geographic, territory, industry or accounts list, or for identifying and recruiting strategic partners to embed and/or resell company products. Promotes and sells products and/or solutions to current or new customers/partners and informs customers of new product introductions. Creates monitors and revises lead generation plans. Responsible for developing customers and maintaining their satisfaction. Maintains positive ongoing long-term relationships with key customers.  Interprets customer needs and works to meet those needs; identifies potential business opportunities, referring more complex leads to others to convert  Works on sales assignments with clearly defined objectives, techniques  Solves problems of minimal scope and complexity  Job Qualifications Bachelors or Master Degree or University Degree or equivalent. No prior experience required; may have up to 2 years’ relevant experience. Job Function  Sales  ___________________________________________________________________________________  Careers Privacy Statement  ***Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.***  Candidates can be considered to work from the following locations:  APAC : China : Guangdong : Shenzhen  Job ID : 40587

description: Huntsman Polyurethanes Elastomers is looking for an Inside Sales Representative, who is responsible for supporting commercial team for commercial activities and office admin works located in Shanghai, China.  As the Inside Sales Representative, PU Elastomers, the Principal Accountabilities are: EHS & Compliance Key User of C4C & global coordination Office admin work for campus-based Elastomer colleagues Sales team’s report & meeting coordination Sales teams’ data analysis and reporting Inside sales role to serve customers who may not need sales’ direct service, then free up sales’ time and energy to have a better focus. Cross Functional Coordination Internal/External Sales Communication Campus Administration Support Other Tasks assigned by line manager Special Features: Good communication, team work and relationship building skills are essential both internally as well as with external providers of information at different levels in their organizations. The primary contacts are with Commercial team and SCM team. The jobholder is proficient at collecting and filtering sales information from a variety of sources, developing primary tools for sales tracking. The job holder is responsible for providing and presenting information which is used to key account management and project review. The jobholder need establish good relationship with key customers to check necessary information and give support to them. The jobholder works under moderate supervision and is responsible for his/her own time management once priorities have been set Excellent office software( Microsoft excel, word and PPT) skills. Occasionally biz travel is needed to setup a better relationship and communication with customers ( ~10% working time) Skills And Experiences Required  Education: Bachelor’s degree or above  Experiences: 1 ~ 3 years chemical industry environment  Know-how/Skills The jobholder has a basic technical, marketing or sales understanding of industry and can quickly understand new product features and associated benefits. The jobholder has a demonstrable affinity for project related work and can operate effectively within multi-disciplinary teams, meeting set deadlines and milestones. The job holder is aware of key commercial activities and uses many in daily work. Experience for customer service, administration is a plus. The jobholder completes work under moderate supervision and is responsible for the accuracy and quality of assignments. The jobholder must be able to build strong relationships with internal stakeholders (from director to support functions) across Huntsman, as well as with external customers. The jobholder has very strong oral and written communication skills both in Mandarin and English, being able to present market information in a clear and concise manner The jobholder accepts difficulties and challenges and must have a demonstrable can-do mentality. Assignments will generally be vague and ambiguous due to the new-to-us nature of the opportunities Excellent office software( Microsoft excel, word and PPT) skills. Huntsman offers unsurpassed opportunities to build a successful future. Our diverse portfolio creates a range of career fields including manufacturing, research and development, technical services, sales and marketing, customer service – and the list goes on.  Here, you can make an impact and make a difference. Come join us.  Huntsman is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all qualified applicants for employment, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, gender identification, sexual orientation and/or expression or any other characteristic protected by law in every location in which we have facilities national or local.  Please refer to https://www.huntsman.com/privacy/online-privacy-notice for Company’s Data Privacy and Protection information. Huntsman does not make job offers until after a candidate has submitted a job application and has participated in a face-to-face interview. Please be advised that emails from Huntsman always end in “@huntsman.com” and that any job offer that requires payment or requires you to deposit a check is likely a scam. If you have questions about any open positions at Huntsman, please visit our Careers website at http://www.huntsman.com/corporate/a/Careers.

description: 工作职责:  Job Description  Key responsibilities include (but are not limited to):  Financial Performance Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets. GE Product & Market awareness Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition. Compliance Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required. 任职条件:  Qualifications / Requirements Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience. 2 years of strategic sales experience. 2 years experience in healthcare. Proven key account management and project planning skills. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact. Quality Specific Goals Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, colour, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. description: Duties & Responsibilities:  Build and implement sales planning and performance management processes to maximize sales productivity and operational efficiency  Partner with Global Sales & Marketing leaders to design and execute strategic, organizational sales management projects  Proactively work with senior sales leaders to identify areas of opportunity for teams, geographic regions, and product categories. Guide leaders in prioritizing business goals and sales resource based on impact to revenue and sales productivity.  Create and own sales performance metrics and reporting tools to ensure access to timely, accurate and actionable data  Design, evaluate, and advise on systems and internal processes to support a rapidly evolving sales organization.  Adopt and deploy sales management tools and applications to sales organization and continuously enhance process and tools to effectively support priorities  Skills and Requirements:  3+ years of experience in a highly analytical sales operation role within a rapidly growing company (FMCG industry is preferred)  Ability to eloquently distill and communicate complex topics broadly to leaders, team members and everyone in between, fluent in both English and Mandarin  Excel expert skills comfortable developing insightful models and quantitative analysis, paired with critical thinking and sound business judgment  Salesforce.com expert familiar with data structure and reporting functionality of Salesforce.com  Education:  Bachelor is a must and MBA is preferred.

Description  What You Will Do In Your Role Directly call upon key global/regional customers and directly manage these accounts. Build and promote strong, long term customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs. Use knowledge around customers with better understanding of the downstream network. Drive our polymer business growth and differentiation strategy. Deliver and accountable for financial results. Identify emerging markets/opportunities and market shifts while being fully aware of new products and competition status. Develop multiple relationships to downstream industries and obtain market intelligence. Share knowledge across the organization to help develop our market point of view. Integrate and collaborate with customer service, supply chain, logistics, technical/operations to optimize our asset, delivering high sale performance. Monitor with high level of quality, accuracy and process consistency in the sales planning efforts and coordinate demand and supply activities with other capabilities. Develop high value sales in China to support and create long term growth in alignment with our vision and execution of our key strategies. The Experience You Will Bring  Requirements Bachelor’s degree in engineering or Business Management related disciplines. Strong sales and marketing experience in a multinational environment, preferably in chemical or polymer industry (Minimal of 5 years). Experience in plastics and compounding would be an advantage. Demonstrated ability to communicate, present and influence credibly and effectively at various levels of organization. Fluent in English and Chinese with strong interpersonal skills. Team player with ability to work under limited supervision. Demonstrate high regard for integrity and ethical behavior. Shows passion to understand and grow our business with high sense of urgency in attending to customer’s needs. Strong adaptation to a learn-share organization based on our MBM® culture.

description: DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™  Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam.  More information can be found at www.dsm.com .  The Challenge  Sales Manager's main priority is selling and executing Biocare Cph. China strategy by targeting initiatives with National Tier 1 Distributors ad Key Accounts.  Individual maintains ownership for online and offline sales volume, value and profit, trade marketing spending budgets and results. Through the development of productive business relationships and creative solutions to meet customer needs, manage value stream of all distributors and retailers, Sales Manager delivers sales results thus achieving Biocare Cph. China business goals. This individual is also responsible for providing direction to whole sales team to achieve “Retail Excellence” for customers/channels in their geography and for retail service management within their accounts.  The Position  Management and development of national tier 1 distributors and key accounts to deliver assigned volume objectives by achieving:  Shelf/Distribution objectives  Pricing objectives  Promotional programs  MPOD Managed Point of Display  Develop effective products, packs and programs to contribute annual profitable growth.  Budget and Annual Planning development; constructs annual Customer Marketing Agreements and manages associated funds for all designated national accounts, tracks and controls budgets and manages T & E within assigned budget.  Business Analysis –to evaluate ROI of promotional events and communicate key learning.  Conduct quarterly business reviews to update Distributors and Key Accounts on business, channel competition, opportunities, etc. Provide insights to drive change in promotion, price, or display practices.  Build and lead sales team by example, providing valuable communication, effective cooperation, and teamwork.  Identify all relevant SHE and security aspects (e.g. set up and review of SHE plans, objectives, requirements, procedures and instructions and organizational communications) and assess the corresponding risks related to the position and the department, make sure these are known, understood and can be handled by colleagues and reports, and provide necessary training; lead by example; show real SHE leadership by setting standards and encouraging colleagues and reports to act (SHE) responsible for their wellbeing; organize involvement in SHE and security matters; encourage and/or report all incidents (e.g. injuries, near misses, possible SHE hazards, etc.) and provide follow-up to any incidents such that the organization will learn from incidents; participate in the regular and annual review and audit of the site SHE Plan and make sure the organization is in compliance with (SHE) requirements and legislation.  Authorities  Sales Revenue/Profit Growth as assigned  Development of talent within the sales force; management and coaching of direct and indirect staff  Effectively manage assigned sales budget  Projects or Special Assignments  The Ideal  10+ minimum years CPG Sales and/or Marketing, ideally with nutrition or supplement  10 years minimum Distributor management, Trade Marketing, Sales Planning or Marketing experience in China  Excellent people management and relationship building skills  Strategic planning and business management (problem-solving, sales forecasting, P&L analysis, fixed cost budget analysis)  Strong communication skills, ability to present, sell-in and execute ideas  Direct experience with Ecommerce, BBS, Pharmacies and Grocery Channels  Advanced Computer Skills Required To Perform Responsibilities  Sales negotiations and general business acumen essential.  .
industries: Biotechnology, Chemicals, and Research

description: Organization OverviewQAD is looking for a Strategic Account Manager wanting to jump starts their career with a Next Generation ERP company that is Rapid, Agile, and Effective. Achieve quarterly and annual sales targets as agreed with management. Leads efforts in region of operation to help define a strategy and develop, implement it for maximizing the revenue and profitability of assigned “Strategic Accounts”. Manages sales opportunities and builds strong business consulting relationships with C-level. Ensures global alignment of internal resources, including Pre-Sales, Services, and global sales team. Familiar with auto industry, specifically in China market, have proven tracking records about how to close the net new deal for the whole sales cycle independently. Position requires strong analytical skills in the evaluation and preparation of value related to sales opportunities. Organizes and manages special needs and drives issues to resolution for assigned accounts.  What You’ll Do Work with management and respective Global Account Manager to implement account strategies for an assigned group of global strategic accounts to drive revenue and improve customer value/satisfaction. Align with China team internally, and work with global & local partner for the new local net new business development in the territory assigned. Operate with assigned regional Business Consultants and Service Resources in the execution of the agreed account strategies. Maintain an accurate and up to date sales funnel to ensure visibility of qualified opportunities. Conduct client meetings to discuss business issues, potential opportunities for value from QAD solutions and develop long term engagement plans with clients. Responsible to develop proposals to address customer requirements and negotiate acceptance of terms and associated timelines. Orchestration of internal resources including; support, professional services, pre-sales and R&D to ensure successful client projects. What You’ll Need Bachelor's degree in business, or related degree 10+ years of Sales experience in software, technical services or business process consulting within supply chain or manufacturing. Proven Sales ability including outstanding negotiation skills, persuasive ability and excellent communication skills. Industry knowledge coupled with the ability to deal with clients at all levels (including C level) and translate client needs into a complete solution. Be able to lead customer needs to unique solution advantage. Experience selling or providing consulting services to automotive tier 1 suppliers ERP Software Sales or consulting experience Good English and Chinese language skills, both spoken and written. Original/creative thinking and superior problem-solving abilities Self-motivation and ability to work with minimal supervision Willingness to travel up to 70% with some global & many Local travel required. Who You Are Insatiably curious, coachable and committed to lifelong learning. A growth-oriented professional who is eager to join a fast-paced and entrepreneurial team. Have a strong will to achieve - willing to push harder, have a competitive spirit, and willing to be challenged. A high achiever, marked by perseverance, humility, and a positive outlook in the face of challenges. Generous with your time and genuinely interested in helping other team members succeed in their roles. Enjoy working in a collaboratively competitive environment. Make others around you better while achieving your own goals. Demonstrates QAD core values - partnership with our customers, commitment to excellence, innovation, global teamwork, integrity and respect for the individual. About QAD  QAD Inc. is a leading provider of adaptive, cloud-based enterprise software and services for global manufacturing companies. Global manufacturers face ever-increasing disruption caused by technology-driven innovation and changing consumer preferences. In order to survive and thrive, manufacturers must be able to innovate and change business models at unprecedented rates of speed. QAD calls these companies Adaptive Manufacturing Enterprises. QAD solutions help customers in the automotive, life sciences, packaging, consumer products, food and beverage, high tech and industrial manufacturing industries rapidly adapt to change and innovate for competitive advantage.  At QAD, we do more than sell manufacturing ERP software. We develop innovative products, foster growth and creativity, encourage collaboration and teamwork, and build strong communities across the world. The company was founded in 1979 on the foundation of helping people make their manufacturing business a success. To us, success is having happy customers, customers who love our product. And success is happy employees, who learn, grow and are connected to one another. This is what drives us. This is who we are. And we love what we do.

Experience：  1.大专或以上学历，医学、药学或相关专业毕业，  2.从事两年或以上药品或医疗器械的销售经验，有外资企业工作背景者优先考虑。  3.具备出色的销售意识以及较强的判断能力  4.良好的沟通和语言表达能力。  5.热爱销售工作，负有责任心，能承受工作压力。  6.具有团队合作及吃苦耐劳精神。  Responsibilities  1.负责公司糖尿病产品在目标区域内的推广, 并达成公司的销售目标。  2.负责目标区域内客户的管理，包括建立及更新客户资料，维护客户关系等工作,并合理使用公司资源。  3.完成公司规定的各类销售报表。  4.搜集区域内竞争对手的信息。  5.严格遵守公司的道德行为规范（OEC）政策，有效地执行公司的市场计划。

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Operates with some autonomy but are typically subject to standard sales practices and procedures. The role is subject to regular review of sales results. Some judgment may be required but this is typically with guidance. May be responsible for medium-sized sales territories.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责 向合作伙伴和分销商销售或通过其进行销售。可能包括渠道销售支持和渠道开发职责。 对销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群有深入的了解。利用先前的经验和获得的商业专业知识来执行政策/策略。 深入理解关键业务驱动力；用这种理解来完成自己的工作。深入了解自己团队的工作如何与其他团队融合并为该领域做出贡献。 大多数决策都在规定的框架内，但是对于项目、产品线、市场、销售过程或客户的最终决策具有一定的自主权。利用先前的经验和在职培训来解决简单的任务。拥有解决问题所需的技术技能和分析思维。可以使用自己团队以外的多个内部资源来做出决定。 此级别的职位可能由个人贡献者担任，且其具有成熟的人际交往能力。向直接相关的同事和业务部门传达所提供的设计和协调服务。为新团队成员提供非正式指导。在简单的情况下向其他人解释复杂的信息。 任职条件:  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有较丰富的工作经验。学历水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够影响他人并领导小型团队。领导中等范围和影响的计划。能够同时协调多个项目。有效的问题识别和解决技能。可靠的分析和组织能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.
