description: Freudenberg is a global technology group that strengthens its customers and society long-term through forward-looking innovations. Together with our partners, customers and the world of science, we develop leading-edge technologies, and excellent products, solutions and services for 40 market segments. The Freudenberg Group employs some 50,000 people in around 60 countries worldwide and generates sales of nearly 9 billion euros.  Low & Bonar produces high-quality technical textiles for a wide range of sectors. For the company with customers worldwide and production facilities in Europe, North America and China, important success factors are a continuous focus on quality and strategic business partnerships. Low & Bonar is part of Freudenberg Performance Materials, a leading global supplier of innovative technical textiles for a broad range of markets and applications such as apparel, automotive, building materials, civil engineering, energy, filter media, healthcare, building interiors.  Changzhou  Bonar High Performance Materials (Changzhou) Co. Ltd.  You support our team as  Sales Manager Filtration  Responsibilities Commercial objectives and plans formulated and safeguarded. Achieving the commercial objectives for the allocated accounts in China. Get the result of extent of contribution to commercial objectives ,concreteness of plans and activities, degree of acceptance of plans and timeliness of progress reports Market and marketing research carried out. Researching and analyzing the market based on (historical) sales data, analyses of the competition and market demand, and market and marketing developments to make sure the accuracy of analyses and usability of market information. Acquisition carried out. Tracking and advising (potential) customers in current and new market segments with respect to the purchase of product concepts, products and applications, taking into account products’ technical aspects. And to get the increase of prospects, sales value / magnitude of offers issued. Sales contracts concluded. Completing sales processes in commercial terms and after sales, to make sure of effectiveness of the negotiation, extent to which the contracts concluded contribute to sales and profit objectives, and to profit. Informing and consulting the internal organization (such as customer service, finance, product management) about the agreements made and Concluding contracts. Sales contracts followed up. Monitoring the settlement of customer orders which including the result of sales achieved, extent of performance of customer agreements, timeliness of payments or limitation of violations and availability of customer stock. Complaints settled. Bearing responsibility for the adequate settlement of complaints and providing solutions, duly maintaining the customer relationship to improve customer satisfaction about complaints settlement and complaints procedure. Business relations managed. Maintaining and expanding the (commercial) network with accounts and other relevant contacts in the branch of industry concerned (consultants, component suppliers and the like).  Qualifications Bachelor degree, with major of Polymer, Nonwoven, or Textile are the preferred. 5-6 years’ working experience in sales or similar fields Preferred Location South China Home Office Location (Yangtze Delta), or Changzhou Plant Office, Frequent Regional Travel within China Existing contacts within Filtration segment Proven sales experience, familiar with upstream and downstream markets in filtration industry (Filter or Filter Media) or Non-Woven Industry Market exploit capability, open mind, creative, hard-working and team spirits Could communicate in English, both speaking and writing  Your Benefits  Meal allowance: Allowance makes meals more affordable  Health insurance: Insurance: backstop protection against health risks  Vacation: Time off to refresh and recharge  Training / Career development: Programs to supercharge skills and expertise  Performance-related bonus: When you have an impact, you can reap the rewards  Disclaimer  The Freudenberg Group is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and inclusion. Employment opportunities are available to all applicants and associates without regard to race, color, religion, creed, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding, or related medical conditions), gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, genetic information, marital status, familial status, sexual orientation, protected military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. Areas of responsibility include prospecting, networking and executing on sales campaigns aimed to solve customer challenges using Digital Transformation, workflow, Machine Learning, and Information Governance solutions. The Digital Sales will proactively collaborate with the country Account teams to identify and support digital opportunities from both new and existing customer base. The successful candidate will bring their past expertise selling environment to lead the opportunity through the Sales process to successful close, partnering with the account owner to leverage the customer relationship. Close working relationship with Iron Mountain’s technology partners brings further opportunity for success through account mapping activity to identify additional leads as well as direct engagement with partners’ sales teams and their customers. 【Key Account abilities】 ●        Assesses prospective and assigned customer’s current and potential needs, determining appropriate new revenue streams for Iron Mountain’s Digital Solution portfolio. ●        Develops and implements strategies and business plans through understanding the customers; business model, planning and decision making channels from understanding the customer's value proposition and ability to explain how they differentiate themselves in the marketplace. ●        Positions and illustrates alternative ways of creating the real value of the Iron Mountain Digital solution offerings for customers through assessing their problems or opportunities and highlighting Iron Mountain’s areas of strength, competitive pricing, customer satisfaction and competitive advantages within each existing and net new accounts. ●        Actively participates in sales campaign initiatives in demand and field program execution. ●        Effective internal teaming with Pre-Sales Solution Engineers, RIM Business Development Executives (BDEs), to deliver our value proposition, drive Digital solution,core storage and service revenue growth. ●        Support account planning and strategy development with key internal and partner team members. ●        Responsible for pipeline development and bookings within your respective territory and/or assigned account portfolio. ●        Achievement of assigned Digital sales quota as well as contribution towards overall team booking target. ●        Activities to support pipeline including managing timely detailed responses to RFP’s. ●        Responsible for timely, complete, and accurate input and management of Saleforce.com opportunity information enabling business and regional accurate reporting to inform strategy and target measures ●        Responsible for final opportunity profitability through leading negotiation process and ensuring an acceptable on-time outcome from a pricing, profitability, liability, operational, and SLA perspective for accounts to meet and exceed quota attainment. This is facilitated in conjunction with CPO, Legal and market VPs/Directors when needed.  ●        Successful experience in working with customers to influence RFP development so their solution offering is best positioned to win. The BDE will also have strong proposal writing experience and be able to lead a proposal response team when needed. ●        Activity within industry associations in the market to increase IM awareness, through attending tradeshows, reviewing whitepapers and keep current within market trends.   【Qualifications】 ●        Must have a minimum of 10 years direct sales experience in large complex services-based organizations with a strong background and knowledge of digital transformation solutions, having direct experience of SaaS selling is a plus. This will include artificial intelligence/machine learning capability and technology, analytics, cloud services, information governance, enterprise content management, business process / workflow enablement and outsourcing, document and information capture, strategic account management and a value-based, outcome driven sales process.  ●        Must have the proven ability to translate the customer needs and use case into solution requirements through the creation of powerful value propositions and solid business case. ●        Have the ability to influence and negotiate through proven sales skills and needs identification by aligning unique insights to key customer priorities. ●        Must exhibit excellent written, oral and presentation skills, in-depth understanding of strategic value selling methodologies and confident in presenting to C-level executives. ●        Experience of achieving and exceeding multimillion dollar sales quota goals ●        Encompasses strong interpersonal, planning, analytical skills and business acumen for effective decision making. ●        Operate effectively within a startup division displaying a flexible and collaborative approach to the growth of the solution and team ●        Candidates should be able to make business decisions and think in broad terms, considering the impact to the entire company. ●        Ability to influence without authority and team effectively at all levels of Iron Mountain and customer personnel (to include C-level) on a wide range of topics and issues.  ●        Experience selling into Fortune 1000 companies in highly regulated industries with particular emphasis in one or more of the following verticals: o   Banking/Financial Services including Insurance o   Energy o   Media & Entertainment o   Legal o   Life Sciences/Pharma o   Government ●        Minimum of three-year university degree; Master’s degree preferred ●        Prior experience using a CRM 【About Us】 Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM), founded in 1951, is the global leader for storage and information management services. Trusted by more than 225,000 organizations around the world, and with a real estate network of more than 90 million square feet across more than 1,450 facilities in approximately 50 countries, Iron Mountain stores and protects billions of valued assets, including critical business information, highly sensitive data, and cultural and historical artefacts. Providing solutions that include information management, digital transformation, secure storage, secure destruction, as well as data centres, cloud services and art storage and logistics, Iron Mountain helps customers lower cost and risk, comply with regulations, recover from disaster, and enable a more digital way of working. Visit https://www.ironmountain.com/ for more information. Please send your updated CV to grace.xu@ironmountain.cn Iron Mountain is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, creed, age, national origin, sex, sexual preference or handicap.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Job Description  Job Description:  As the PRC based IOTG Healthcare Vertical Sales Specialist, you will be responsible for driving the design win adoption and deal win scale of Intel products across PRC.  You will work with our OEM, ODM, SI and ISV partners along with cross Intel business unit teams to represent the Intel based vertical and horizontal solutions value in the Health and Life Sciences market.We are looking for candidates that bring domain expertise in the healthcare industry, including experience working within the value chain or with strategic solutions providers.  The ideal candidate will have a fluent understanding of healthcare policies and standards that are part of the medical equipment business. The candidate will have experience in selling and supporting medical based solutions in the areas of Imaging, diagnostic equipment and or life sciences/laboratory solutions.  The successful applicant will be responsible for working along-side our field sellers targeting our Intel customers and partners in pursuit of Intel design win success and deal win revenue creation. The VSS will help the healthcare ecosystem OEM/ODM and SI partners to adopt Intel technologies by accurately representing the various elements in each solution architecture and to articulate and lead the discussion around the Intel advantage in healthcare.  Being able to articulate the technical merits of an Intel-based vertical and horizontal solutions to drive Intel's value in healthcare for our customers is an essential part of being successful in the role.  The Healthcare Vertical Sales Specialist will be responsible for creating a virtual team across the region and across the Intel business units to develop plans to impact and enhance the Design and Deal win selling motion of that virtual team.  The VSS from time to time will act in various roles including but not limited to consultant, advisor, sales manager, account leader, product specialist and business development lead. All the work is to help our customer understand the full value of Intel in healthcare.  The VSS will manage a close collaboration with account sales teams, at times co-owning relationships with customer/partner decision-makers, ultimately influencing the customers purchasing decision.  The VSS will be expected to track, manage and influence a pipeline portfolio of design and deal wins across Intel and the various segments of the healthcare business.  Exceeding All Design win and Deal win (Consumption) targets are a critical part of the success criteria.  As a market/domain expert we expect a regular communication with our product divisions on gaps and trends, shaping future product planning specific to the healthcare market. This role is a commissioned sales role. Primary focus: PRC  Qualifications  Essential Qualification / Skills BS in computer science and/or engineering in related field is highly desiredo 5+ years of proven enterprise-class solution selling experience in the healthcare industry working with ODM, OEM, aggregator ecosystem and/or other solution providers; Comfortable interfacing with all levels of Co. management Understanding of solution architectures and software layers to connect edge devices to cloud and the value that brings to healthcare. Affinity to work with customers to help define/develop solutions to fit their requirements. Track record of driving complex competitive solution selling scenarios and negotiation skills leading to results. Ability to perform on virtual teams working closely with business unit and sales leaders across the organization Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English Additional Qualifications / Skills Understanding of healthcare standards across the entire spectrum of healthcare segments. Knowledge of healthcare or edge management software and remote healthcare management software and development tools Additional language skills (verbal and written) English/Japanese and Mandarin. Working knowledge of SFDC reporting functions

Minimum 3 years working experience in freight forwarding/logistics/supply chain industries, with NVOCC or minimum 1 year sales experience is preferred. Experienced in cold chain logistics industry is preferred  2.    中文母语者，能用英语邮件沟通，能和国外客户及代理口语交流。 Chinese native speaker. Capable of communicating in English by emails and calls with overseas agents and customers.  3.    性格乐观积极，有说服力，具有自我激励的动力，结果导向，安排自己的销售计划和行为来完成指标。 Optimistic and positive personality, persuasive, self-motivated, result oriented. description: A Sales Coordinator will fully support, from administrative, customer service, and sale lead development perspectives, the Sales team to develop future and repeat business.  What will I be doing? Identify new contacts, develop sales leads, and respond to sales opportunities in order to maximise revenue Understand fully the hotel amenities, packages and promotions Generate and develop sales leads and contact potential clients to build business relationships Produce quotations and written confirmation to all clients Produce accurate and timely reports that meet the needs of the Sales Director and senior management to include the reporting of appointments, calls made and business leads Monitor customer satisfaction regularly and resolve any outstanding issues to ensure future business Arrange and carry out Hotel show rounds What are we looking for? Sales Manager  Responsible for achieving hotel targets by optimising revenues through an assigned account base, as well as prospecting new clients in assigned markets. Assigned markets may change according to hotel needs. The key measurement of performance will be performance versus the Revenue goals. Ensure that all potential and real hazards are reported and rectified immediately. jobTitle: Siemens Energy Graduate Program – BD/Marketing/Sales (21/22届均可申请）
description: Division: Generation  Function: Sales, BD or Marketing  Location: Shanghai or Beijing  Join the Siemens Energy Graduate Program at Siemens Energy in Business Development, Marketing & Sales  There are two types of jobs, those that directly impact the world and those that don’t. If you’re ready to get hands-on experience working on solutions that directly impact climate change and drive the energy transformation, then the Siemens Energy Graduate Program is the place for you.  As part of the Siemens Energy Graduate Program, you can design your future.  Over two exciting years, you’ll get hands-on experience by participating in three results-oriented assignments where you'll rapidly build up in-depth knowledge, discover solutions, and experience our business from a different perspective. You’ll be actively integrated into the day-to-day activities of your project teams and gain a deep understanding of Siemens Energy.  Sound interesting?  If you’re a forward-thinking, high-energy, dynamic driver who wants to get directly involved in the daily business of our global teams and work on projects that drive the energy transformation, then now is the time to apply!  We’re accepting applications now for an anticipated November 2021 start date.  More insights on the Business Development & Sales program  As part of our Business Development & Sales team, you’ll help transition to a more sustainable energy by contributing to the success of our products. With a deep understanding of technology and its benefits, we capture market and customer requirements and translate them into opportunities – opportunities for new products and for innovation. Join our Business Development & Sales program and drive the energy transition with us.  Here Is How You’ll Benefit From This Program Two years full of responsibilities, growing, learning and development opportunities Three individual designed assignments including one eight-month assignment abroad Challenging tasks among the assignments including consulting with senior management An experienced mentor during the program who will support you reaching your individual career goals and guide you to craft your future with us Comprehensive and state-of-the-art trainings that will fortify your communication and personal skills Our international community of trainees and alumni who are looking forward to meeting you An excellent springboard for a successful career with Siemens Energy in attractive roles Let’s talk about you Your profile An above-average Master's, Doctoral Degree or equivalent in one of the following fields of study: Thermal Engineering, Fluid Dynamics, Mechanical Engineering etc. Minimum of 3 months of international experience gained through studying, working, etc. Significant practical work experience up to 24 months and knowledge from internships, working student activities etc. Excellent command of English and mandarin is required to work in a multi-cultural environment Flexibility and mobility within the program duration Let’s Talk About Us  “Let’s make tomorrow different today" is our genuine commitment at Siemens Energy to all customers and employees on the way to a sustainable, CO2 neutral future.  Here at Siemens Energy, we offer a broad portfolio of products and solutions geared around the key market trends of digitalization, decarbonization, grid stability and for centralized and decentralized energy production. We drive innovation, develop new technologies and apply cutting-edge manufacturing technologies. With power-to-X and electrolysis systems, we are enabling the green hydrogen economy to lead the transition towards a decarbonized world.  Ready to join this incredible experience?  Then apply as soon as possible and please remember to include following documents in your application: Curriculum vitae (CV) All relevant certificates and documents (prepare for later use: report cards for all academic degrees, reference letters of internships / working student jobs / international experience, etc.) More Information can be found on https://www.siemens-energy.com/global/en/company/jobs/graduate-program.html Organization: Gas and Power  Company: Siemens Energy Co., Ltd.  Experience Level: Recent College Graduate  Job Type: Full-time
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing

description: Farnell  Farnell, an Avnet company, is a global high-service distributor of technology products, services and solutions for electronic system design, maintenance and repair.  Job Summary  Combines inside sales/customer service and technical/systems knowledge to sell products, services and solutions to new, lead generation opportunities and existing customers/account base through a variety of outbound multimedia communications (e.g., telephone, email, fax, portals). Effectively develops and manages trusted relationships for assigned customers/accounts. Promotes company options and solutions to customers on a regular basis. Identifies sales opportunities to deliver focused market/brand solutions to the customer resulting in increased market share, sales and margin for suppliers and maximizing value to the Company. Consistently delivers revenue or profit that supports and drives the account/customer to meet financial sales metrics.  Principal Responsibilities Delivers solutions or finds new opportunities for a positive customer experience utilizing independent judgment, lead generation, and sales methodology. Directs secured sales opportunties to the proper stakeholder(s), if required. Initiates sales inquiries directly to prospective and/or existing customers to promote product offerings, services and capabilities. Promptly, directs, and accurately responds to prospective or existing customer information requests. Monitors/follows up on sales activities throughout the process to meet or exceed customer requirements from initial contact to order fulfillment. Maintains and expands sales with existing accounts through a high level of customer service and customer knowledge (e.g., Distribution Total Available Market (DTAM), projects in pipeline, critical start dates). Working in a team environment, proactively coordinates sales efforts and strategies with internal resources such as product, materials, field sales team and suppliers. Effectively communicates with customers regarding current product information and provides accurate and detailed pricing, quotes, and input on products and final solutions. Coordinates existing customer requirements for inventories, delivery lead time and unit prices. Other duties as assigned. Job Level Specifications General awareness of business, financials, products/services and the market. Developing basic knowledge of the industry and sales environment Works within an assigned territory/account, product/services or sales process with limited complexity; typically assigned accounts/opportunities with limited size. Follows existing procedures and established sales processes to sell standard products/services. Relies on manager to provide planning & manage resources. Has limited authority/ opportunity to set and negotiate product/service terms. Collaborates with internal team and support functions. Has limited direct contact with clients; may work independently or partner with other sales professionals Works within an assigned area or account base on small to moderately-sized accounts/opportunities with limited complexity. Work Experience Minimum experience required is typically less than 2 years with bachelor's or equivalent. Education And Certification(s) Bachelors degree or equivalent experience from which comparable knowledge and job skills can be obtained. Distinguishing Characteristics  The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills.

description: Clarivate(tm) is a global leader in providing solutions to accelerate the lifecycle of innovation. Our bold mission is to help customers solve some of the world's most complex problems by providing actionable information and insights that reduce the time from new ideas to life-changing inventions in the areas of science and intellectual property. We help customers discover, protect and commercialize their inventions using our trusted subscription and technology-based solutions coupled with deep domain expertise.  We now have more than 8,500 colleagues in over 40 countries worldwide, and we work with over 200 partners to deliver value and success for our customers. Today, Clarivate is a publicly traded company, listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker NYSE:CLVT.  Clarivate is committed to building, nurturing, and developing a diverse culture of belonging where new colleagues can bring their authentic self to work every day! Join us!  Role Summary  As a subject matter expert to sales and pursuit activities, you will act in of support Account Managers focusing on all new sales for the products and solutions of Clarivate to the Academic and Government sectors.The role works in close partnership with internal stakeholders to proactively drive gross sales and revenue.  Role Responsibilities:  You will be responsible for the following:  Identify sales opportunities with account managers and leading customer conversations, product demo, professional service related discussion and explanations Identify agenda of research excellence in world-class and frame it with Clarivate offerings to design custom-specific solutions. Develop relationships with customers to ensure Clarivate’s position as a trusted advisor in the agenda. Collaborate with internal stakeholders including sales team as well as regional/global teams. Coordinate scoping, pricing, and proposing for consulting projects while monitoring the progress of work as well as guiding a delivery done by the global team Deliver the presentations at high-level decision makers for Intellectual Property Solutions  Target customers  Government organizations-R&D funding agency/R&D policy makers, Ministry, Universities  Solution offering  IP related database, data analytic service or consulting for technology landscaping, performance evaluation, R&D planning, emerging research/technology identification, etc.  Qualifications:  Bachelor’s degree or above Strong experience on sales or business development. Good understanding of R&D and technology innovation life cycle Good communication, customer relationship management and presentation skill required. Good understanding of business for government and Academy Strong interpersonal skills Ability to organize and execute a sales plan Become a Product and Workflow Expert in products,solutions and service. Minimum years of experience: 7 years With integrity, passion and good collaboration with internal/external stakeholders. Good business English.  It is the policy of Clarivate to provide equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, pregnancy, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, Clarivate will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities.

description: 公司介绍  At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible.  At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon.  We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future.  Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too.  We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands.  Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data.  职位描述 Explore new business through various sale and marketing tools to identify new customers by working with closely with marketing leads and sales leads, communicate with broad customer base and identify the right customers. Develop sales tools and customized sales content by working together with internal sales team and marketing team. Build solid data and milestone chart in system to identify and track strategy execution to improve sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness. Work internally to strategize sales tools and solution by vertical/applications, build Account Based case study and promotion plan Product solutions focused strategy to promote WDC products and solutions to targeted account Partner cross-functionally with other teams to align with the latest strategy and resources for targeted accounts. Other work assigned by team lead 职位要求  Required Key Skills Experienced sales internship in university or endeavor to be a sales in future, All majors are welcomed, Major in Computer science, EE, material science or other IT related major would be a plus. Able to use English at a working proficiency level, good communication skills. Pro-active with a CAN-DO attitude, able to accept new knowledge in a short time. Outstanding interpersonal and relationship management skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with varying levels of the organization Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to distill complex subjects to a wider audience Evidence of strong character with integrity, honesty, accountability and trust 额外信息  Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution.  Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at [email protected] to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  What You’ll Be Doing Setting direction, coping with change, listening, coaching and motivating the team. Serves as an escalation point for Arrow’s internal departments, vendor resources and customers. Serves as the customer contact for handling all elements of the returns and maintenance termination process, entering the Service Request and RMA in the business system, sending the return/cancellation request for management approval and ensuring customers are credited for the return. Responsible for receiving, confirming and tracking customer orders and other related tasks in the order processing and post sales flow to include: order entry; material procurement; coordination with the vendor, integration facilities and shippers to identify and track delivery schedules; creation and update order status reports; resolution of incoming invoices and denied claims. Order Processing: Processes customer orders accurately and timely by reviewing customer purchase orders for accuracy, freight terms, transportation methods, pricing, technical specifications, part numbers and any other unique customer requirements ; resolving any discrepancies with customer prior to order entry; entering sales orders accurately and quickly into the Arrow ERP system, working with shared services teams to resolve more complex issues on orders or customer requests. Places purchase orders with the vendors and anticipates additional requirements or obstacles for orders and works toward a solution proactively. Research and resolve vendor invoice variances and warehouse receipt discrepancies caused by price, quantity, goods/services receipts, freight and tax code discrepancies. Works with the warehouse team to ensure that all inventory purchase orders are received in full. Research and resolve vendor denied claims or variances caused by program requirements, price, quantity and point of sale reporting. Processes any shipment variances or damages with the vendors for resolution and updates the Oracle ERP system accordingly. Work with suppliers, sales teams and shared services teams to troubleshoot and resolve invoice and claims exceptions within defined service level agreements. Takes ownership of issues and sees that they are fully resolved. Monitors inventory to identify slow moving, aging and non-sellable product to determine the proper disposition. Negotiates special pricing, returns, programs and other exceptions with the vendor. Ensures that our SMI (slow moving inventory), obsolescence and write-offs are within our established financial goals. Proactively resolves problem situations, often complex, with our suppliers and Arrow departments related to selection of source, price, delivery, etc while remaining within inventory guidelines. Mentors and assists in training of team members. Analyzes training needs of team members and develops and provides input for a solution. Acts as the backup for the manager for assigned responsibilities. What We Are Looking For Bachelor's Degree or above Minimum 2 years’ client-facing working experience Fluent in English and Mandarin Candidates with electronic industry experience is a plus Strong communication skills and interpersonal skills Highly self-driven and able to work under pressure and independently. What’s In It For You  At Arrow, we recognize that financial rewards and great benefits are important aspects of an ideal job. That’s why we offer competitive financial compensation, including various compensation plans, and a solid benefits package. Medical, Insurance Life Insurance 5-Day Work Week Growth Opportunities On-site Café with Catering Option for Busy Lifestyles And more!
industries: Semiconductors

description: Farnell  Farnell, an Avnet company, is a global high-service distributor of technology products, services and solutions for electronic system design, maintenance and repair.  Job Summary  Field sales executive focused on customers to achieve revenue and margin goals in assigned accounts. Identifies customer needs and applies company’s value proposition to drive sales growth and improved profitability. Develops strategic relationships and aligns customer and business goals, creating and managing a business and execution plan for shared success among the customer, vendor partners and the company.  Principal Responsibilities Serves as the primary point of contact for the customer interface to the company's resources that drives and supports high levels of customer satisfaction and loyalty, as measured in surveys and share of wallet. Develops strong, strategic relationships with customer(s) to identify and leverage the customers’ business goals, growth strategies and profit drivers to deliver the appropriate business value proposition sales solution strategy. Provides leadership and guidance in critical customer planning and engagement. Performs critical customer analysis to identify and leverage the partner’s marketing programs to achieve growth in their customer’s solutions capability. Engages customer(s) in joint planning that integrates the company's services, programs and supplier partnerships securing customer commitment for the development of a comprehensive investment in strategies that advance the company’s market position, entanglement and financial goals Conducts regular business reviews with assigned accounts to track progress toward revenue and growth goals and owns execution of business plan. Maintains and monitors pipeline and metrics for assigned customers, performs analysis and identifies improvement opportunities. Supports supplier's strategies by aligning solutions with customer to maximize profitable growth, and customer expansion. Prioritize customers and opportunities with greatest potential for success. Closely manages profitability by minimizing profit leaks and maximizing gross profit. Other duties as assigned. Job Level Specifications Developing expertise of business, financials, products/services, the market, or account needs. Expanded knowledge of the industry, markets and sales processes; broadens sales capabilities. Further develops an understanding of the range of products/ services that the organization and its competitors sell and that assigned customers purchase. Works with moderately complex territory/ assigned accounts, products/services, sales or account management processes. May refer to policies, practices and precedents for guidance; determines best course of action to achieve results. Solves sales problems in straightforward situations; analyzes possible solutions using sales experience, judgment and precedent. Works independently within an assigned territory/account base with moderate sized accounts/opportunities. Has flexibility to set and negotiate terms within defined parameters; is beginning to plan own territory or account approach. Collaborates with internal team, managers and support functions. Has direct contact with clients. Impacts own sales quota and that of others; works within a defined territory or account list and to guidelines and policies. Work Experience Minimum experience required is typically 3+ years with bachelor's or equivalent. Education And Certification(s) Bachelors degree or equivalent experience from which comparable knowledge and job skills can be obtained. Distinguishing Characteristics  The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills.

description: A Sales Manager analyses local market trends and competitor activity to recommend strategies that keep the hotel a leader in the marketplace through the development of future and repeat business.  What will I be doing?  Responsibilities  Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards  As Sales Manager, you will analyse local market trends and competitor activity to recommend strategies that keep the hotel a leader in the marketplace through the development of future and repeat business. Analysis local market trends and competitor activity to identify business leads Develop customer accounts and travel within the local area to drive business into the specific hotel/cluster and to increase market/customer share in all revenue streams Negotiate room rates/packages with corporate clients Develop and implement creative local marketing channels, including social media channels Prepare company contracts for the hotel in accordance with current business and pricing conditions Work within current business strategies and recognising potential opportunities Cooperate with other departments in the hotel to create an exceptional Guest experience and build strong, comprehensive sales programs Attend Sales events, as required Produce accurate and timely reports that meet the needs of the Sales Director and senior management to include the reporting of appointments, calls made and business leads Answer customer queries in a prompt and professional manner Manage staff performance in compliance with company policies and procedures Recruit, manage, train and develop the Sales team What are we looking for?  Skills  To successfully fill this role, you should maintain the attitude, behaviours, skills, and values that follow  A Sales Manager serving Hilton brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members. Positive attitude and good communication skills Commitment to delivering a high level of customer service Excellent grooming standards Flexibility to respond to a range of different work situations Ability to work under pressure and under own initiative Experience in a sales role with a proven track record to close a sale It would be advantageous in this position for you to demonstrate the following capabilities and distinctions: Knowledge of local market Knowledge of hospitality Passion for sales and for achieving targets and objectives Degree-level qualification in a relevant field What will it be like to work for Hilton?  Hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. For nearly a century, Hilton has offered business and leisure travelers the finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. Our vision “to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality” unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. And, our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all!  Work Locations  Waldorf Astoria Shanghai on the Bund  Schedule  Full-time  Brand  Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts  Shift  Day Job  Job Level  Manager  Job  Sales
industries: Restaurants, Food & Beverages, and Hospitality

description: AEL-Berkman delivers integrated transport solutions across the supply chain for cargo to & from China and Hong Kong to businesses worldwide since 1998. Today AEL-Berkman has grown to a mid-size freight forwarder with eleven offices in seven countries, serving satisfied customers worldwide. We are determined towards a "Total Logistics Concept", a cohesive model for all products, by all modes. AEL-Berkman is truly “one of a kind“ having a Western management and ownership in China. We pride ourselves to have successfully adopted a Western standard in combination with Chinese values. 职位名称：销售经理 Job Title: Sales Manager  工作地点: 宁波 Location: Ningbo  工作职责： Job Description:  1.    为国际代理合作伙伴提供合格的销售线索来源/支持来源; Provide qualified sales leads to overseas agency/partners.  2.    开发本地客户及运输业务，以达到既定的销售指标。开发建立潜在客户（建立渠道），建立潜在客户名单，并做后续跟踪发展。 Develop new customers/business in local market to achieve sales targets. Set up pipeline/potential customers’ list and take follow up actions.  3.    单独或与销售同事一起积极开展销售电话，以达到销售指标。 Manage to do solo and joint sales calls and customer visit.  4.    协调公司内部各部门，完成从客户的拜访业务开发到收款。 Coordinate with different internal department to manage sales activities.  5.    为客户设计物流解决方案，并报价。 To design logistics solutions with quotations for the customers.  6.    完成每周和每月的销售计划和绩效报告。 Manage weekly and monthly sales related reports.  要求： Requirements:  1.    大专或以上学历，两年或以上国际货运/物流公司/供应链相关行业经验;其中有无船承运人从业经验，1年以上销售岗位经验。 College degree or above. Minimum 2 years working experience in freight forwarding/logistics/supply chain industries, with minimum 1 year sales experience in NVOCC is required.  2.    中文母语，能用英语邮件沟通，能和国外客户及代理口语交流。 Chinese native speaker. Capable of communicating in English by emails and calls with overseas agents and customers.  3.    性格乐观积极，有说服力，具有自我激励的动力，结果导向，安排自己的销售计划和行为来完成指标。 Optimistic and positive personality, persuasive, self-motivated, result oriented. Capable of arranging sales plan to achieve targets.  4.    能适应压力环境，擅长人际交往，能与人建立良好的关系。 Adapt to work under pressure. Be good at interpersonal communication and building good relationships.

At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.  Medical Representative  Your Tasks And Responsibilities 执行公司市场部的策略，通过以下方式不断的创造需求，完成及超越完成公司的要求； 有效地将目标客户进行分级管理，了解目标客户的情况，合理安排拜访频率、确保正确的传递产品信息； 独立的组织面对客户幻灯演讲； 独立组织圆桌会，有效的与专家合作，以保证医生正确的处方习惯； 协助市场部举办区域的推广会议； 协助主管完成招标及医保事务； 及时准确的反馈市场信息；及时更新数据库信息及当前的拜访信息。 Who You Are 医药学大专及以上学历； 有1年以上医药企业工作经验, 业绩优秀; 为人诚实、工作积极主动； 具有良好的业务敏锐度、学习能力及沟通技巧； 良好的沟通能力及人际关系能力、影响力; 有和医学领域专家建立并保持良好的关系的能力; 良好的创新，开拓能力； 以客户为导向； 良好的自我激励能力，愿意在压力下承担挑战性的工作； 掌握演讲技巧，良好的协调及组织能力。 YOUR APPLICATION  If your background and personal experience fit this profile, please send us your complete application at www.career.bayer.cn If you have any recommendations, please kindly send mail to cnreferral@bayer.com  L ocation:  China : Guang Dong : ShenZhen  Division:  Pharmaceuticals  Reference Code:  475281

description: 工作职责:  Job Purpose and Impact  The Sales Representative will participate in face-to- face and remote selling to our new and existing customers, selling directly or indirectly through various sales channels. We seek a results-oriented professional who, with guidance, will help assess customer needs and suggest appropriate products, services and solutions.  销售代表将直接或间接地通过各种销售渠道，以面对面或远程销售方式，为我们的新客户和现有客户提供销售服务。我们寻找一个以结果为导向的专业销售，他将协助评估客户需求，进而提出适当的产品、服务和解决方案。  Key Accountabilities 协助销售产品展示并提出销售建议，参与产品演示介绍。 协助识别潜在客户，与客户保持沟通并建立合作关系，促进销售业务增长。 掌握基本的产品知识与特性，了解基本市场形势，刺激客户的产品需求，推动销售增长。 计划安排日常销售活动，包括客户访问，达成销售相关定量和定性目标。 密切关注市场变动和竞争动态，及时将信息传递给高级管理人员。 您将在主管指导下工作，处理基本问题，特别复杂的问题要汇报给高级团队成员处理。 其他分配的职责Qualifications 2年以上食品行业研发或者销售经验 （优秀毕业生亦可） 本科及以上学历 英语会简单读写 任职条件:  Same as above

jobTitle: Sales, MST, Industrial Cleaning & CP, China
description: BASF has been a committed partner to Greater China since 1885. With large production sites in Shanghai, Nanjing and Chongqing, as well as a global and regional research and development hub in Shanghai, BASF is a major foreign investor in the country’s chemical industry. BASF posted sales of approximately €8.5 billion in 2020 to customers in Greater China and employed 8,948 people as of the end of the year. For further information, please visit www.basf.com/cn/en.  Objectives Take the sales responsibilities of MST, Industrial Cleaning industry in assigned scope Implement relevant industry and SBU strategy to support business growth, develop and implement short, mid and long-term measures, resource requirement to actualize sales target Identify potential customers and set up action plan aim towards new business realization. Main Tasks Continuously develop and implement appropriate measures to ensure safety at workplace & during business trips. Develop and implement preventive measures to ensure compliance as defined by company’s Code of Conduct Achieve business targets encompassing cCM1, volume & sales, costs, working capital and other business excellence targets such as delivery reliability and customer satisfaction. Develop and implement sales and business development plans at the targeted customers. Develop and implement appropriate channel strategies to ensure effective and efficient coverage and ensure customer intimacy and satisfaction. Develop and implement resource deployment plans, sales management systems and tools to achieve high sales efficiency, e.g. account plans, sales pipelines, call reports etc. Ensure effective collaboration with regional D&I, Marketing and other departments, support to implement appropriate promotional activities, i.e. product brochures, customer workshops, trade shows, seminars, social media based marketing activities etc. Develop and implement corrective actions to maximize margin. Develop and implement measures to continuously track, report and act upon market intelligence such as competitive activities, demand/capacity development, pricing development to ensure BASF’s position as market leader Obtain, update, maintain and evaluate market trends, the application of products/technology and service needs etc. in order to identify new business opportunities Establish and capitalize relationships with key stakeholders such as trade association, opinion leaders and partners to ensure BASF’s market position Regularly and closely monitor outstanding / overdue by customer and DSO. Review credit limits / credit limit requests by customers and payment terms. Actively manage Selling cost, e.g. manage business trip with clear target to ensure effectiveness and efficiency Propose to and implement with team leader for indirect cost management Collaborate with SCM and other departments to ensure effective business forecast, payment terms, receivables and credit risk management, appropriate use of Inco terms and achieve all working capital targets Requirements Education: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in chemistry or related discipline. Postgraduate education such as MBA, Master in related discipline preferred Working Experience: Minimum 7 years’ related working experience in sales. Other requirements: Well established business acumen and communication skills. Primary Location  CN-Guangdong-Guangzhou  Job  Sales / Technical Sales  Ongoing  For BASF, diversity is one of the essential keys to business success and the well-being of our employees. We promote an inclusive culture that accepts the diversity of people, experiences and capabilities. Join the team and connect with more than 117,000 other minds. Stay alert for possible recruitment fraud!  This can include fake websites, fake job offers, or contact from a person falsely claiming to represent BASF.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Financial Services

description: Great working environment Develop leadership skills  About Our Client  A company provides global investment and business professionals with on-demand access to business expertise across all industries and geographies. Through the company, decision-makers from investment management, private equity, management consulting, and corporations connect with a actional network of industry experts that provide qualitative and quantitative market insights, industry expertise, and execution support. Leveraging cutting-edge technology and our global team of 1,000+ professionals in nine offices on three continents, we support our clients 24/7 around the globe.  Job Description  As an Experienced Client Services Associate, you'll act as the connection point between our clients and industry experts. Your role is to understand clients' knowledge gaps and identify experts with the knowledge that can address them. You'll need to think quickly yet critically, conduct high-level research on companies and industries, and identify the experts with the right experience and insights to address our clients' questions. You'll spend considerable time assessing whether experts possess the knowledge our clients seek, and you'll connect qualified experts to our clients. 25% industry research 25% account/project management 50% sales  The Successful Applicant  Within 2 - 4 years working experience in account management, business development and sales-relative roles. Innate curiosity and excitement about the world of business, ideally evidenced through choice of past work experiences, undergraduate degree, past internships, etc. A client-first mindset, which means a relentless commitment to work on clients' behalf and surpass their expectations. The drive and resilience to deliver excellent service amidst tight timelines and changing circumstances. Fluency in Mandarin and English.  What's On Offer  A manager program will accelerate your timeline to manager, you will lead multiple projects and manage accounts. Flexible working hours.  Contact: Wendy Song  Quote job ref: 4215501
industries: Events Services, Financial Services, and Facilities Services

description: 工作职责:  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Execute within a well defined sales/commercial framework. There is generally a step by step sequence of standard tasks which need to be followed to achieve an end result. Work is typically subject to tight oversight. This may be in form of human or systems checking. May be responsible for supporting targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small sales territories.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Roles and Responsibilities selling to or through partners and distributors. May include channel sales support and channel development duties. Developing conceptual knowledge of own discipline. Developing knowledge of own sales territory, product lines, markets, sales processes or customer groups. May include support roles with specialized expertise or technical knowledge in broad area. Applies general knowledge of business developed through education or past experience. Understands how work of own team contributes to the area. Resolves issues using established procedures. Consults supervisor or more senior team members for issues outside of defined instructions/parameters. Collaborates with others to solve issues. For customer facing roles, develops strong customer relationships and serves as the interface between customer and GE. Exchanges technical information, asks questions and checks for understanding. 任职条件:  Required Qualifications This role requires basic experience in the Sales & Channel Sales. Knowledge level is comparable to a Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma with relevant experience). Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: O&G sales Manager（turbomachinery）  工作地点：北京-朝阳 英文要求可作为工作语言。 Requires a minimum of a BS degree in mechanical or electrical engineering, or equivalent, and at least five years’ experience in related Power Generation market, preferably with turbomachinery applications. Beyond the degree and engineering assignments, required at least two years related sales experience. An MBA is not mandatory but is considered to be an asset. Must demonstrate general knowledge of turbomachinery principles and theory, mechanical and electrical engineering and applications related to our business. Must demonstrate strong presentation skills and the ability to function well under pressure. Strong negotiations experience is necessary, along with the ability to represent the company positively and with confidence. Must demonstrate a great ability to connect cross culturally as well as cross functionally and to lead others in customer relations. Strong leadership skills are required; in order to secure resources necessary to prepare proposals, deliver on commitments and to influence the customer to select our products. Fluency in the local language and English is mandatory

description: Guangzhou, China; Remote;  H.B. Fuller is a leading global adhesives provider focusing on perfecting adhesives, sealants and other specialty chemicals across all industries throughout the world. While our products are virtually invisible, they play a vital role in ensuring the quality of modern life and we are committed to connecting what matters to solve some of the world's biggest adhesion challenges.  职位概述Position Overview  依照销售管理制度和工作流程，完成年度销售额任务：在所属行业或区域内进行客户开发与管理。收集市场、客户及竞争信息，并配合市场部进行推广活动。主要负责电池储能行业在中国区域业务。该职位常驻地点为华南或东南区域。  主要职责Main Responsibilities 区域内销售管理 [70%] 依据年度销售计划和销售策略，根据实际客户与市场情况，设定区域内销售计划，并按照周报、月报回顾计划完成情况，及时调整行动计划，保障销售额计划的完成 在销售总经理的指导下，制定并执行每周的客户拜访计划，并完成相关报告/报表的填写与反馈。 通过维护老客户、开发新客户，并不断开发新用胶点，以保障销售额指标达成，推动销售额回款。 根据开发客户需要，举办客户讲座、经销商培训或与其他部门合作举办研讨会。 定期总结成功的用胶点案例。 市场推广[30%] 根据全球产品部及销售部的要求，收集客户、市场及竞争信息，并及时、准确的反馈 配合全球产品部完成市场/行业的产品推广、用胶点成功案例推广等工作 配合全球产品部完成展会支持等工作。 下属员工情况：Subordinates  直接汇报下属人数：0  任职要求Requirements 本科以上,机械、汽车、化工及相关专业。 两年年以上工作经验，其中至少具有一年以上机械行业工作经验（包括工业设备管理等）、工业品领域的销售或者技术服务的工作经验。 数量掌握公司产品知识、客户行业知识。 具备一定的销售技巧，包括重点客户开发与管理、区域管理、谈判技巧、时间管理等。 具备一定的财务、商务谈判、商务礼仪知识。 对销售工作富有激情，积极主动，较强的成就导向。 具备良好的自我管理、沟通、协调、组织以及解决问题的能力。 可以出差。 工作环境 Work Environment 基本办公环境, 出差频率较高。 H.B. Fuller is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.

jobTitle: Sales Manager – Central and North China
description: Description  If you are a Sales Manager or technical sales professional looking for an opportunity to grow, Emerson has an exciting platform for you! Based in Zhuhai, China, you will be contributed the company success for planning, implementation, and execution of sales strategies of company products in Central and North China.  Responsibilities Expand sales regionally including key account management, distributors, and agents in line with organization goals and market shares. Cultivate positive relationships with all levels of customers, stakeholders for both internal and external to develop appropriate solutions to meet customer requirements. Support Senior Business Development Manager in temperature sensors, engineered product and pressure sensor activities. Develop and communicate strategic and tactical project plan to ensure flawless execution of programs to new customers and new applications Analyze and benchmark overall business data and provide market intelligence to discover opportunities driven advantage Proactively build networks across teams, hierarchies, and functions to bring the team along on the journey. Additional Information  N/A  Requirements Bachelor’s degree or above with specialization in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering or related field. Master of Business Administration / Project Management Professional would be advantage 5 years’ plus technical sales experience in components, OEM or electrical appliances sales in which 3-year in managerial position. Result oriented, self-motivated with excellent interpersonal and presentation skills Good communication skills in both written and spoken English Familiar with home appliance, automotive is preferred. Able to travel frequently in China. WHY EMERSON?  Our Commitment to Our People  We invest in our employees to ensure they have the marketplace knowledge, skills and competencies to compete and lead in a global economy. Our training programs focus on end-to-end development from onboarding through senior leadership.  Flexible and competitive benefits plans offer you the right options to meet your individual/family needs  Our success is measured by the positive impact we make on people, our communities and the world in which we live. Learn more about us!.  Our Commitment to Diversity & Inclusion  At Emerson, we are committed to fostering a culture where every employee is valued and respected for their experiences and perspectives. We believe a diverse and inclusive work environment contributes to the rich exchange of ideas that inspires innovation and brings the best solutions to our customers. This philosophy is fundamental to living our company’s values and our responsibility to leave the world in a better place.  Diversity and Inclusion at Emerson is about welcoming, respecting, and valuing the differences each employee possesses. Inclusion is creating a real sense of engagement, belonging and connection for all employees. Learn more about our Culture & Values and about Diversity & Inclusion at Emerson.  If you have a disability and are having difficulty accessing or using this website to apply for a position, you can request help by sending an email to idisability.administrator@emerson.com. description: Company Description  With a 1200-strong workforce, ITK Engineering GmbH is an internationally renowned technology company that sets itself apart with its exceptional expertise in digitalization, electrification, automation and connectivity of systems. Since 2017, the company has been a one hundred percent subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH. Come join a globally expanding technology partner and help shape your future through innovative strength, high quality standards and a passion for new technologies.  ITK Engineering GmbH 成立于1994年，总部在德国，并在北美、日本等国家和地区设有分部，业务遍及汽车、工业、航空、非道路用车、轨道交通和医疗等多个行业领域，致力于为客户量身定制功能软件开发、系统仿真模型开发及软件系统工程测试验证和咨询等灵活的软件技术解决方案  Job Description Sales of engineering services to external and Bosch internal customers. Main business fields: powertrain, chassis control and driver assistance, vehicle systems. Key tasks Acquisition of engineering projects. Acquisition of new customers while building up a close personal relationship with the customer. Commercial negotiation, contracting and accounts receivable. Close cooperation with project managers and technical experts in the BEG organization. Support of the development of new business fields. Qualifications Commercial sales experience. Technical background related to Bosch Engineering's business fields. Independent work attitude. Strategic thinking. Persistence in following up business opportunities with customers and internally. English language skills. Additional Information 该岗位内部推荐奖金为人民币5,000元整（仅限博世内部员工申请），具体请参见《博世中国内部推荐政策》 Internal Referral bonus of this vacancy: RMB 3,000 (Valid only for Bosch associates). description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Who We Are  Airwallex is a technology company that revolutionises the way businesses operate globally. Our financial infrastructure provides a modern technology stack for businesses to operate internationally, without the challenges of the current global financial system.  Businesses use Airwallex as their end-to-end global financial services platform. Whether it’s making or receiving payments from customers, domestically or internationally, Airwallex saves businesses time and money by offering real-time, reliable and cost-effective financial solutions. Our web and API solutions support businesses of all sizes, from small companies to large enterprises.  In this fast-changing digital world that is increasingly becoming borderless, our mission is to empower businesses of all sizes to grow in their own markets and around the world, and by doing so, contribute to the global economy.  Who You Are Build and deepen executive relationships with enterprise customers. Influence long-term strategic direction, and serve as a business partner. Negotiate and manage entire complex sales-cycles, often presenting to C-level executives in corporate and global customers. Lead account strategy in generating and developing business growth opportunities, working collaboratively with Airwallex Partners. Actively understand each customer’s technology footprint, strategic growth plans and business drivers, technology strategy and competitive landscape. Drive business development, forecast accurately and achieve strategic goals by leading customers through the entire business cycle. Help to drive product innovation based on your experience and feedback from clinets. Skills And Experience You Will Bring Bachelor’s degree and above. Very strong communication skills (both internal and external). 10 years and above of experience selling infrastructure software, databases, analytic tools, or applications software. Experience leveraging C-level relationships. Experience working with and managing partners in complex implementation projects. Enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and have a level of maturity to run your own race within the organization. Excellent written and verbal English & Chinese. Prior experiences in B2B, payment, or professional service industries will be a plus.

description: Shanghai, China;  H.B. Fuller is a leading global adhesives provider focusing on perfecting adhesives, sealants and other specialty chemicals across all industries throughout the world. While our products are virtually invisible, they play a vital role in ensuring the quality of modern life and we are committed to connecting what matters to solve some of the world's biggest adhesion challenges. Primary Duties Maintain and develop relationship with Auto OEMs. Find new opportunities of adhesives in OEMs, especially the applications at EV cars. Work together with regional sales managers to collect the projects plan of OEMs, develop the following plan and follow through. Work together with technical Dept, sales team and technical service to develop the innovation solution in EV Auto market. Work closely with global OEM team, support the bisuiness growth for global OEMs. Minimum Requirements Bachelor's degree with good English skills. At least 5+ years working experience in Auto field. Well organized, process and data driven, producing accurate and timely reports. Analytical ability to develop business cases and analyze market data. Proven ability to lead projects in multi-functional teams and navigate effectively in a matrix organization. Ability to travel frequently. H.B. Fuller is an Equal Opportunity Employer. description: AEL-Berkman delivers integrated transport solutions across the supply chain for cargo to & from China and Hong Kong to businesses worldwide since 1998. Today AEL-Berkman has grown to a mid-size freight forwarder with eleven offices in seven countries, serving satisfied customers worldwide. We are determined towards a "Total Logistics Concept", a cohesive model for all products, by all modes. AEL-Berkman is truly “one of a kind“ having a Western management and ownership in China. We pride ourselves to have successfully adopted a Western standard in combination with Chinese values. 职位名称：销售经理 Job Title: Sales Manager  工作地点: 青岛 Location: Qingdao  工作职责： Job Description:  1.    为国际代理合作伙伴提供合格的销售线索来源/支持来源; Provide qualified sales leads to overseas agency/partners.  2.    开发本地客户及运输业务，以达到既定的销售指标。开发建立潜在客户（建立渠道），建立潜在客户名单，并做后续跟踪发展。 Develop new customers/business in local market to achieve sales targets. Set up pipeline/potential customers’ list and take follow up actions.  3.    单独或与销售同事一起积极开展销售电话，以达到销售指标。 Manage to do solo and joint sales calls and customer visit.  4.    协调公司内部各部门，完成从客户的拜访业务开发到收款。 Coordinate with different internal department to manage sales activities.  5.    为客户设计物流解决方案，并报价。 To design logistics solutions with quotations for the customers.  6.    完成每周和每月的销售计划和绩效报告。 Manage weekly and monthly sales related reports.  要求： Requirements:  1.    大专或以上学历，两年或以上国际货运/物流公司/供应链相关行业经验;其中有无船承运人从业经验，1年以上销售岗位经验。 College degree or above. Minimum 2 years working experience in freight forwarding/logistics/supply chain industries, with minimum 1 year sales experience in NVOCC is required.  2.    中文母语，能用英语邮件沟通，能和国外客户及代理口语交流。 Chinese native speaker. Capable of communicating in English by emails and calls with overseas agents and customers.  3.    性格乐观积极，有说服力，具有自我激励的动力，结果导向，安排自己的销售计划和行为来完成指标。 Optimistic and positive personality, persuasive, self-motivated, result oriented. Capable of arranging sales plan to achieve targets.  4.    能适应压力环境，擅长人际交往，能与人建立良好的关系。 Adapt to work under pressure. Be good at interpersonal communication and building good relationships.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  概要：  大客户销售需持续开发和管理企业客户，不断创造商业合作和业务增长机会。  工作职责：  — 了解和掌握所在行业和区域的商业机会，维护现有客户合作，不断开发新客户，达成销售指标；  — 向客户提供顾问式服务，与关键决策人建立并保持良好关系，确保销售达成；  — 负责客户询价、销售报价，为客户提供空气净化产品和定制化空气质量解决方案，满足客户需求；  — 使用CRM系统进行日常销售工作，追踪销售数据，提交销售预测，推动业务增长；  — 与公司内部管理人员、销售部门和其他团队合作，保障客户服务质量，提高客户满意度；  — 积极参与市场推广和行业活动。  任职要求:  — 本科以上学历；  — 三年以上B2B直接销售经验，有企业客户开发经验者优先；  — 具有商务谈判技能、项目投标经验；  — 良好的人际关系技能和出色的表达沟通能力；  — 自我激励，渴望成功，结果导向；  — 良好的英文听说读写能力。

description: 公司介绍  At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible.  At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon.  We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future.  Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too.  We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands.  Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data.  职位描述 Explore new business through various sale and marketing tools to identify new customers by working with closely with marketing leads and sales leads, communicate with broad customer base and identify the right customers. Develop sales tools and customized sales content by working together with internal sales team and marketing team. Build solid data and milestone chart in system to identify and track strategy execution to improve sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness. Work internally to strategize sales tools and solution by vertical/applications, build Account Based case study and promotion plan Product solutions focused strategy to promote WDC products and solutions to targeted account Partner cross-functionally with other teams to align with the latest strategy and resources for targeted accounts. Other work assigned by team lead 职位要求  Required Key Skills Experienced sales internship in university or endeavor to be a sales in future, All majors are welcomed, Major in Computer science, EE, material science or other IT related major would be a plus. Able to use English at a working proficiency level, good communication skills. Pro-active with a CAN-DO attitude, able to accept new knowledge in a short time. Outstanding interpersonal and relationship management skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with varying levels of the organization Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to distill complex subjects to a wider audience Evidence of strong character with integrity, honesty, accountability and trust 额外信息  Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution.  Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at [email protected] to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

Leads the design/ delivery of new programs/ processes/ services; is the key technical contributor. Solves complex, high impact program/ process/ project design/ development problems. Typically 8+ years in industry experience for entry to this level. Requires specialized depth and/or breadth of expertise in at least one of these area: E-mobility / Automotive Electronics / Autonomous driving / T&M. description: MAIN OBJECTIVE OF THIS POSITION     - Collect internal and market information, execute data analytics and produce regular and ad hoc market intelligence reports  - Identify and capture latest digital trends, collect & analyze Ecommerce data internally and from the market and produce regular and ad hoc digital intelligence reports  - Design and improve analytical methods to meeting the grow business demand from brands and top management  Keep MINT Community active through animated programs and updated communication platforms     MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES OF THIS POSITION     - Search market information, including but not limited to competitor’s sales figures, strategies, lessons to learn, as well as macro economy, market trends, consumer insights in order to show full pictures of the market, LVMH brands’ competency, and facilitate management decision.  - Help maintain market intelligence database and control reliability of information reported by doing regular sanity checks  - Study and analyze in emerging trends: new digital moves, E-Commerce gamic, innovative sales channels & business models, social media, upon market needs or management requirement.  - Design programs and organize events for MINT Community, work closely with brand partners and third-party vendors to bring insights to company managements  - Collect and report latest industry news in a very regular basis and deliver to right  - Produce market reports in PowerPoints or Word document      PRINCIPAL COMPETENCIES, SKILLS AND BACKGROUND     Skills & competencies:  - Proficient in EXCEL and PowerPoint, experience with visualization tool (Tableau, PowerBI) a plus  - Excellent communication skills, fluent in written & verbal English  - Strong analytic skills: market sizing, competitive intelligence and expert interview; and financial analysis experience or capability a great plus  - Excellent work ethics  - Organized, careful, result driven, good business acumen  - Familiar with commonly used data sources of beauty industry in China    Experience / background  - 3- 5 years full time employment (accumulative) in market research firms, consulting firms or multinational consumer good companies  - Actual work experience in market intelligence related functions, including but not limited to market research, due diligence study, consumer study, strategy consulting, internal consulting, etc  - Familiar with beauty industry, and/or retail and e-commerce
