description: Why work at Entegris?  Lead. Inspire. Innovate. Define Your Future.  Not everyone who works for a global company shares the same background, experiences and perspectives. We leverage the differences of our employees to bring new ideas to the table. Every employee throughout the company is encouraged to share input on projects and initiatives. Our decision making process is truly a collaborative effort as we realize there are leaders at every level of the organization. We put our values at the core of how we operate as an organization — not just when it’s convenient, but in a lasting and meaningful way. We want the time and energy you spend here to have a positive impact on your life inside and outside of the office.  Entegris is a values-driven culture and our employees rally around our core PACE values:  P eople  A ccountability  C reativity  E xcellence  The Role  This Position Will Be Based In China Hangzhou And May Require Occasional Domestic Travel  ANOW is seeking an Account Manager for its business in medical instruments industry, who will develop new markets and sell new medical instruments. This role is responsible for filter products sales by visiting customers in medical instruments field. Increase our product share in the medical market Generate interest in our products, get customers to evaluate, win POR, and proliferate Raise the company awareness in the biopharmaceutical filed In this role you will Make responsible regional sales target, market development plan, develop responsible regional market, complete sales task target. Responsible for collecting sales. Promote the image of the company, transfer company information; Familiar with industry knowledge, product knowledge, to provide customers with the best product solutions. Improve and update customer profile information in charge of market; Collect and organize customer feedback information in time and report to department manager. Develop sales expense budget for the responsible area; Complete other tasks assigned within the department. Traits we believe make a strong candidate Possessing an attitude of ownership, accountability, and never willing to quit Build trusting relationships with customers Bachelor’s degree or above, major in science and engineering is preferred. 3-5 years working experience in industrial products, sales experience in Medical is preferred. With strong customer communication ability and high business processing ability, with good team spirit. Can adapt to domestic business trip, have strong pressure resistance ability. Assist sales manager to do customer service Your success will be measured by Sales Revenue Wins of New customers To be results oriented; Discovery of customer plans Ability to build strong relationships with customers and other stakeholders within ANOW; Strong self-motivated character and excellent problem-solving skills; Good interpersonal skills, self-starter, ability to work independently; Teamwork spirit, positive and optimistic attitude What We Offer  Our total rewards package goes above and beyond just a paycheck. Whether you’re looking to build your career, improve your health, or protect your wealth, we offer generous benefits to help you achieve your goals. Very Competitive total compensation plans. A 401(K) plan to help you plan for your future with an impressive employer match that’s all yours- no vesting! Great health, dental and vision insurance packages to fit your needs to ensure you’re happy and healthy. A progressive PTO policy that empowers our employees to take the time they need to recharge! At Entegris we are committed to providing equal opportunity to all employees and applicants. Our policy is to recruit, hire, train, and reward employees for their individual abilities, achievements and experience without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, age, national origin, disability, marital or military status.

该职位来源于猎聘  Position Summary  Basic Function and Scope of the Position: Ensure achievement of district Library Prep sales objectives in line with the Company's mission. Control, organize and direct sales activities through both strategic and tactical activities with direct TAMs within the district. Provide regular reports on status of specific sales, potential market opportunities and market conditions, and competitor activities to the Sr DSM.  Responsibilities Develop, implement and monitor the direct TAM and/or sales channel partner sales business plan to meet assigned budget. Responsible for the recruitment, development, retention and management of the district sales team. Manage, coach, motivate assigned sales team to achieve territory and district sales objectives and goals. Coordinate and communicate sales activities and strategies effectively to supervisors. Responsible for ensuring that commitment to customer satisfaction is performed, delivered, and constantly improved. Coordinate and/or supervise technical/sales/administrative training for the direct TAM sales team in conjunction with APAC Sales Operations Manager. Ensure that Illumina’s values are followed by all staff. Monitor, assist, set standards, and evaluate the district sales team performance utilizing performance management tools. Establish territory quotas and achieve the quarterly and annual sales and profit plan as assigned. Routinely forecast, monitor, and control selling and other expenses for the district within assigned expense budgets. Routinely and accurately forecast customer demand (i.e., product quantities and dollars, orders, shipments). Ensure that sales staff achieves their forecasts, follows company guidelines/practices/policies, and provide timely development plans to correct for underperformance. Maintain profit margins through effective sales negotiation.  Supervisory Responsibilities  Talent Acquisition activities which include identifying needs of the department, justification for budget to fill positions, coordinating with HR to market the position, review resumes, conduct interviews and identify and recommend a candidate as the potential hire, and employee orientation to the department and company.  Talent Development activities which include developing training plans with employees to ensure they have the necessary expertise to successfully perform their jobs, provide ongoing guidance to employees, and career counseling to help employees develop and advance in their careers  Job Role Definition ensures that job descriptions accurately record the primary responsibilities, qualifications and terms for each job role in their group  Performance Management activities include setting performance standards, ensuring employees have appropriate and realistic job goals, providing ongoing feedback about employees’ performance, conducting performance appraisals, including assessing how the employees have performed and how they can improve their performance, developing performance improvement plans if employees’ performance is not adequate and providing rewards for employee accomplishments.  Ensure employees follow all applicable company policies and procedures  All listed tasks and responsibilities are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.  Requirements  A minimum of 7+ years of sales experience in the Life Science industry.  1-3 years of sales management experience in the Life Science industry preferable.  Strong technical background in molecular biology or genomics is required  Must be able to build relationships at a very high level.  Ability to effectively communicate and influence internal and external audiences, using both oral and written communication skills.  Excellent listening, time management, organizational and interpersonal skills.  Detail- and service-oriented individual.  Requires Bachelor's, may require an advanced degree (Master's), in applicable field or equivalent.  Typically has 7+ years of direct work experience, with 1-3 years of Management experience.  Managers at this level may become involved in day-to-day activities where their acquired expertise and knowledge provide focus to subordinates.  Uses interpersonal skills to influence customers, suppliers and other comparable level managers.  Preferred Experience/Education  岗位概述：  岗位基本职能和范围：  确保遵照公司计划完成辖区建库销售目标。与本辖区的直属区域客户经理(TAM)配合，通过战略战术双向活动，来管控、组织和指导建库销售工作。定期向高级地区销售经理(DSM)报告具体的销售状况、潜在市场机会、市场条件和竞争对手活动。  岗位职责：  制定、实施并监控直属区域客户经理(TAM)和/或销售渠道合作伙伴的销售业务计划，以满足分配的预算。  负责辖区销售团队的招聘、培养、保留和管理。  管理、指导、激励分管的销售团队，实现地区和辖区的销售目标。  与上级主管有效地协调和沟通销售活动和策略。  负责确保履行、实现并不断改进客户满意度承诺。  与亚太地区销售运营经理一起，协调和/或监督直属区域客户经理(TAM)销售团队的技术/销售/行政培训。  确保所有员工都遵循因美纳的价值观。  运用宜曼达绩效管理工具，监控、协助并设立标准，评估辖区销售团队绩效。  设定地区配额，按分配额度实现季度和年度销售额及利润计划。  在分配的开支预算范围内，对本辖区的销售及其他开支进行常规的预测、监督和控制工作。  定期准确预测客户需求（即产品数量和金额、订单、发货等）。  确保销售人员达成预期目标，遵从公司原则/实践/政策，并为绩效未达标者及时提供发展计划。  通过有效的销售谈判保证利润率。  负责确保充分利用并更新，同时符合公司各项政策和实践准则。  确保与其他部门（例如市场营销部、客户解决方案部）、本地销售团队以及员工密切联系，确保工作协调开展，对共同目标的理解充分一致。  监督管理职责：  人才招聘工作包括确定部门需求、确定聘用上岗的预算、与人力资源部门协调配合发布职位、审阅简历、进行面试、确定并推荐可能录用的候选人，以及开展新员工进入公司和部门的入职培训。  人才培养工作包括制定员工培训计划，确保员工具备成功履行岗位职责所必需的专业知识，为员工提供持续指导和职业发展咨询，帮助员工在职业道路上发展进步。  界定岗位职责，确保岗位描述能够准确阐明各职位在团队中的主要职责、资格要求及条件。  绩效管理工作包括设立绩效标准，确保员工有切合实际的工作目标，对员工绩效持续提供反馈，开展绩效评估，包括评估员工当前的绩效情况以及如何提升其绩效。如果员工的绩效不达标，则制定绩效改进计划，并对员工取得的成就予以奖励。  确保员工遵守所有适用的公司政策和规程。  以上所列的任务和职责是本岗位的基本职能；工作开展中可能需要合理完成额外的任务和职责。  岗位要求：  至少7年以上生命科学行业销售经验。  1-3年销售管理经验，生命科学行业者优先。  要求具有坚实的分子生物或基因组学技术背景。  务必能够在高层级别建立关系。  能够运用口头和书面沟通技能，有效地沟通和影响内外部受众。  卓越的聆听、时间管理、组织和人际关系技巧。  注重细节，服务为本。
industries: Medical Devices

jobTitle: Business Development Support Officer销售助理
description: Company Description  We’re on a mission to help move the businesses that move the world. With over 130 years’ experience, Toll Group, proudly part of Japan Post, operates an extensive global logistics network, covering road, air, sea and rail across 1,200 locations in more than 50 countries.  Global Forwarding delivers cargo across our global network via road, rail, sea, and air. From loose cartons for consolidation and palletised cargo to moving dangerous goods and bulk commodities, we have the experience, the infrastructure, and the global network to get freight moving – across towns, across countries and across continents.  Job Description 负责协助销售人员的查找价格、报价、接收BOOKING, 填写业务流程，通知操作部门跟进订舱，以及核对账单等； 主动跟进每票业务的后续跟踪、反馈，并有需要与相关部门的沟通； 定期按要求将客户信息录入系统，并保持更新； 协助维护与客户的良好关系，保持与客户良好沟通； 负责统计销售人员每月业绩表现及相关报表。 完成上级领导交付的其他调配的工作. Qualifications 专科以上学历，国贸、物流、英语等相关专业优先（要求2年以上相关工作经验）； 英语阅读能力强，有一定的商务英文信函写作和英文口头表达能力； 良好的团队精神，主动配合公司其他同事的工作； 性格开朗，对待工作热情细致，具备较强学习能力和优秀的沟通能力. Additional Information  Be Connected  With a bold vision and innovative drive, join our 44,000 colleagues as we lead industry change and transform how customers best meet their global supply chain needs in a meaningful and sustainable way. There are countless opportunities to learn and make a real impact in shaping our industry’s future. Grow with diverse challenges amongst a friendly and inclusive global culture. Take pride in building relationships that matter, because being connected is at the centre of what makes Toll great – it’s what makes our possibilities endless.  Toll embraces and celebrates a variety of cultures. We continue to build a business that reflects the values of equality, built on the knowledge and understanding that everyone is welcome including the First Nations Peoples and those of all ages, genders and abilities.  To find out more about us visit www.tollgroup.com/careers  To be considered, you must be entitled to work in the specified country and be prepared to undertake pre-employment checks including a criminal history check and medical assessment.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Logistics and Supply Chain, and Staffing and Recruiting

description: 工作职责: 向指定客户销售时，新增客户通常很少，并且通常需要经过审查。包括单个业务组/P&L 中的关键客户 扩大自己对销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群体的认识，以执行政策/策略。不断培养更高水平的知识和技能。 理解关键业务驱动力的基础知识；用这种理解来完成自己的工作。了解自己团队的工作如何与其他团队融合并为该领域做出贡献。 可能具有一定的自主权，从而在定义的框架内进行决策。以良好的商业知识和判断力解决在规定程序中遇到的问题。就定义的说明/参数之外的问题咨询更多的高级团队成员。 此级别的职位需要良好的人际交往能力。向直接相关的同事和业务部门传达所提供的设计和协调服务。对于面对客户的角色，建立牢固的客户关系并充当客户与 GE 之间的接口。向他人介绍技术信息。 任职条件:  基本资格 该岗位要求在领域具有初步的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历） 所需特性 优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够独立工作。较强的解决问题能力

description: 职位介绍：  负责上海的血气针销售，通过完善区域销售管理及优化，完成年度销售任务及市场规划，以达成逐步提升市场份额的目的。  岗位职责：  * 深耕现有市场并开发潜在市场，摸索并总结区域客户及渠道商业模式； * 负责所属区域医院的产品销售及推广，完成销售任务(KA医院除外)； * 制定负责区域的专业推广活动，建立良好的互动机制； * 关注、收集负责区域竞争对手的情况，制定市场对策并实施； * 联络、发现、培养本地区KOL； * 与关键客户建立牢固的关系和信任，从而持续影响客户的使用习惯； * 积极开展负责区域内的经销商管理以及新渠道的培养发展，完善良好经销商网络； * 主动配合其他部门工作，促进跨部门协作； * 严格遵守国家合规相关法律和公司合规相关规定、规范。 职位要求：  * 本科以上学历，耗材护理等相关专业优先； * 5年以上耗材销售以及渠道管理经验； * 有较好的渠道资源者优先； * 市场敏锐度良好，善于项目管理； * 优秀的销售和交际能力，擅于沟通、协作； * 具有独立思考及解决问题能力； * 工作主动，能够独立工作，有较强的抗压能力； * 有较强的和同事、渠道伙伴和客户建立和维持良好的关系的能力。
industries: Medical Devices

description: l As a member of this team, the qualified individual will be responsible for business development and selling activities for key global and local Consumer Goods End-users, integrators, and OEMs, as well as support the business growth of the Brew and Beverage segment in China. This individual will primarily service the China market working in the global team environments. l Manage commercial relationships with existing customers - liaison between the company and customer. l Identify sales opportunities. Articulate and document company resources needed for belting and equipment (Packet to Palletizer Conveyancee Solutions) sales to closure. l Regularly visit customer plants and corporate sites to understand customer's production realities, identify opportunities where the company can bring value, and introduce products, services, and solutions to customers. l Present the company management and peers with facts about customers and an accurate picture of the market so that effective strategy can be built and decisions made. l Embrace the concept of team-based selling in performing the job. Look for opportunities to use team and company resources to further develop the ultimate goal of selling. l Embrace the concept of "self-management" in performing the above responsibilities.  ² Qualifications  l BS or BA from an accredited University. Bachelor's degree in engineering combined with business education is preferred. l 4-6 years of solid sales experience in a B2B environment with preferable knowledge and mechanical engineering experience within the factory automation and packaging industry. l Native Mandarin Chinese and fluently spoken and written English. l Able to travel up to 60%. l Possess a confident outlook along with an entrepreneurial, problem-solving personality. l A passion for learning and growth, willingness, and ability to be self-managed. l Proven record calling on decision-makers at the Plant and corporate level. l Excellent communicator and team-player.

Ralph Lauren Corporation（NYSE：RL）是高档生活方式产品的设计，营销和分销的全球领导者，其产品涵盖以下五个类别：服装，配饰，家居，香水和酒店。 50多年来，拉尔夫 劳伦（Ralph Lauren）的声誉和独特形象在不断扩大的产品，品牌和国际市场中得到了不断发展。公司的品牌名称包括Ralph Lauren，Ralph Lauren Collection，Ralph Lauren Purple Label，Polo Ralph Lauren，Double RL，Lauren Ralph Lauren，Polo Ralph Lauren Children，Chaps和 等，构成了世界上数量最多的品牌之一广泛认可的消费品牌家族  在 Ralph Lauren，我们通过放大各种旨在创造归属感文化的声音和观点来团结并激励公司内部的社群以及我们所服务的社群，从而为所有人确保包容性与公平。我们通过以下方面促进包容性文化：人才、教育与沟通、员工组以及庆祝会。  Sales Supervisor

description: Job Description  Morgan Stanley Huaxin Funds  Position Title: Channel Sales, Analyst/ Associate  Location: Zhengzhou, China  Company Profile  Morgan Stanley is a leading global financial services firm providing a wide range of investment banking, securities, investment management and wealth management services. The Firm's employees serve clients worldwide including corporations, governments and individuals from more than 747 offices in 42 countries. As a market leader, the talent and passion of our people is critical to our success. Together, we share a common set of values based on integrity, excellence and giving back. Morgan Stanley can provide a superior foundation for building a professional career - a place for people to learn, to achieve and grow. A philosophy that balances personal lifestyles, perspectives and needs is an important part of our culture.  Morgan Stanley Huaxin Fund Management Co., Ltd. (“Morgan Stanley Huaxin Funds”) has changed registration with the Industry and Commerce Bureau on June 12, 2008 and is now Sino-foreign joint venture funds management company (formerly known as Jutian Fund Management Company established in 2003) with registered capital of RMB 227.5 million. Morgan Stanley Huaxin Funds is headquartered in Shenzhen, and has two branches, one in Beijing and the other in Shanghai.  “Gather World Wise, Achieve Ideal Life”. As a joint venture fund management company, Morgan Stanley Huaxin Funds benefits from the global vision of its foreign shareholder, Morgan Stanley, and absorbs the local investment wisdom from its Chinese major shareholder, Huaxin Securities. Supported by both foreign and domestic shareholders, Morgan Stanley Huaxin Funds has devoted itself to becoming a leading asset management company in China. Established in Chinese market and benefiting from its international background, Morgan Stanley Huaxin Funds commits itself to building a harmonious, normative, transparent and progressive corporate culture and providing fund investors with good investment returns and professional services.  Morgan Stanley Huaxin Funds provides diversified and professional investment management services to fund investors, including actively managed products, indexing investment products, quantitative investment products, fixed income products and separately-managed account (SMA) products, with a goal to meet investors’ needs for asset allocations, risk management and producing investment returns.  Responsibilities Responsible for business development and sales channel maintenance with Financial Institutions (both Banking and NBFI channels) in East China region; Work closely with relevant parties in product development, launch, and promotion; Act as the contact point for clients, and service regional clients’ needs; Customize investment products and provide investment advice to client’s; Requirements Bachelor’s degree or above from top universities. Master’s degree in a Business related subject is preferable; Sound knowledge in the fund industry in general, and conversant in the firm’s product offerings; At least 2-3 years’ sales experience in to Financial Institutions (both Banking and NBFI), preferably with major domestic banks; Good communication and interpersonal skills, and a strong sense of customer service Able to travel for work;
industries: Information Technology and Services, Staffing and Recruiting, and Financial Services

description: EBANX is a global fintech company that emerged in 2012 with the mission of connecting companies to Latin America, facilitating payments on internacional sites such as Aliexpress, Airbnb, Sony, Spotify, and many others. As we grew, our portfolio also expanded and we went beyond payment methods. Today we also offer solutions in local processing and different products and services for our final consumers. We are called ebankers and we are changing the way people buy, connect, and live globally. Do you want to join our Big Dream and be part of this team?  In your role as the marketing specialist for our APAC division you will be working hand in hand with the global marketing team to develop, create, and execute demand generation strategies, in a localized way, to reach our APAC prospects.  We are looking for a proactive, organized, curious person who is execution and demand generation driven, and also has the ability to have a big picture view of the overall EBANX strategy and incorporate that into your regionalized approach. Your primary KPIs include lead generation, opportunities, deal velocity, and total processing volume added to the APAC pipeline. You will be our go to person to reach and connect to this region through ABM campaigns, thought leadership, and sales support.  You'll work cross-functionally to communicate the value of EBANX and the momentum of the Latin American market to mid-size and enterprise organizations across China (especially), Japan, South Korea, Singapore and others, in the digital, retail and travel space across a variety of touchpoints. The work you do will directly impact important business metrics, including brand awareness and education, lead conversions, sales pipeline movement, and programmatic expansion, and, for that, you will work dotted line with our APAC Commercial team in China. Your core challenge will be to build close relationships between the EBANX marketing and commercial teams and the team based in APAC, and drive value across every point in the sales cycle from top of funnel to the first sale an account makes with us.  As a Marketing Specialist you will be responsible for: Plan, execute, and evaluate all marketing activities in APAC aiming to build the commercial pipeline with MQLs, and move deals in the funnel; Develop demand generation strategies that drive thought leadership, enhance website conversions, marketing campaigns, and pipeline momentum; Be account obsessed - Identifying, developing and iterating an ICP for each market and the ability to align each with the opportunity in Latin America and EBANX product value; Write a variety of content assets, including guides, case studies, blog posts, landing pages, sponsored content, and marketing emails, tailor/translate for each account and country; Develop a messaging framework for our target personas, verticals, and different EBANX products to create consistency in our messaging, value proposition for each country; Collaborate closely with our Go-to-market, Demand Generation, Performance, Sales, --Account management and Content teams to identify new campaign, content and distribution opportunities; Work closely with APAC commercial team to stay on top of deal movements and health to activate lifecycle marketing initiatives to expedite pipeline velocity; Track results and performance of content marketing activities to inform which touchpoints and tactics are the best performing and have the biggest influence on the sales cycle.  Main requirements for this position: A track record of executing B2B demand generation campaigns across the APAC region (especially China). You should have countless examples of successful campaigns that you are most proud of, as well as those that weren't as successful and what you learned as a result; Metrics driven - Ability to identify when different tactics are working and when they aren't and the ability to analyze performance, call out patterns, and iterate your strategy; Advanced English is mandatory, native or advanced Mandarin is preferred; Ability to stay on top of trends and insights across the LatAm market, our buyers, and the payment landscape and incorporate into campaigns and thought leadership pushes; Ability to work with third party vendors, including agencies, market intelligence resources and more; Strong collaboration – ability to build relationships at all levels of the organization and within the Global Marketing team; a fundamental understanding of the role of transparency and teamwork; Ability to write and distribute different formats of content for a variety of audiences, and define their success metrics: ad copy, long form articles, case studies, reports, presentations, emails and more; Love what you're doing. Excited by new challenges and thinking outside of the box; Deep experience with localized social media, paid media, advertising, branded content, and search engine marketing channels.  What else would we like to see? Experience with Hubspot, Salesforce, and Google Analytics; Experience with Baidu, 360, Sogou, Zhihu, Baidu Zhidao, Yuguowenda, WeChat, WEIBO, DOUYIN, and YOL are a huge plus; Knowledge of the payments industry; Results-driven; Attentive to detail; Organization and prioritization forward; Team player mindset; Ability to quickly adapt to changes.  EBANX offers: A challenging environment, with opportunities to growth; Casual office and dress code; Spanish, English and Portuguese classes; WAVES - Program of goals and results (variable compensation); EBANX Play - Wellness (Gympass, e-Sports, SESC ); Semi flexible hours (8 hours a day - Monday to Friday); Meal Allowance; Transportation voucher (if needed); EBANX Education: scholarship; EBANX Skills: budget for workshops and courses; Hello ebanker: psychology, finance and legal orientation. Health and Dental Insurance; Blue Club: Exclusive discount for ebankers in bakeries, restaurants, courses, electronics store and more!  Follow us on Instagram and look for the hashtag #ebanxlife to learn more about EBANX's culture.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Internet, and Financial Services

description: Company Description  Microchip Technology Inc. is a leading provider of embedded control applications. Our product portfolio comprises general purpose and specialized 8-bit, 16-bit, and 32-bit microcontrollers, 32-bit microprocessors, field-programmable gate array (FPGA) products, a broad spectrum of high-performance linear, mixed-signal, power management, thermal management, radio frequency (RF), timing, safety, security, wired connectivity and wireless connectivity devices, as well as serial Electrically Erasable Programmable Read Only Memory (EEPROM), Serial Flash memories, Parallel Flash memories, and serial Static Random Access Memory (SRAM). We also license Flash-IP solutions that are incorporated in a broad range of products.  Job Description  Are you a self-starter? Do you think different? At Microchip Technology, our values system empowers our employees to develop and thrive in a supportive, collaborative, professional, global, and rewarding working environment. We embrace change and continuous improvement, driving both to the mutual benefit of ourselves and our clients. We are looking for like-minded people who can share our passion for success.  Successful candidate will have Sales Experience in the Semiconductor Industry and be able to work closely with all field personnel to ensure optimum client satisfaction in our efforts to drive design wins to revenue. Responsibilities will include managing multiple large accounts utilizing our systems, acting as main point of contact between client buyers and factories, supporting distributors and representatives as requested by management. Ability to run reports and understand and utilize data within reports is critical. Industry knowledge is important and developing partnerships with field, factories and clients will be the key to success. Candidate must be professional, accurate and dependable, always seeking win-win.  Job Responsibilities Act as Customer Service Representative to support Client Engagement Team (Sales Team) Perform sales coordination activities on daily logistics. Conduct sales administration related Reports, forecast entry etc. Align with Internal Teams and provide timely logistics support Conduct analysis of backlog, demand, supply, inventory Customer Relationship Management – Account profile Order Management i.e. Sample, Order entry, Backlog confirmation/Reschedule, Shipment expedite/notification, RMA Job Requirements  Competencies Time Management – Systematically monitor and scheduling timelines from start to end. Communication – Clear and speed expression among Clients, Factories, Logistic and Client Engagement Managers etc. Qualification And Experience College graduate Minimum 5 years’ experience in Senior Customer Service position (inclusive 3 years in the field of electronic industry is preferred) Excellent written and spoken in English and Chinese Familiar with MS. Office i.e. Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint Chinese Word Processing
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing and Semiconductors

description: Company Description  At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible.  At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon.  We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future.  Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too.  We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands.  Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data.  Job Description Explore new business through various sale and marketing tools to identify new customers by working with closely with marketing leads and sales leads, communicate with broad customer base and identify the right customers. Develop sales tools and customized sales content by working together with internal sales team and marketing team. Build solid data and milestone chart in system to identify and track strategy execution to improve sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness. Work internally to strategize sales tools and solution by vertical/applications, build Account Based case study and promotion plan Product solutions focused strategy to promote WDC products and solutions to targeted account Partner cross-functionally with other teams to align with the latest strategy and resources for targeted accounts. Other work assigned by team lead Qualifications  Required key skills: Experienced sales internship in university or endeavor to be a sales in future, All majors are welcomed, Major in Computer science, EE, material science or other IT related major would be a plus. Able to use English at a working proficiency level, good communication skills. Pro-active with a CAN-DO attitude, able to accept new knowledge in a short time. Outstanding interpersonal and relationship management skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with varying levels of the organization Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to distill complex subjects to a wider audience Evidence of strong character with integrity, honesty, accountability and trust Additional Information  Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution.  Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at [email protected] to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.
industries: Computer Hardware, Consumer Electronics, and Semiconductors

description: A Sales Manager analyses local market trends and competitor activity to recommend strategies that keep the hotel a leader in the marketplace through the development of future and repeat business.  What will I be doing?  Responsibilities  Specifically, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards  As Sales Manager, you will analyse local market trends and competitor activity to recommend strategies that keep the hotel a leader in the marketplace through the development of future and repeat business. Analysis local market trends and competitor activity to identify business leads Develop customer accounts and travel within the local area to drive business into the specific hotel/cluster and to increase market/customer share in all revenue streams Negotiate room rates/packages with corporate clients Develop and implement creative local marketing channels, including social media channels Prepare company contracts for the hotel in accordance with current business and pricing conditions Work within current business strategies and recognising potential opportunities Cooperate with other departments in the hotel to create an exceptional Guest experience and build strong, comprehensive sales programs Attend Sales events, as required Produce accurate and timely reports that meet the needs of the Sales Director and senior management to include the reporting of appointments, calls made and business leads Answer customer queries in a prompt and professional manner Manage staff performance in compliance with company policies and procedures Recruit, manage, train and develop the Sales team What are we looking for?  Skills  To successfully fill this role, you should maintain the attitude, behaviours, skills, and values that follow  A Sales Manager serving Hilton brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members. Positive attitude and good communication skills Commitment to delivering a high level of customer service Excellent grooming standards Flexibility to respond to a range of different work situations Ability to work under pressure and under own initiative Experience in a sales role with a proven track record to close a sale It would be advantageous in this position for you to demonstrate the following capabilities and distinctions: Knowledge of local market Knowledge of hospitality Passion for sales and for achieving targets and objectives Degree-level qualification in a relevant field What will it be like to work for Hilton?  Hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. For nearly a century, Hilton has offered business and leisure travelers the finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. Our vision “to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality” unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. And, our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all!  Work Locations  DoubleTree by Hilton Fuzhou South  Schedule  Full-time  Brand  Doubletree by Hilton  Shift  Day Job  Job Level  Manager  Job  Sales

description: Company Description  At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible.  At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon.  We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future.  Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too.  We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands.  Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data.  Job Description Work internally to strategize sales tools and solution by vertical/applications, build Account Based case study and promotion plan explore new business opportunities by identifying new customers , drive business through remote customer engagement and support through various channels. Build solid data and milestone chart to identify and track strategy execution to improve sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness. Product solutions focused strategy to promote WDC products and solutions to target customers Partner cross-functionally with other teams to align with the latest strategy and resources for OEM Account Other work assigned by team lead. or assistance when needed. Qualifications  Required key skills: Experienced sales internship in university or endeavor to be a sales in future, All majors are well welcomed , marketing, strategy and management , finance majors would be an plus . Able to use English at a working proficiency level, good communication skills. Pro-active with a CAN-DO attitude, able to accept new knowledge in a short time. Outstanding interpersonal and relationship management skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with varying levels of the organization Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to distill complex subjects to a wider audience Evidence of strong character with integrity, honesty, accountability and trust Additional Information  Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution.  Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at [email protected] to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

description: What is Build the Future?  Build the Future is the Prysmian Group Graduate Program. The 2022 edition of the program will be number 11!  We aim to hire talents globally with diverse background and experiences who are eager to make our world a more sustainable place and ready to embrace new challenges. Are you willing to make your mark in the Energy transition and Digitalization of our communities?  We offer you the opportunity to work with products that help the world meet sustainable development goals. Whenever your work will support the mass electrification in mobility or boost the development of 5G Network, you’ll have a real impact on our communities.  Be part of this important change and help us build a better future for all of us. Join us!  Program Overview  Our Graduate Program provides an immersive experience in our company from day 1. The program starts with a two-week Global Induction with trainings and activities led by the Prysmian Group Academy in collaboration with a Top-Ranking Business School.  Following your induction, you will be part of a one-year job rotation in 3 different departments: Research and Development, Operations in one of our production sites, and Sales Support/Technical Sales. After the first year of rotation, you will start your international assignment for a duration of 3 years. The position will be either technical, mainly based in one of our production sites, or business related, strongly linked to the core of our business. You’ll learn new ways of working, acquire new knowledge, meet new colleagues and embrace a new culture! At the end of your assignment abroad, returning to the country you’ve been hired in, you will be ready to take on a new responsibility in the technical or business areas continuing your career in Prysmian Group.  What else is in for you?  A competitive reward package, including a bonus opportunity. A training plan tailored for you in partnership with a Top-Ranking Business School. A buddy who will help you settle in quickly, during the first year of your journey. A wide range of training and career development opportunities based on performance. Mobility benefits during your international assignment. A global network of other 300+ colleagues who have already joined our graduate program.  Who are you?  You are keen on joining a career in our industry and you are ready to embrace a new challenge. You have graduated in the last 18 months or you are completing a degree in the Engineering, Technical or Business and Economics fields. We are a global company. Being fluent in English is key. You have worked or studied abroad and/or you are willing to join an international experience with Prysmian Group. You have excellent communication and presentation skills. You enjoy learning and working with other colleagues.  Everyone at Prysmian Group has the potential to make their mark; because whatever you do, wherever you are based, you will be part of a company that is working to make our future greener. Just come as you are, bringing all your energy, passion and ideas.  ·        You are keen on joining a career in our industry and you are ready to embrace a new challenge.   ·        You have graduated in the last 18 months or you are completing a degree in the Engineering, Technical or Business and Economics fields.   ·        We are a global company. Being fluent in English is key.  ·        You have worked or studied abroad and/or you are willing to join an international experience with Prysmian Group.  ·        You have excellent communication and presentation skills.  ·        You enjoy learning and working with other colleagues.   Everyone at Prysmian Group has the potential to make their mark; because whatever you do, wherever you are based, you will be part of a company that is working to make our future greener. Just come as you are, bringing all your energy, passion and ideas. Ready to start a new journey?

description: As the first Kempinski hotel in China, Kempinski Hotel Beijing Lufthansa Center blends timeless European style with rich Chinese cultural history to create a true Chinese experience for new-age travelers. Kempinski Hotel Beijing Lufthansa Center houses 480 newly renovated rooms and suites, together with 10 conference rooms and one of the largest pillar-free ballrooms in the city with natural daylight. With over 7 different restaurants and bars, YouYi shopping center, two private gardens, and easy transportation access points to some of Beijing's most iconic and monumental scenes, Kempinski Hotel Beijing Lufthansa Center is Beijing's portal into China.  Sales Coordinator  The Sales Coordinator is in charge of the office organisation. Assists in all administrative matters related to the Sales & Marketing department.  Key Responsibilities Support the Director of Sales , Director of Sales & Marketing and the Sales Managers in their day to day activities and to assist them in achieving their personal and team objectives. Determine and implement the procedures and standards of an effective filing system. Provide adequate supplies of stationary and ensures that the following forms are used and kept updated at all times: Timesheets Purchase orders Travel authorizations for business trips Collateral reprint orders Brochure supplies (office) Holiday and sick leave Expense forms Maintain and update inventory: control of all gifts and giveaways. Maintain an up-to-date operating manual of the department, incl. policies and procedures, rules and regulations. Compile monthly reports to be completed by 5th of each month. Compile statistics. Assist with the co-ordination of direct mail campaigns on behalf of sales and marketing, labeling, data collection and distribution of mail items. Ensure the efficient liaison between the sales office and other sales offices in sister hotels, including the distribution of our sales correspondence and collateral to other hotels. Annual contracting administration for corporate and leisure business. Ensure that store requisitions are submitted monthly. Ensure ordering of business cards. Ensure sensible and effective use of the telephone – all incoming calls promptly answered in an agreed manner. Ensure that calls are screened and dealt with in an appropriate way. All enquiries to be dealt with within 24 hours. Assist telesales research of existing/new clients within guidelines of Director of Sales / Director of Sales & Marketing. Sort all incoming mail for the attention of the Director of Sales and Marketing and Sales Department. Ensure the strict confidentiality of information passing though the office. Record minutes of all meetings conducted by the Director of Sales and Marketing and any others as when directed by the Sales and Marketing team from time to time. Maintain the highest standards of professional, ethics, and attitude toward all hotel guests, clients, and colleagues. Coordinate and assist in organising sales trips. Perform all duties and responsibilities in a timely and efficient manner in accordance with established company policies and procedures. Understand and strictly adhere to the rules & regulations established in the employee handbook and the hotel’s policy on fire, hygiene, health & safety. Ensure that all potential and real hazards are reported and rectified immediately. Understand and strictly adhere to the hotel’s employee rules & regulations. Perform any other duties as assigned to them by management. Additional responsibilities and tasks can be added at any time according to the needs of the business and of the hotel.  Desired Skills And Qualifications  Nationality: Eligible for a working permit in country of hire.  Education: Equivalent to High School Diploma or Hotel Apprenticeship.  Experience: Previous experience in 4/5 star hotels.  Language: Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment: Local language – excellent oral and written skills (as applicable) English – excellent oral and written skills Additional language - beneficial Competencies: To fill this position the candidate must have: Planning/organisation skills Adaptability Flexibility Initiative Creativity Technical Competencies: Computer literacy adapted to the field of Sales: Strong computer skills, including Microsoft Office, (Excel/PowerPoint/Word) Micros Fidelio Opera and Sales & Catering Individual Characteristics: To fill this position the candidate must identify with the Kempinski core values, in addition they should be especially: People Oriented Passionate for European luxury Entrepreneurial Straightforward Interest to develop in the Sales department Communication skills Attention to details Other Skills: Depending on region and property.  About Kempinski  Hoteliers since 1897, we have travelled the world in search of the most fascinating destinations without ever forgetting the finest traditions of our European heritage. We are dedicated to please, educated to entertain, and we never compromise on the European elegance of service. We pride ourselves on delivering a beautiful performance for each and every one of our guests. And for our employees, we provide a stage on which they can flourish and realise their full potential. Embrace an experience as individual as you are!  Organization  Kempinski Hotel Beijing Lufthansa Center  Primary Location  China-Beijing  Job Type  Regular  Schedule  Full-time  Shift  Day Job  Job Posting  Mar 23, 2021  Unposting Date  Ongoing

Effectively develops and manages trusted relationships for assigned customers/accounts. Promotes company options and solutions to customers on a regular basis. Identifies sales opportunities to deliver focused market/brand solutions to the customer resulting in increased market share, sales and margin for suppliers and maximizing value to the Company. Consistently delivers revenue or profit that supports and drives the account/customer to meet financial sales metrics.  Principal Responsibilities Delivers solutions or finds new opportunities for a positive customer experience utilizing independent judgment, lead generation, and sales methodology. Directs secured sales opportunties to the proper stakeholder(s), if required. Initiates sales inquiries directly to prospective and/or existing customers to promote product offerings, services and capabilities. Promptly, directs, and accurately responds to prospective or existing customer information requests. Monitors/follows up on sales activities throughout the process to meet or exceed customer requirements from initial contact to order fulfillment. Maintains and expands sales with existing accounts through a high level of customer service and customer knowledge (e.g., Distribution Total Available Market (DTAM), projects in pipeline, critical start dates). Working in a team environment, proactively coordinates sales efforts and strategies with internal resources such as product, materials, field sales team and suppliers. Effectively communicates with customers regarding current product information and provides accurate and detailed pricing, quotes, and input on products and final solutions. Coordinates existing customer requirements for inventories, delivery lead time and unit prices. Other duties as assigned. Job Level Specifications General awareness of business, financials, products/services and the market. Developing basic knowledge of the industry and sales environment Works within an assigned territory/account, product/services or sales process with limited complexity; typically assigned accounts/opportunities with limited size. Follows existing procedures and established sales processes to sell standard products/services. Relies on manager to provide planning & manage resources. Has limited authority/ opportunity to set and negotiate product/service terms. Collaborates with internal team and support functions. Has limited direct contact with clients; may work independently or partner with other sales professionals Works within an assigned area or account base on small to moderately-sized accounts/opportunities with limited complexity. Work Experience Minimum experience required is typically less than 2 years with bachelor's or equivalent. Education And Certification(s) Bachelors degree or equivalent experience from which comparable knowledge and job skills can be obtained. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills.

description: Farnell  Farnell, an Avnet company, is a global high-service distributor of technology products, services and solutions for electronic system design, maintenance and repair.  Job Summary  Field sales executive focused on customers to achieve revenue and margin goals in assigned accounts. Identifies customer needs and applies company’s value proposition to drive sales growth and improved profitability. Develops strategic relationships and aligns customer and business goals, creating and managing a business and execution plan for shared success among the customer, vendor partners and the company.  Principal Responsibilities Serves as the primary point of contact for the customer interface to the company's resources that drives and supports high levels of customer satisfaction and loyalty, as measured in surveys and share of wallet. Develops strong, strategic relationships with customer(s) to identify and leverage the customers’ business goals, growth strategies and profit drivers to deliver the appropriate business value proposition sales solution strategy. Provides leadership and guidance in critical customer planning and engagement. Performs critical customer analysis to identify and leverage the partner’s marketing programs to achieve growth in their customer’s solutions capability. Engages customer(s) in joint planning that integrates the company's services, programs and supplier partnerships securing customer commitment for the development of a comprehensive investment in strategies that advance the company’s market position, entanglement and financial goals Conducts regular business reviews with assigned accounts to track progress toward revenue and growth goals and owns execution of business plan. Maintains and monitors pipeline and metrics for assigned customers, performs analysis and identifies improvement opportunities. Supports supplier's strategies by aligning solutions with customer to maximize profitable growth, and customer expansion. Prioritize customers and opportunities with greatest potential for success. Closely manages profitability by minimizing profit leaks and maximizing gross profit. Other duties as assigned. Expanded knowledge of the industry, markets and sales processes; broadens sales capabilities. Works with moderately complex territory/ assigned accounts, products/services, sales or account management processes. May refer to policies, practices and precedents for guidance; determines best course of action to achieve results. Solves sales problems in straightforward situations; analyzes possible solutions using sales experience, judgment and precedent. Works independently within an assigned territory/account base with moderate sized accounts/opportunities. Has flexibility to set and negotiate terms within defined parameters; is beginning to plan own territory or account approach. Collaborates with internal team, managers and support functions. Has direct contact with clients. Impacts own sales quota and that of others; works within a defined territory or account list and to guidelines and policies. description: Job Description  Responsible for sales management of respective customer from quotation phase to mass production   Shares the responsibility for timing, quality, and cost of the customer’s product portfolios with the other team members of the respective customer   Responsible for profitability, pricing, volume & sales budget, as well as forecast   Ensures strong network with the customer   Responsible for Claim and opportunity management, e.g. overdues and receivables, contract management   Responsible for EOP and service part negotiation   Responsible for customer satisfaction status and initiate countermeasures within CBU   Tracks costs/prices accurately for all projects   Negotiates savings, gap closure, and price increases (incl. ECRs)  Required Skills  Minimum 8 years working experience, with more than 5 years of proven success in Automobile Parts company.   Above 3 years sales experience in OE accounts and a track record of working with a wide range of business partners   University degree holder, automotive or mechanical engineering background would be an advantage   Fluent English both in oral and written   An understanding of Auto industry and products would be a distinct advantage.   Excellent communication/presentation/negotiation/interpersonal skills   Sales sense and understand customer needs   Good analysis capability and market knowledge (customers, competitors, product…)   Good team spirit with technical engineers, project management , purchasing etc.   Like challenges and willing to win   Strong sense of responsibility and initiative   Strong team leadership and excellence in execution skills.  What we offer We want to make you feel welcomed, challenged and inspired and so we’ve made sure to carefully put together a blend of benefits meant to share our drive for better technologies and cleaner air, to ensure your personal and professional growth and also your integration in a pleasant day to day working environment. Who we are Tenneco is one of the world's leading designers, manufacturers and marketers of automotive products for original equipment and aftermarket customers, with 2019 revenues of $17.5 billion and approximately 78,000 team members working at more than 300 sites worldwide. Tenneco’s commitment to operating in a socially responsible and sustainable manner is absolute, no matter the challenge. One of our values is Make Tomorrow Better, and one way that we do that is through our commitment to our customers, employees, and communities to build a more sustainable future. This focus includes a formal policy that outlines Tenneco’s commitment to enabling a healthier and more productive world. Our four business groups, Motorparts, Ride Performance, Clean Air and Powertrain, deliver technology solutions for diversified global markets, including light vehicle, commercial truck, off-highway, industrial, motorsport and the aftermarket. Tenneco's Clean Air business group is a global leader of complete emission systems. We engineer, design and manufacture Light Vehicle and Commercial Truck / Off-highway (CTOH) full-system solutions and enabling technologies that address customer needs for fuel economy, emission control and acoustic performance. Over 20 years’ development after entering into China in 1995, Tenneco Clean Air China has become a strong performer of the automotive parts industry in the emerging auto market. With its headquarters in Shanghai, Tenneco Clean Air China has set up manufacturing plants in over 20 large and medium-sized cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Changchun, Shenyang, Qingdao, Tianjin, Wuhan, Chengdu, Chongqing, Nanjing, etc. And it owns one of three Tenneco global tech centers – Tenneco China Tech Center.  Employee learning and development is held in high regard in Tenneco Clean Air. In addition to setting up multi-channels on self-development, resources and manpower have been invested in building up and strengthening the culture of learning and development. Diversified learning and development opportunities are offered to employees with different experience, ability backgrounds and development needs, such as Trainee Program, New Hire GPS and 6-month Development Plan, Individual contributor capability enhancement, overseas working study program, Individual Development Plan, DDI, etc. What you can expect next Our team is ready to act immediately on those candidates who are the best fit for the role. You’ll first hear from someone in Talent Acquisition to schedule a phone screen, and then the next step will be a personal interview with our Hiring Manager and local HR Manager/HRBP. We pride ourselves on moving through processes quickly, and you can be sure of transparency and prompt communication throughout.

location: Xi Ujimqin Qi, Inner Mongolia, China
description: 公司概述&岗位目的  豪顿是一家全球性工程公司，致力于为客户提供工业产品，帮助其改善日常流程。 豪顿的核心宗旨是为空气和气体处理提供高质量的解决方案，并在该领域拥有超过100年的经验。  作为销售工程师，您将充分发挥销售工程师作用，覆盖区域客户，维护提高公司产品声誉，培养品牌忠诚度，扩大空预器及风机设备产品市场份额，完成销售业绩，达成销售指标。  你的工作是什么？  完成区域内客户覆盖； 拜访电厂客户，根据客户设备运行现状，提出设备升级改造计划，并推动该计划实现。积极推广公司产品、提高产品的知名度。 现行设备的缺陷发掘及现场问题调查、反馈； 配合工程部和应用工程师提出设备升级改造计划，并主导该过程； 通过方案论证和客户建立信任的合作伙伴关系； 通过客户方方案关键人，接触客户方决策层； 取得决策层的信任，进而推动设备改造计划的实施。 制定合理地销售策略，寻求合适的销售解决方案 了解竞争对手产品及销售策略； 通过各种形式的交流，收集有价值的客户信息（如设备状态、备件储备、检修计划等），发掘改造机会，维护和发展潜在的售后市场业务； 寻找差异化解决方案，为客户展现价值差异化，完成预定的投标任务； 根据用户的改造需求，沟通技术支持部门，报价部门，提供差异化的投标方案； 前期与工程部及应用工程师确认差异化的技术方案； 投标过程中及时向报价部门、威海工厂、项目管理部门反馈有价值信息； 汇总文件，审阅投标文件，配合报价部门出具正式的报价文件或投标书； 及时跟进用户需求变化，促使订单早日完成。 助合同的顺利执行。 销售后项目的交接及回款 及时完成项目交接所涉及的文本工作，帮助合同管理衔接用户需求，协助项目顺利实施； 在需要时，协助合同管理部门按时回款； 对实施后的项目保持跟进，为客户解决问题。 协助部门经理总结年度销售情况，并制定明年销售任务。配合公司要求，提供各项报表及相关数据支持文件等。 其他日常事务 部门日常事务； 公司产品销售支持及产品宣传； 我们对你的期待是什么？ 工科背景，机械或电力市场营销相关专业，本科及以上学历；  3年以上工作经验，对电力行业有所了解，熟悉风机、预热器等设备相关知识更佳；  善于谈判，具有创新思维。善于培养关系，能够与客户各层人员良好沟通。  良好的沟通能力、较强的电力行业专业知识、良好的团队合作精神、能适应经常出差（每年120天左右）、能吃苦。  你将获得什么？  您将有机会在具有良好发展前景的全球性集团公司工作，可以获得富有挑战性的岗位和广阔的发展空间。 同时，我们将提供具有竞争力的薪资待遇以及良好的福利体系。  在豪顿工作有什么优势？  全球业务–你将与我们在27个国家/地区的同事一起工作。  我们提供全球和本地的工作机会– 6000名员工和世界领先的工程师，他们创造了最前沿的发展–你将成为160年创新和发展的一部分，数字化解决方案使我们立足于今并且持续进步。 在豪顿，我们拥有强大的企业形象和目标–您将成为我们团队的一员，一起创造世界的未来，一起解决全球面临的一些最紧迫的问题。我们的产品和组织一直在您身边–我们的文化是促进个人发展，使我们最重要的资产–我们的员工 得到全面提升。
industries: Machinery, Mechanical or Industrial Engineering, and Staffing and Recruiting

jobTitle: Sales Manager/销售经理（售后业务）
description: 该职位来源于猎聘  General duties： Responsible for developing, promoting, supporting and selling of service products to maximize After Sales revenue. Ensure that JH service products cover the requirements of the local market and therefore work closely with customers, Service operation and Marketing. Responsible to ensure that any cross-selling opportunities are used. Responsible for the Price list and supports national Key accounts where and if required. Tasks In Operating Cycle Act as product manager for all service products and as support function for the service operations in order to ensure that After Sales Service products are priced, sold and promoted effectively to all customers. Ensure that national standards are developed, communicated and followed by the operation (frontline). Involve the development of Marketing support material for all Service products, setting up national campaigns with the aim to push certain product types and standardize customer PowerPoints. Act as central point of contact for any Service product question and provide training support if/when required. Support the regional Service Sales team and ensure their effectiveness by promoting and implementing best practice. This includes for example monitoring if regional service sales has received the appropriate training levels and is managed in an effective manner on a daily basis, as well as initiating regularly knowledge exchanges across the regions. Responsible for updating and maintaining the China Service pricelist on a regularly basis and suggest a market appropriate list price level Support Key accounts on national level and helps to coordinate any queries between KA, regional Service operation and Corporate After Sales Team. Attend KA customer meetings if/when required. Responsible to demonstrate the effectiveness and performance of Service Sales by providing regularly KPI updates on national and regional level to the After Sales Director (in conjunction with Service controlling). Responsible to initiate appropriate action plans in case of need, monitor progress and feedback to the AS Director central and de-central actions in a summarized format. Functionally responsible for all service sales staff in the regions and responsible for ensuring that service sales initiatives are being carried out in the regions. Profile of qualification： Bachelor or above. Technical understanding and experience in a relevant industries Profound Experience in product management/service sales and sales management Management: budgets & finance Excellent negotiation, communication and time management Ability to work under pressure and willing to travel Innovative and analytical thinking Fluency oral and written communication skills in English Good command of Microsoft Office software 工作地址：上海/闵行区 申长路1588弄中骏广场1期1号楼4楼

description: Location: CN - Shanghai  Goodyear Talent Acquisition Representative: TROY CUAN  Sponsorship Available: No  Relocation Assistance Available: No  Primary Purpose Of The Position  Support MRT Replacement Sales Director / ASM in coordinating, sell-in and through, data analysis and provide suggestion and advise to ASM in order to achieve the company objectives.  Responsibilities Collect and validate data, prepare weekly/monthly/quarterly regional sales analysis report for business planning and KPI tracking. Conduct regular report analysis for ASM (S/I, S/T forecast and actual tracking, Mix, YTD performance review etc.); Provide the analytic tool and beneficial suggestion to ASM/Area Sales supervisor. Understand promotion policy, design calculation formately, complete the national/special promotion result calculation and present the result to related functions. Be responsible for channel sales and market information collection and analysis, provide the analysis report and recommendation to business. Requirements Bachelor degree in business, economics, trade or related major. At least 3 years sales/sales analytical experience in multinational companies. Business process understanding, SAP / CRM experiences preferred. Self-motivated, responsible, willing to work under pressure, ability to manage multiple tasks and use good judgment in resolving difficult issues. Excellent coordination, communication and influencing skills. Excellent capability in MS Office, especially in excel & PPT for data analysis. Must be careful, detailed, perceptive and good with numbers. Goodyear is one of the world’s largest tire companies. It employs about 63,000 people and manufactures its products in 46 facilities in 21 countries around the world. Its two Innovation Centers in Akron, Ohio and Colmar-Berg, Luxembourg strive to develop state-of-the-art products and services that set the technology and performance standard for the industry. For more information about Goodyear and its products, go to www.goodyear.com/corporate.

Job Requisition #:  018767 Sales Coordinator (Open)  Job Description  Key Responsibilities Manages outbound calls to prospective customers based on identified opportunities. Communicates appropriate value proposition based on customer segment and customer's buying needs. Solicits requests for quotes. Uses pricing tools (e.g., list price configurator) to determine appropriate pricing for new sales. Seeks to maximize profit margin. May take re-pricing action for underperforming accounts when possible. Assists account managers with various requests (e.g., submitting prices, entering customer complaints, tracking orders). Assists in the preparation and updating of account plans. Captures and compiles data on competitive activity and the results of quotes/proposals. May provide other administrative support, including, but not limited to: written and electronic correspondence; handling telephone calls and relaying messages; internal office support; making meeting and travel arrangements. Performs other duties as assigned. Education And Experience Typically requires a high school diploma and 4-6 years of experience. Knowledge And Skills Possesses administrative and sales support experience. Demonstrates good written and oral communication skills. Demonstrates strong interpersonal and customer service skills. Possesses strong organizational skills and good attention to detail. Ability to perform cold customer calls and follow up on leads. Proficient in Microsoft Office suite and any other relevant software. 40  EEO Statement  htps://www.greif.com/uploads/media/default/0001/03/230497a078bec89c55df07d1d04e7f6db5ac6122.pdf  We offer a competitive salary, excellent benefits and opportunity for growth. jobTitle: Sales Manager (环境与可持续发展)
description: 工作职责:  The Sales Manager is responsible for the management of sales directly to end users of ULs products or services in a large specified geographic area, and/or is responsible for a specific industry or product segment on a national or geographic area. Develops and motivates sales professionals by coaching and transferring the knowledge of sales techniques, service offerings, and industry knowledge to the sales team to drive results. Lead client engagement by developing and managing relationships at the middle management and key decision maker levels for large and medium customers. Manages sales transaction pipelines and forecasting. Stays up to date with and understands latest market developments and trends. Manages the performance of direct reports by developing accountabilities, establishing performance objectives, providing career counseling, feedback and guidance and ensuring that all policies are understood and adhered to. Performs other duties as directed. 任职条件: University Degree (Equivalent to Bachelors Degree) in a related discipline plus generally eight years of directly related experience. Extensive knowledge of company policies and sales processes. Requires the ability to gain cooperation of others, conducting presentations of technical information concerning specific projects or schedules to senior level management and customers. Expert on sales strategies and tactics. Significant business travel and work outside of the office is required.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  职位介绍：  负责四川全省的血气设备销售，通过完善区域销售管理及优化，完成年度销售任务及市场规划，以达成逐步提升市场份额的目的。  岗位职责： 深耕现有市场并开发潜在市场，摸索并总结区域客户及渠道商业模式； 负责所属省份医院的产品销售及推广，完成销售任务(KA医院除外)； 制定负责区域的专业推广活动，建立良好的互动机制； 关注、收集负责区域竞争对手的情况，制定市场对策并实施； 联络、发现、培养本地区KOL； 与关键客户建立牢固的关系和信任，从而持续影响客户的使用习惯； 积极开展负责区域内的经销商管理以及新渠道的培养发展，完善良好经销商网络； 主动配合其他部门工作，促进跨部门协作； 严格遵守国家合规相关法律和公司合规相关规定、规范。 职位要求： 本科以上学历，临床科室、检验相关专业优先； 5年以上器械销售以及渠道管理经验；从事2-3年以上相关产品销售优先； 有较好的渠道资源者优先； 市场敏锐度良好，善于项目管理； 优秀的销售和交际能力，擅于沟通、协作； 具有独立思考及解决问题能力； 工作主动，能够独立工作，有较强的抗压能力； 有较强的和同事、渠道伙伴和客户建立和维持良好的关系的能力。

description: Own and develop your market and work as a specialist consultant Work with the world's brands  About Our Client  PageGroup is a leading professional recruitment consultancy specializing in the recruitment of permanent, contract and temporary positions for the world's top companies. Established in London in 1976, we've been bringing the world's leading employers and brightest professionals together for over 35 years. More than 5,000 employees in 36 countries can be proud of their part in our global success, including giving something back to their local communities. An organically grown business, we are passionate about career progression and offer our people unrivalled talent development programmes. Rewarding success, having fun and working in a business that supports personal wellbeing is vital to the growth of our global team. With 5 offices in Mainland China, and more to come with a diverse workforce, many of whom have worked for PageGroup for a number of years this is an exciting place to work. We proudly work to match the brightest professionals with some of the world's multinational brands and industry leaders, as well as some of the most highly respected local and international companies in China. Our commitment to career development coupled with rapid growth across China has made us one of a handful of companies where there are multiple and frequent opportunities to been promoted from within.  Job Description  Your responsibilities will include identifying, developing and managing client business relationships as well as selling our recruitment services and negotiating the rates of business. You will have to assess and respond to the needs of each client or assignment and ensure timely delivery. Additional you will manage the recruitment process from interview to offer stage and beyond. That includes sourcing and interviewing candidates, negotiating salary packages and presenting suitable candidates to clients. Your goal is to build mutual benefiting relationships with clients and candidates and work as part of a passionate team to maximise PageGroup's commercial performance.  The Successful Applicant  We are looking for colleagues with: * Experience in Sales and/or Recruitment * First operational experience * University Degree Furthermore you should be highly ambitious, outgoing, passionate, energetic, team oriented and have excellent interpersonal and communication skills as well as entrepreneurial spirit.  What's On Offer  We provide unlimited international career opportunity within our worldwide network of offices. You will receive development throughout your career and work with a dynamic team that are proud and passionate about what they do and enjoy having fun too! * Strong career progression opportunities * World class training and development * A generous base salary with the opportunity for excellent bonuses * Global career opportunities * A dynamic and competitive work environment * Exposure to the world's multinational brands and industry leaders * Recognition as an industry expert * The opportunity to develop and lead a business unit.  Contact: Eva Huang  Quote job ref: 4201285

Conduct effective price negotiation, contract renew when facing competitors.  ax.Explore the new retailer business and improve the ratio of PG/LHE helium retailer customers.  ax.Explore the new application segment of PG/LHE helium and increase the market share and penetration.  ax.Provide the solution for engineering service to existing accounts such as hand goods, manifold etc. Provide effective support to existing customers.  ax.Solve customer dispute face to face if needed.  ax.Collect feedback from customers and work with internal function such as inside sales, supply chain execution and CSL to improve the service to customers.  ax.Grasp the new signing from existing accounts or re-sign the supply agreement/PO if needed . When existing accounts has the expansion, new products, relocation etc, it is incumbent’s responsibility to sign the new contract with existing accounts and maintain our supply to these accounts.  ax.Lead coordination with the LHE/PG operations and distribution teams.  ax.Work with Asia He Manager closely to execute helium strategy, analysis and summary of He financial data, find more He prospects, and keep good relationship with large He customers, such as, Gree, Media, Siemens,Philips,GE……  Ax.Other Works And Projects Assigned By Director Or Company.  任职条件:  Job Requirements EducationA.University education (in business or technical area preferred) an engineering, finance, marketing and/or management discipline. Work ExperienceA.At least 5 years of progressive commercial experience to handle the customer face to face. SkillsA.Sales, commercial, and negotiation skills. Strong negotiation and leadership skill is a plus. B.Willing to travel to visit customers to close customers needs efficiently and quickly  C.Data driven business retention and development. QualitiesA.Having influencing skills. Ability to get along well with diverse personalities. Concise, strong, mature, and flexible. B.Is flexible to handle different scenario and can adapt to change.  C.Integrity – act with integrity and in accordance with company ethics. Ability to confront behavior not consistent with company values. Honors commitments.  D.Problem solving and decision-making skills – decisions that reflect thorough evaluation of needs, goals, facts, etc.,  E.Strong negotiation skill and can handle the pressure and stress when facing tough customers.  F.Result focused – demonstrate ability to reach goals, accountability for results, demonstrated ability to manage through company network, assertive, clear notions of efficiency.  G.Willing to take accountability and desire to work and walk for extra miles.

Proficient analytical skills analysing and synthesizing large amounts of information, and ability to simplify complex concepts and put together a coherent story.
